K02psp_1u:0: Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūte parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ
K02psp_1u:1: samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ pañcamātrair bhikṣunīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair aparimāṇaiś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir ānimittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akūhakair alapakair apagatajñātralābhacittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāraṅgatair vaiśāradyaprāptair mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhair dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalair asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhir vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair anantakalpakoṭīniḥsaraṇakuśalair māyāmarīcidakacandrasvapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktaiḥ sattvagaticaritasūkṣmanānādhimuktyavatārakuśalair apratihatacittair adhimātrakṣāntisamanvāgatair yāthātmyāvatāraṇakuśalaiḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrānantavyūhapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītair asaṃkhyeyalokadhātubuddhānusmṛtisamāhitasatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair nānādṛṣṭyanuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaśatasahasranirhārakuśalaiḥ. tadyathā bhadrapālena ca
K02psp_1u:2: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca (PvsP1-1: 2) indradattena ca uttaramatinā
K02psp_1u:3: ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhūreṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena, evaṃ pramukhair anekair
K02psp_1u:5: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma, yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
K02psp_1u:6: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot,
K02psp_1u:7: tasyādhastāt pādatalayoḥ sahasrābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ, daśabhyaḥ pādāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ, evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir gulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṅghābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām, evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ
K02psp_1u:9: hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām
K02psp_1u:10: aṃśābhyām, evaṃ grīvāyāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ
K02psp_1u:11: dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyād ūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ. yai raśmibhir ayaṃ
K02psp_1u:12: trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ, pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan, ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:13: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot, ekaikataś ca romakūpāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ, yair ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt, taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamāḥ sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ
K02psp_1u:14: sphuṭāś cābhūvan, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś
K02psp_1u:15: cābhūvan, tena ca raśmyavabhāsenaye sattvāḥ spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:16: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa, yāvat sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tayā
K02psp_1u:17: prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan, ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:18: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa, yenemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa,
K02psp_1u:19: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smitam akarot, yato 'nekāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K02psp_1u:20: niśceruḥ, raśmimukhe caikaikasminn uttamamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāny utpannāny abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇāḥ saṃsthitāś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, te pūrvasyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:21: gaṅgānadībālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ
K02psp_1u:22: digvidikṣu, ekaikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu
K02psp_1u:23: aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma, yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, ye ca sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śmvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:24: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede, tathārūpaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
K02psp_1u:25: lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata, acalat prācalat saṃprācalat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat, araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat,
K02psp_1u:26: akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat, agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat, ante unnamati madhye avanamati, madhye unnamati ante avanamati, mṛdukaḥ snigdhaḥ sarvasattvasukhajanano 'bhūt.
K02psp_1u:27: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan, sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan, ye ca sattvās tābhyo narakatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve tenaiva prītiprāmodhyena manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan, evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan.
K02psp_1u:28: atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma, anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs
K02psp_1u:29: tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma, evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:30: gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarve nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan, sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan, ye ca sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve
K02psp_1u:31: devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma, te ca devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam (PvsP1-1: 5) anusmaranti sma, anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannās teṣām antikān upasaṃkrāntāḥ, upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma.
K02psp_1u:32: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma, vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇvanti sma, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma, vikṣiptacittā ekāgracittā bhavanti
K02psp_1u:33: sma, jighatsitāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhavanti sma, tṛṣitā vigatapipāsā bhavanti
K02psp_1u:34: sma, rogaspṛṣṭā vigatarogā bhavanti sma, hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma, avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvā virahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvāś ca bhavanti sma, sarvasattvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma, bhrātṛbhaginīsamacittā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti sma, brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā
K02psp_1u:35: te samanvāgatā bhavanti sma, yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma. sādhu damaḥ asādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūteṣv avihiṃseti.
K02psp_1u:36: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ, imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma, ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca, pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ
K02psp_1u:37: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
K02psp_1u:38: ābhayā varnena śriyā tejasā ca, tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā
K02psp_1u:39: varṇena śriyā tejasā ca, evam eva bhagavān (PvsP1-1: 6) sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma, ābhayā varṇena śriyā
K02psp_1u:41: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānām ātmabhāvas tat samānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa.
K02psp_1u:42: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā
K02psp_1u:43: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr gṛhītvā divyāni utpalakumudasaugandhikapuṇḍarīkapadmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca keśaratamālapatrāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas
K02psp_1u:44: tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ, ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyās te 'pi
K02psp_1u:45: taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ.
K02psp_1u:46: atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhis taiś ca sthalajalajaiḥ puṣpais taṃ tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma,
K02psp_1u:48: atha khalu yais taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantīvarṣaiḥ sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni ca sarvāṇi uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānena
K02psp_1u:50: tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma,
K02psp_1u:51: taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur
K02psp_1u:52: atīvāśobhata, tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu
K02psp_1u:53: dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś cābhūvan, asmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ (PvsP1-1: 7) ca ekaikasyaitad abhūt, mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayatīti.
K02psp_1u:54: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva smitam
K02psp_1u:55: akarot, yena smitāvabhāsenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt, yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
K02psp_1u:56: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma
K02psp_1u:57: saśrāvakasaṃghān, tasyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma
K02psp_1u:58: śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:59: paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān, teṣu ca gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena.
K02psp_1u:60: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato
K02psp_1u:61: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva
K02psp_1u:63: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato
K02psp_1u:64: 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:65: samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ
K02psp_1u:66: pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya
K02psp_1u:67: evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:68: asti kulaputretaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn
K02psp_1u:69: (PvsP1-1: 8) atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo
K02psp_1u:71: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:72: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:73: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:74: atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ
K02psp_1u:75: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:76: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:78: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvamanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas
K02psp_1u:79: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ
K02psp_1u:80: śākyamunim etad avocat: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:81: 9) nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:82: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā
K02psp_1u:83: niṣaṇṇakāḥ, teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:84: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
K02psp_1u:85: atha khalu dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ sarvaśokāpagato nāma tatrāśokaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02psp_1u:86: atha tatra lokadhātau vigataśoko nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam
K02psp_1u:87: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān aśokaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgatam aśokaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya
K02psp_1u:88: mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca
K02psp_1u:90: evam ukte aśokaśrīs tathāgato vigataśokaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputreta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:92: atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:93: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:94: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:95: atha khalu aśokaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni vigataśokāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,
K02psp_1u:96: aśokaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:97: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:99: atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni
K02psp_1u:100: nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
K02psp_1u:101: mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas
K02psp_1u:102: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca vigataśoko bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: aśokaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca
K02psp_1u:103: paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatena
K02psp_1u:104: nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:105: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:106: 11) yena te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena
K02psp_1u:107: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:108: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti sma, yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:109: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tataḥ sarvaśokāpagatāyā lokadhātoḥ vigataśokena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
K02psp_1u:111: atha khalu paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur upaśāntā nāma tatra ratnārcir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva
K02psp_1u:113: atha tatra lokadhātau cāritramatir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato
K02psp_1u:114: 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ratnārcis tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:115: samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnārciṣam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ
K02psp_1u:116: pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya
K02psp_1u:117: evam ukte ratnārciḥ tathāgataḥ cāritramatiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputretaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:119: atha khalu cāritramatir bodhisattvo ratnārciṣaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:120: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca (PvsP1-1: 12)
K02psp_1u:121: śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:122: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:123: atha khalu ratnārcis tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni cāritramataye bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,
K02psp_1u:124: ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpabādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:125: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:127: atha khalu cāritramatir bodhisattvo ratnārciṣas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
K02psp_1u:128: mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas
K02psp_1u:129: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca cāritramatir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ
K02psp_1u:130: śākyamunim etad avocat: ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatena
K02psp_1u:131: nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:132: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:133: 13) yena te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena
K02psp_1u:134: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:135: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ
K02psp_1u:136: sadharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:137: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tata upaśāntāyā lokadhātoś cāritramatiṇā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
K02psp_1u:138: atha khalv uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur jayā nāma tatra jayendro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva
K02psp_1u:140: atha tatra lokadhātau jayadatto nāma bodhisattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavāñ jayendras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ jayendram etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya
K02psp_1u:141: mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahatāḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca
K02psp_1u:143: evam ukte jayendras tathāgato jayadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn
K02psp_1u:144: atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:145: samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
K02psp_1u:146: atha khalu jayadatto bodhisattvo jayendraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:147: (PvsP1-1: 14) gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān
K02psp_1u:149: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:150: atha khalu jayendras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni jayadattāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,
K02psp_1u:151: jayendro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:152: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:154: atha khalu jayadatto bodhisattvo jayendrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ uttarasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
K02psp_1u:155: mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yenāyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas
K02psp_1u:156: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca jayadatto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: jayendro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca
K02psp_1u:157: paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatena
K02psp_1u:158: nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:159: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena (PvsP1-1: 15)
K02psp_1u:160: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:161: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:162: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato jayāyā lokadhātoḥ jayadattena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
K02psp_1u:163: atha khalv uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ samādhyalaṅkṛtā nāma tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
K02psp_1u:165: atha tatra lokadhātau vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato
K02psp_1u:166: 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ
K02psp_1u:167: samādhihastyuttaraśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo?
K02psp_1u:168: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
K02psp_1u:169: evam ukte bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato vijayavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate
K02psp_1u:170: yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati,
K02psp_1u:172: atha khalu vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātun (PvsP1-1: 16) tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca
K02psp_1u:173: bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:174: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:175: atha khalu samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāṇi vijayavikrāmiṇe bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmaiḥ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
K02psp_1u:176: evaṃ ca vadeḥ, samādhihastyuttaraśrīr bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ
K02psp_1u:177: paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānetāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
K02psp_1u:178: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
K02psp_1u:179: atha vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanibhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan manayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:180: samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: samādhisastyuttaraśrīr bhagavan bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:181: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena (PvsP1-1: 17)
K02psp_1u:182: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan. teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:183: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:184: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tataḥ samādhyalaṃkṛtāyā lokadhātor vijayavikrāmiṇā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
K02psp_1u:186: atha khalu pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārarucirā nāma tatra padmottaraśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate
K02psp_1u:187: yāpayati, sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02psp_1u:188: atha tatra lokadhātau padmahasto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam
K02psp_1u:189: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān padmottaraśrīs tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:190: samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ padmottaraśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
K02psp_1u:191: kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsyāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
K02psp_1u:192: evam ukte bhagavān padmottaraśrīs tathāgataḥ padmahastaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputretaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato
K02psp_1u:193: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
K02psp_1u:194: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:195: 18) etad avocat: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahā nāma lokadhātuṃ tañ ca
K02psp_1u:196: śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:197: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:198: atha khalu padmottaraśrī tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmahastāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,
K02psp_1u:199: padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:200: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:202: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi,
K02psp_1u:203: anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan
K02psp_1u:204: gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:206: śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekāntasthitaś ca padmahasto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam
K02psp_1u:207: alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:208: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:209: 19) yena te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena
K02psp_1u:210: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:211: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:212: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārasurucirāyā lokadhātoḥ padmahastena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
K02psp_1u:214: atha khalu dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vigatarajaḥsañcayā nāma tatra sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02psp_1u:215: atha tatra lokadhātau sūryaprabhāso nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato
K02psp_1u:216: 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya
K02psp_1u:218: evam ukte bhagavān sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīs tathāgataḥ sūryaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputreta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate
K02psp_1u:219: yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo
K02psp_1u:220: atha khalu sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvaḥ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca sākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca
K02psp_1u:221: bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:222: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:223: atha khalu sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni sūryaprabhāsāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam
K02psp_1u:224: abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ, sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ
K02psp_1u:225: balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:227: atha khalu sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvaḥ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
K02psp_1u:228: mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas
K02psp_1u:229: tenopasaṃkrāmat, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekāntasthitaś ca sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrī bhagavān bhagavantam
K02psp_1u:230: alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni (PvsP1-1: 21) ca tena bhagavatā sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:231: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
K02psp_1u:232: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:233: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:234: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato vigatarajaḥsañcayāyā lokadhātoḥ sūryaprabhāsena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
K02psp_1u:236: atha khalu paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vaśībhūtā nāma tatraikacchattro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva
K02psp_1u:238: atha tatra lokadhātau ratnottamo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam
K02psp_1u:239: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ekacchattras tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:240: samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgatam ekacchattram etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ
K02psp_1u:241: pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya, asya ca mahataḥ
K02psp_1u:243: evam ukte bhagavān ekacchattras tathāgato ratnottamaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputra itaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān
K02psp_1u:244: lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir (PvsP1-1: 22)
K02psp_1u:245: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbubddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo
K02psp_1u:247: atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:248: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:249: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:250: atha khalu ekacchattras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni ratnottamāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,
K02psp_1u:251: ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:252: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:254: atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
K02psp_1u:255: mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:257: śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca ratnottamo bodhisattvo (PvsP1-1: 23) bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ
K02psp_1u:258: balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi
K02psp_1u:260: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
K02psp_1u:261: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu
K02psp_1u:262: buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:263: atha khalu te boadhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato vaśībhūtāyā lokadhāto ratnottameṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
K02psp_1u:265: atha khalv adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ padmā nāma tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgato
K02psp_1u:266: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva
K02psp_1u:268: atha tatra lokadhātau padmottaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam
K02psp_1u:269: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ padmaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya
K02psp_1u:270: mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya, (PvsP1-1: 24) asya ca mahataḥ
K02psp_1u:272: evam ukte bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgataḥ padmottaraṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputreta upariṣṭā diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn
K02psp_1u:273: atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:274: samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
K02psp_1u:275: atha khalu padmottaro bodhisattvaḥ padmaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:276: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:277: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:278: atha khalu padmaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmottarāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,
K02psp_1u:279: padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:280: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:282: atha khalu padmottaro bodhisattvaḥ padmaśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:284: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yenāyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:286: śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekāntasthitaś ca padmottaro bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam
K02psp_1u:287: alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:288: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te
K02psp_1u:289: 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā
K02psp_1u:290: niṣaṇṇakāḥ, teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:291: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tataḥ padmāyā lokadhātor padmottareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
K02psp_1u:292: atha khalūpariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra nandaśrīr nāma tathāgato
K02psp_1u:293: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva
K02psp_1u:295: atha khalu tatra lokadhātau nandadatto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:296: 26) bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ nandaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya,
K02psp_1u:297: asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya
K02psp_1u:299: evam ukte bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgato nandadattaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputra ito 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn
K02psp_1u:300: atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:301: samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
K02psp_1u:302: atha khalu nandadatto bodhisattvo nandaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avoacat:
K02psp_1u:303: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
K02psp_1u:304: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
K02psp_1u:305: atha khalu nandaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni nandadattāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vader,
K02psp_1u:306: nandaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpabādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā nandaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni
K02psp_1u:307: prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra
K02psp_1u:309: atha nandadatto bodhisattvo nandaśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta upariṣṭād diśi teṣu (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:310: 27) gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan
K02psp_1u:311: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yenāyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:313: śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca nandadatto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam etad avocat: nandaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ
K02psp_1u:314: balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā nandaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
K02psp_1u:315: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena ta upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_1u:316: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato nandāyā lokadhātor nandadattena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
K02psp_1u:317: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ saptaratnamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt puṣpābhikīrṇaḥ, avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaḥ kalpavṛkṣair nānālaṅkāraphalāvanatāgraviṭapaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣaiḥ phalavṛkṣair gandhavṛkṣair mālyavṛkṣaiś copaśobhito 'bhūt, tadyathāpi nāma padmāvatī
K02psp_1u:318: lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca bodhisattvaḥ, anye ca mahojaskāmahojaskā bodhisattvāḥ, (PvsP1-1: 28) bhagavāṃś cādrākṣīt,
K02psp_1u:319: sadevalokaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāṃ prajāṃ saṃnipatitāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān kumārabhūtān.
K02psp_1u:320: iti nidānam tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayāmāsa: sarvākāraṃ śāriputra sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02psp_1u:322: iti samāsataḥ saṃbodhikāmatāsahagataś cittotpādaḥ evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
K02psp_1u:323: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: iha śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvāsthānayogena,
K02psp_1u:324: dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā aparityāgayogena deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya, śīlapāramitā paripūrayitavyā āpattyanāpattyanadhyāpattitām upādāya, kṣāntipāramitā paripūrayitavyā akṣobhaṇatām upādāya, vīryapāramitā paripūrayitavyā kāyikacaitasikavīryāsraṃsanatām upādāya, dhyānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā anāsvādanatām upādāya, prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā prajñādauṣprajñānupalabdhitām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:325: iti vyāsataḥ saṃbodhikāmatāsahagataś cittotpādaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān sarvān anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:327: iti samāsataḥ parārthālambanaś cittotpādaḥ evaṃ matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena duḥśīlān śīle vyāpādabahulān kṣāntau kuśīdān vīrye vikṣiptacittān dhyāne duṣprajñān prajñāsaṃpadi pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:328: iti vyāsataḥ parārthālambanaś cittotpādaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02psp_1u:329: iti cchandasahagataḥ pṛthivyupamaḥ evam iha śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvāsthānayogena dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā prajñādauṣprajñānupalabdhitām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:330: ity āśayasahagataḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇopamaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāriputra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ, śūnyatāsamādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:331: ānimittasamādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ, apraṇihitasamādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ, evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ navāśubhāḥ saṃjñā bhāvayitavyāḥ.
K02psp_1u:332: katamā nava? yad uta ādhmātakasaṃjñā vidhūtakasaṃjñā vipūyakasaṃjñā vilohitakasaṃjñā vinīlakasaṃjñā vikhāditakasaṃjñā vikṣiptakasaṃjñā asthisaṃjñā vidagdhakasaṃjñā ca, āhāre pratikūlasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā,
K02psp_1u:341: bhāvayitavyam, savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ, avitarko
K02psp_1u:346: śamathavipaśyane bhāvayitavye, tisro vidyā bhāvayitavyāḥ. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayitavyāḥ, catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayitavyāni, acyutāḥ pañcābhijñā bhāvayitavyāḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvayitavyāḥ, sapta dhanāni bhāvayitavyāni, aṣṭau mahāpuruṣavitarkā bhāvayitavyāḥ, daśa tathāgatabalāni bhāvayitavyāni, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
K02psp_1u:347: mahāmaitrī bhāvayitavyā, mahākaruṇā bhāvayitavyā, mahāmuditā bhāvayitavyā,
K02psp_1u:349: ity adhyāśayasahagato navacandropamaḥ sarvajñatāṃ jñānena darśanena cāvalokyātikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā, mārgajñatāṃ paripūrayitukāmena sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmena sarvasattvacittacaritajñānākāratāṃ
K02psp_1u:350: paripūrayitukāmena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśānutpāṭayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, bodhisattvanyāmam avakramitukāmena śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramitukāmena,
K02psp_1u:351: avinivartanīyabhūmau sthātukāmena kumārabhūmiṃ samatikramitukāmena, ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ prāptukāmena sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditāni vijñātukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānam abhibhavitukāmena
K02psp_1u:353: iti prayogasahagato jvalanopamaḥ matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo dānāni dīyamānāni ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:356: duḥśīlān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:357: iti śīlapāramitāsahagato ratnākaropamaḥ vyāpannacittān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kṣāntim ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:358: iti kṣāntisahagato mahārṇavopamaḥ kuśīdān vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vīryam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:359: iti vīryasahagato vajropamaḥ vikṣiptacittān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dhyānam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:360: iti dhyānapāramitāsahagataḥ parvatopamaḥ duṣprajñān sattvān prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:361: iti prajñāsahagato mahābhaiṣajyopamaḥ ekam api kuśalacittotpādaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyena pariṇāmanayāprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, alpam api dānaṃ dadatā, alpamapi śīlaṃ rakṣatā, alpām api kṣāntiṃ bhāvayatā, alpam api vīryam ārabhamāṇena, alpam api dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānenālpam api prajñāṃ bhāvayatā sarvasattvebhyaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyena pariṇāmanayāprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena (PvsP1-1: 32) mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:362: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāñ caratā
K02psp_1u:363: kṣāntipāramitāyāñ caratā vīryapāramitāyāñ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāñ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, sarvasattvānām arthāya narakatiryagyoniyamalokaduḥkhāny
K02psp_1u:364: utsoḍhukāmena kalpaśatasahasrasañcitam api śīlaṃ sattvopekṣayā tyaktukāmena buddhakule upapattukāmena, aśītyanuvyañjanāni dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ca niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:365: ity upāyasahagato mitropamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kumārabhūmim ākramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K02psp_1u:366: buddhabodhisattvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:367: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekena svareṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣu adha ūrdhvam ekena svareṇa gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena
K02psp_1u:369: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena triratnavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthātukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:370: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yaiḥ yaiḥ kuśalamūlair ākaṅkṣati tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tāni me kuśalamūlāni samṛddhyantām iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:371: iti praṇidhisahagataś cintāmaṇisadṛśaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāṃ manorathān paripūrayitukāmena annapānavastragandhamālyapuṣpadhūpacūrṇavilepanaśayanāsanagṛhadhanadhānyālaṅkāraratnamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍajātarūparajatodyānarājyādibhir
K02psp_1u:373: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvasattvān dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:374: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena yāvad bodhimaṇḍābhisaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:375: punar aparam śāriputra ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:376: iti balasahagata ādityopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:377: paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyām anupalambhaśūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ bhāvaśūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ parabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:378: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmatathatām avaboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ dharmadhātutathatām avaboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K02psp_1u:379: sarvabhūtakoṭītathatām avaboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:380: punar aparaṃ śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye pṛthivyaptejovāyuparamāṇavas tāñ jñātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
K02psp_1u:381: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carañ jānāti evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ mahāphalaṃ bhavati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ
K02psp_1u:384: deveṣūpapādayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ trayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapādayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ yāmeṣūpapādayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tuṣiteṣūpapādayati, evaṃ danaṃ dattaṃ nirmāṇaratiṣūpapādayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ
K02psp_1u:393: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattipratilambhāya saṃvartate, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilambhāya saṃvartate, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ srotaāpattiphalapratilambhāya saṃvartate, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ
K02psp_1u:399: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā
K02psp_1u:400: jñātavyam, evam upāyakauśalena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K02psp_1u:401: evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati, evaṃ dānaṃ (PvsP1-1: 35)
K02psp_1u:402: dattaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_1u:403: paripūrayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati, evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_1u:404: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
K02psp_1u:405: kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā śīlapāramitā paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā
K02psp_1u:406: kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā vīryapāramitā paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā dhyānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
K02psp_1u:407: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā prajñāpāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
K02psp_1u:408: bhagavān āha: anupalambhena deyasya dāyakasya grāhakasya ca dānapāramitā
K02psp_1u:414: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūritā bhavanti, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante, evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante, evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante, evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante, evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante.
K02psp_1u:415: iti jñānasahagato madhurasaṅgītighoṣopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:416: punar aparaṃ śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasra lokadhātau yo mahāsamudreṣv
K02psp_1u:417: (PvsP1-1: 36) apy apskandho mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍāgeṣu palvaleṣu taṃ sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā vālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣeptukāmena ca tanniśritān
K02psp_1u:420: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ kalpoddāhāgnipradīptam ekena mukhavātena praśamayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:421: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yā vikṣobhaṇāvātamaṇḍalī vātasaṃvartanyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ yāvat sumerumahāsumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍānupādāya sarvaparvatān sarvamahāpṛthivīṃ vidhunoti vikirati nirmaṣīkaroti tāṃ vikṣobhaṇāvātamaṇḍalīm ekenāṅguliparvāgreṇācchādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:422: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yāvān ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekena paryaṅkena sphāritukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:423: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sumerumahāsumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍādayaḥ parvatās tān ekena vālena baddhā asaṃkhyeyān apramānān lokadhātūn samatikrāmayeyaṃ kṣipeyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
K02psp_1u:424: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena teṣāñ ca dharmadeśanāṃ divyena śrotrena śrotukāmeṇa sarvasattvacittacaritāni ca jñātukāmena teṣāṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmartukāmena āsravakṣayajñānābhijñām abhinirhartukāmena ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkartukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:425: iti abhijñāsahagato mahārājopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ yāvanto gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā (PvsP1-1: 37) bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakabodhisattvasaṃghās tān ekena piṇḍapātreṇa pratipādayitukāmena
K02psp_1u:427: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣṭavyam.
K02psp_1u:428: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena srotaāpattiphale
K02psp_1u:430: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena, arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena yāvad anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:431: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān yāvad anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:432: iti puṇyajñānasahagataḥ koṣṭhāgāropamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhaguṇān anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:433: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ gantukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:434: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇām atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām avabodhukāmena dharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:435: iti bodhipakṣasahagato mahāmārgopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṅgamena bhavitukāmena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:437: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:438: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:439: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena bodhisattvaṃ parivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:440: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dakṣiṇāṃ pariśodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:441: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mātsaryacittaṃ nigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:442: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauḥśīlyacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:443: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyāpādacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:444: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kauśīdyacittam utsraṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:445: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vikṣiptacittaṃ riñcitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauṣprajñacittam aprapañcitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:446: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena,
K02psp_1u:448: vaiyāvṛtyasahagate caupadhike puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:449: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañca cakṣūṃṣy uptpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. katamāni pañca? yad
K02psp_1u:450: (PvsP1-1: 39) uta māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:451: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:452: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:453: paścimāyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:454: uttarasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:455: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:456: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:457: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:458: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:459: adhastād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:460: upariṣṭād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:461: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmān bhāṣante tān dharmān divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena, teṣāñ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
K02psp_1u:462: parijñātukāmena, teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisattvatām anusmartukāmena, teṣāñ ca buddhānām ṛddhivikurvitaṃ draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:463: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāṃs te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmān bhāṣante
K02psp_1u:464: (PvsP1-1: 40) tāñ chrutvā anācchedyena smṛtibalādhānena sarvān saṃdhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti
K02psp_1u:466: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena atītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena, anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ
K02psp_1u:467: bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. ye caitarhi samantād daśa diśi loke buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:468: iti śamathavipaśyanāsahagato yānopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yat kiñcid daśasu dikṣu buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca, yad idaṃ sūtraṃ
K02psp_1u:469: geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyādbhutā dharmā avadānam upadeśāḥ, yac ca śrāvakair na śrutaṃ tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:470: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yat kiñcit pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:471: yat kiñcid dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:472: yat kiñcit paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate (PvsP1-1: 41) bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
K02psp_1u:473: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:474: yat kiñcid uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:475: yat kiñcid uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:476: yat kiñcit pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:477: yat kiñcid dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:478: yat kiñcit paścimottarasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:479: yat kiñcid adho diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena (PvsP1-1: 42)
K02psp_1u:480: tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:481: yat kiñcid ūrdhvaṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:482: iti dhāraṇīpratibhānasahagataḥ prasravaṇopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena
K02psp_1u:484: yāni dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:485: yāni paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
K02psp_1u:486: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:487: yāny uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
K02psp_1u:488: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:489: yāny uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:490: yāni pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:491: yāni dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:493: andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:494: yāni adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
K02psp_1u:495: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:496: yāny upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
K02psp_1u:497: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:499: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:500: ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:501: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:502: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:503: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:504: ye uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:505: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:506: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:507: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:508: ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:509: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:510: ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:511: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
