K02psp_1u:512: ye paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:513: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:514: ye adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:515: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:516: ye upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ
K02psp_1u:517: saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:518: iti dharmoddānasahagata ānandaśabdopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:519: evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta
K02psp_1u:520: iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā
K02psp_1u:521: bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante, manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
K02psp_1u:522: duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:527: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:528: ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:529: unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,
K02psp_1u:530: jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo
K02psp_1u:531: vimokṣyante, manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:532: duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:536: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:537: unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,
K02psp_1u:538: jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrnagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:539: duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, (PvsP1-1: 46) avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:540: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:541: ye uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:542: unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,
K02psp_1u:543: jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:544: duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:548: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān
K02psp_1u:549: śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:550: pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ
K02psp_1u:551: sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:552: avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, (PvsP1-1: 47) sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau
K02psp_1u:555: ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān
K02psp_1u:556: śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:557: pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ
K02psp_1u:558: sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:559: avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:560: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:561: ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān
K02psp_1u:562: śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:563: pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ
K02psp_1u:564: sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:565: avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:566: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:567: ye paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu (PvsP1-1: 48) sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa
K02psp_1u:568: śabdān śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:569: pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ
K02psp_1u:570: sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:571: avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:572: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:573: ye 'dho diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:574: śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:575: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:577: adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau
K02psp_1u:580: ye ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,
K02psp_1u:581: unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,
K02psp_1u:582: jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā (PvsP1-1: 49) bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ
K02psp_1u:583: sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:584: avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:585: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:586: iti ekāyanamārgasahagato nadīsrotopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgateryāpathe śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:587: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam, kadā nv ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayiṣyāmīti, kim ity ahaṃ pṛthīvīṃ caturaṅgulam aspṛśan padbhyāṃ gaccheyam iti
K02psp_1u:589: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim ity ahaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikais trayastriṃśair yāmais tuṣitair nirmāṇaratibhiḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhir brahmakāyikair brahmapurohitair brahmapāriṣadyaiḥ parīttābhair apramāṇābhair ābhāsvaraiḥ parīttaśubhair apramāṇaśubhaiḥ śubhakṛtsnair anabhrakaiḥ puṇyaprasavair bṛhatphalair asaṃjñisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsair aspṛhair atapaiḥ sudṛśaiḥ
K02psp_1u:590: sudarśanair akaniṣṭhaiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'nekadevaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlam upasaṃkrāmeyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:591: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā
K02psp_1u:592: yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapāriṣadyaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā
K02psp_1u:593: asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā aspṛhā atapāḥ (PvsP1-1: 50) sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ, bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlaṃ pratisaṃstareyur iti
K02psp_1u:595: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato vā tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā śayānasya vā sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:596: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase niṣkāmeyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyam iti, tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyam iti, dharmacakraṃ ca me
K02psp_1u:597: pravartayamānasyāsaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyed iti, asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:598: anupādāyāsrvebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyur iti, asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā sattvā
K02psp_1u:599: avinivartanīyā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:601: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim iti me 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ syād iti, aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ekadharmadeśanāyā ekāsanikā bodhisattvā
K02psp_1u:602: bhaveyur avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti, asaṃkhyeyaś cāprameyaś ca bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaved iti, aparimitaṃ cāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaved iti, aparimitā ca prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:604: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tasmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohāyatanāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaveyur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:605: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam, kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpayā prajñayā sattvāḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyur, yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavantaḥ evam udānam
K02psp_1u:606: udānayeyuḥ. sādhu śamaḥ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇabrahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣv iti
K02psp_1u:608: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim iti me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānam api
K02psp_1u:609: na syāt, sahaśravaṇena ca me nāmadheyasya ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:610: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati, tadā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas ta evaṃ cintayanti, vayam asmai bodhisattvāya catvāri pātrāṇi dāsyāmaḥ, yathā dattāni pūrvakair mahārājaiḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ
K02psp_1u:611: trayastriṃśāś ca devā āttamanaskā bhavanti yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā utsukā bhaviṣyanti, vayam asya bodhisattvasya
K02psp_1u:612: mahāsattvasyopasthānaparicaryāḥ kariṣyāma iti, evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ
K02psp_1u:614: āttamanaskāś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bhavanti brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ, āttamanaskā bhavanti parīttābhā apramāṇābhāś ca ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhābhāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devās teṣām evaṃ bhavati, vayam enam abhisaṃbuddham adhyeṣiṣyāmo dharmacakrapravartanāya, yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate
K02psp_1u:615: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ, tasmin samaya āttamanaskā bhavanti bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca vayam asya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā iti.
K02psp_1u:616: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājāno devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmapārṣadyā devā brahmapurohitā devā mahābrahmāṇo (PvsP1-1: 52) devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā anabhrakā devāḥ
K02psp_1u:617: puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhāvāsā devā aspṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya maithunadharmaparivarjanena, atha yaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo brahmacārī bhavati, na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ saṃyujyate, tasyaivaṃ bhavati abrahmacāriṇaḥ sa khalu punaḥ kāmān pratisevamāṇasya brahmalokopapatter apy antarāyo bhavati, kaḥ punar vādo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena brahmacāriṇaiva gṛhād abhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā.
K02psp_1u:618: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavann
K02psp_1u:619: avaśyaṃ bodhisattvasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhavitavyaṃ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitair bhavitavyam?
K02psp_1u:620: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: keṣāṃcic chāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātāpitarau bhavataḥ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā vā, keṣāñcid bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya brahmacaryasamādānan te kumārabhūtā eva bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranto
K02psp_1u:622: upāyakauśalyena ca pañca kāmaguṇān paribhujyābhiniṣkramyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante, tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito bhaven māyāyāṃ, sa pañca kāmaguṇān
K02psp_1u:623: abhinirmāya taiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramet krīḍet paricaret, tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputra api nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā vā pañca
K02psp_1u:626: bhagavān āha: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena ca pañca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte sattvānāṃ paripākahetoḥ, na punar bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:627: mahāsattvaḥ kāmaguṇair lipyate, anena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣate, ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā badhakāḥ kāmāḥ
K02psp_1u:628: pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ, evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvaparipākahetoḥ pañca kāmaguṇān upādadāti.
K02psp_1u:629: iti dharmakāmasahagato mahāmeghopamaḥ iti uktaś cittotpādaḥ evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
K02psp_1u:630: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattva eva samāno bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati, bodhisattvanāmāpi na samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:631: bodhisattvacaryām api na samanupaśyati, prajñāpāramitām api na
K02psp_1u:632: samanupaśyati, rūpam api na samanupaśyati, evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:633: mahāsattvo bodhisattvasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, tathā hi śūnyatayā na rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ, na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śūnyatayā śūnyaṃ, nānyatra rūpāc chūnyatā, nānyatra vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā,
K02psp_1u:634: nānyatra saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā, nānyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ śūnyatā, nānyatra vijñānāc chūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpam eva śūnyatā, vedanaiva śūnyatā,
K02psp_1u:635: saṃjñaiva śūnyatā, saṃskārā eva śūnyatā, vijñānam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva
K02psp_1u:636: rūpaṃ, śūnyataiva vedanā, śūnyataiva saṃjñā, śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ,
K02psp_1u:637: śūnyataiva vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ
K02psp_1u:638: bodhisattva iti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ prajñāpāramiteti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ, tathā hi māyopamaṃ
K02psp_1u:639: rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ, māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na
K02psp_1u:640: pradeśasthā asadasaṃbhūtaṃ vitathadarśanasamaṃ, māyādarśanasvabhāvasya hi (PvsP1-1: 54) notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam, evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādam api na samanupaśyati, nirodham api na samanupaśyati, saṃkleśam api na
K02psp_1u:641: samanupaśyati, vyavadānam api na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kṛtrimaṃ nāma pratidharmaṃ, te ca kalpitāḥ, āgantukena nāmadheyena vyavahriyante, tāni bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvanāmāni na
K02psp_1u:643: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivam upaparīkṣate nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ bodhisattva iti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad
K02psp_1u:644: uta bodhir iti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad
K02psp_1u:645: uta prjñāpāramiteti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryeti,
K02psp_1u:646: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vedaneti,
K02psp_1u:647: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta saṃjñeti, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta saṃskārā iti,
K02psp_1u:648: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānam iti, tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ātmeti
K02psp_1u:649: cocyate, na cātmā upalabhyate, na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na
K02psp_1u:650: pudgalo na manujo 'py upalabhyate, anupalambhaśūnyatām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvas tam api na samanupaśyati yenābhiniviśeta,
K02psp_1u:651: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K02psp_1u:652: sa cec chāriputrāyañ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api
K02psp_1u:653: kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy apamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti, evaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitā yā
K02psp_1u:654: prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra yā bodhisattvasya prajñā sā sarvasattvānāṃ nirvāṇāya pratyupasthitā, tiṣṭhatu śāriputrāyañ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair (PvsP1-1: 55) bhikṣubhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:655: sa cec chāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ
K02psp_1u:656: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm
K02psp_1u:657: api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti. tiṣṭhatu śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:658: sa cec chāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:659: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:660: sa cec chāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:661: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:662: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:663: sa cec chāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:664: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PvsP1-1: 56) carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:665: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:666: sa cec chāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃvā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:667: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:668: sa cec chāriputra uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:669: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:670: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:671: sa cec chāriputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:672: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:673: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy (PvsP1-1: 57) upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:674: sa cec chāriputra dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadibālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:675: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy, upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:676: sa cec chāriputra paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:677: tilavanaṃ vā, teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
K02psp_1u:678: bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:679: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:680: sa cec chāriputrādhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:681: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:682: sa cec chāriputra ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ (PvsP1-1: 58) vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:683: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:684: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: yeyaṃ bhagavan srotaāpannasya prajñā sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya prajñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñā tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K02psp_1u:685: samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā sarvā etāḥ prajñā abhinnā viviktā anutpannā asvabhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ, na ca bhagavann abhinnasya viviktasya anutpannasyāsvabhāvasya śūnyasya nānākaraṇam upalabhyate viśeṣo vā, tat kathaṃ punar bhagavan yā bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati?
K02psp_1u:686: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
K02psp_1u:687: śāriputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ekadivasabhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā sarvākāravaropetā sarvajñatāyāṃ carataḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kurvataḥ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān buddhā sarvasattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti, api nu śāriputra
K02psp_1u:690: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputra api nu
K02psp_1u:691: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati, asmābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvā nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā iti.
K02psp_1u:693: bhagavān āha: tad anenāpi te śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā sā bodhisattvasya prajñā yā ekadivasabhāvitāyāḥ śatatamīm api kālaṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy
K02psp_1u:694: (PvsP1-1: 59) upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti, tat kiṃ manyase?
K02psp_1u:695: śāriputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati, vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya
K02psp_1u:696: daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K02psp_1u:698: abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma
K02psp_1u:701: bhagavān āha: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya punaḥ śāriputraivaṃ bhavati,
K02psp_1u:702: ahaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K02psp_1u:704: abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti, tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra na bhavati khadyotakasya
K02psp_1u:705: prāṇakajātasya mamābhayā jambudvīpo 'vabhāsyateti, mamābhayā jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭo bhaved iti, evam eva śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati, ekasyāpy ahaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri
K02psp_1u:706: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān
K02psp_1u:707: sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti, tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sūryamaṇḍalam udayan sarvaṃ jambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti, evam eva śāriputra
K02psp_1u:708: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān
K02psp_1u:710: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayati.
K02psp_1u:711: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu sarveṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikrāmati, avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhimārgaṃ ca
K02psp_1u:713: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati.
K02psp_1u:714: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: prathamacittotpādam upādāya śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yāvadā
K02psp_1u:715: bodhimaṇḍād atrāntare satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K02psp_1u:716: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
K02psp_1u:717: bhavati, catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
K02psp_1u:718: buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, eteṣāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02psp_1u:720: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trayastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02psp_1u:721: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, (PvsP1-1: 61) apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02psp_1u:722: apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, anabhrakā devāḥ prajñāyante, puṇyaprasavā devāḥ prajñāyante, vṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ prajñāyante, śuddhāvāsā devāḥ prajñāyante, aspṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02psp_1u:724: sakṛdāgāmino loke utpadyante, anāgāmino loke utpadyante, arhanto loke utpadyante, pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante, bodhisattvā loke utpadyante,
K02psp_1u:726: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavan
K02psp_1u:727: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati uta neti.
K02psp_1u:728: bhagavān āha: na hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati,
K02psp_1u:729: tat kasya hetoḥ? ātyantaśuddhaiva dakṣiṇā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K02psp_1u:730: tat kasya hetoḥ? dāyakaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. kasya dāyakaḥ?
K02psp_1u:731: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ. katameṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ? yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadāṇām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasmām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ.
K02psp_1u:732: iti pratipattyavavādaḥ evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:733: yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti
K02psp_1u:735: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:736: vedanāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, saṃjñāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
K02psp_1u:737: iti vaktavyaḥ, saṃskāraśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:739: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, śrotraśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:740: ghrāṇaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, jihvāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
K02psp_1u:741: iti vaktavyaḥ, kāyaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, manaḥśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:742: śabdaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, gandhaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
K02psp_1u:743: iti vaktavyaḥ, rasaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:744: spraṣṭavyaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, dharmaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, cakṣurvijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti
K02psp_1u:745: vaktavyaḥ, śrotravijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:749: manovijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, duḥkhaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, samudayaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:750: nirodhaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, mārgaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
K02psp_1u:751: iti vaktavyaḥ, avidyāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:752: saṃskāraśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, vijñānaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, nāmarūpaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:753: ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, sparśaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, vedanāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:754: tṛṣṇāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, upādānaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
K02psp_1u:755: iti vaktavyaḥ, bhavaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, jātiśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:758: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:759: yāvat parabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:760: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann āsu sarvāsu śūnyatāsu yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ, sa ābhiḥ śūnyatābhiḥ
K02psp_1u:761: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yukto yukta iti vaktavyo 'yukta iti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na sa rūpaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:762: iti duḥkhasatyāvavādaḥ sa na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati, na vedanām utpādadharmiṇīṃ vā nirodhadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati na saṃjñām utpādadharmiṇīṃ vā nirodhadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati, na saṃskārān utpādadharmiṇo vā nirodhadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati, na vijñānām utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati, na vedanāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati, na saṃjñāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati, na saṃskārān saṃkleśadharmiṇo vā vyavadānadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati, na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:763: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati, na vedanā saṃjñāyāṃ samavasaratīti
K02psp_1u:764: samanupaśyati, na saṃjñā saṃskāreṣu samavasaratīti samanupaśyati, na saṃskārā vijñāne samavasarantīti samanupaśyati, na vijñānaṃ dharme
K02psp_1u:765: samavasaratīti samanupaśyati, na dharmaḥ kvacid dharme samavasaratīti samanupaśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi kaścid dharmaḥ kvacid dharme
K02psp_1u:766: samavasarati prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra
K02psp_1u:767: yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpam, yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā, yā
K02psp_1u:768: (PvsP1-1: 64) saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā, yā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ, yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yā rūpaśūnyatā na sā rūpayati, yā vedanāśūnyatā na sā vedayati, yā saṃjñāśūnyatā na sā saṃjānīte, yā saṃskāraśūnyatā na sābhisaṃskāroti, yā vijñānaśūnyatā na sā vijānāti, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra nānyad rūpam anyā śūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyad rūpaṃ, rūpam eva śūnyatā
K02psp_1u:769: śūnyataiva rūpam, nānyā vedanā anyā śūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyā vedanā,
K02psp_1u:770: vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vedanā, nānyā saṃjñā anyāśūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyā saṃjñā, saṃjñaiva śūnyatā śūnyataivasaṃjñā, nānye saṃskārā anyā śūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anye saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārā eva śūnyatā
K02psp_1u:771: śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ, nānyad vijñānam anyā śūyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyad
K02psp_1u:772: vijñānaṃ, vijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānam.
K02psp_1u:773: iti samudayasatyāvavādaḥ śūnyatā śāriputra notpadyate na nirudhyate, na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
K02psp_1u:774: na hīyate na vardhate, nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā, yā ca īdṛśī na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātur nākāśadhātur na vijñānadhātur na cakṣurāyāyatanaṃ na rūpāyatanaṃ na śrotrāyatanaṃna śabdāyatanaṃ na ghrāṇāyatanaṃ na gandhāyatanaṃ na jihvāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ na kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ na manaāyatanaṃ dharmāyatanam, na cakṣurdhātur na
K02psp_1u:775: rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ, na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ, na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuḥ, na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ,
K02psp_1u:776: na kāyadhātur na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātuḥ na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātuḥ, nāvidyotpādo nāvidyānirodhaḥ, na saṃskārotpādo na saṃskāranirodhaḥ, na vijñānotpādo na vijñānanirodhaḥ, na nāmarūpotpādo na nāmarūpanirodhaḥ, na ṣaḍāyatanotpādo na
K02psp_1u:777: ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ, na sparśotpādo na sparśanirodhaḥ, na vedanotpādo na
K02psp_1u:778: vedanānirodhaḥ, na tṛṣṇotpādo na tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ, na upādānotpādo nopādānanirodhaḥ, na bhavotpādo na (PvsP1-1: 65) bhavanirodhaḥ, na jātyutpādo na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsotpādo na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsanirodhaḥ, na duḥkhaṃ na
K02psp_1u:779: samudayo na nirodho na mārgo na prāptir nābhisamayo na srotaāpanno na srotaāpattiphalaṃ, na sakṛdāgāmī na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ,
K02psp_1u:780: nānāgāmīnānāgāmiphalaṃ, nārhattvaṃ nārhattvaphalaṃ, na pratyekabuddho na
K02psp_1u:781: pratyekabodhiḥ, na buddho na bodhiḥ, evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:782: iti nirodhasatyāvavādaḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati, na śīlapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na vīryapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na vedanāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na saṃjñāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na saṃskāreṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na vijñāne yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣuṣi yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na śrotre yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na ghrāṇe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na jihvāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na kāye yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na manasi yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na śabde yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na gandhe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na rase yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na spraṣṭavye yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na dharme yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na smṛtyupasthāneṣu (PvsP1-1: 66) yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:783: na samyakprahāṇeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na ṛddhipādeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, nendriyeṣu yukta iti
K02psp_1u:784: vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na baleṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na bodhyaṅgeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na mārgeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na caturṣu satyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yukta iti vā
K02psp_1u:785: ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati, nābhijñāsu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:786: na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:787: nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā
K02psp_1u:788: samanupaśyati, yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā
K02psp_1u:789: samanupaśyati, na sarvajñajñāne yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:790: tad anenāpi te śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:791: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatayā yojayati, na śūnyatāyogaḥ, nānimittam ānimittena yojayati nānimittayogaṃ, nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati
K02psp_1u:792: nāpraṇihitayogam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śūnyatā na yogo nāyogaḥ, evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na yogo nāyogaḥ. evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra
K02psp_1u:793: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:794: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām avatarati, evam eva taran na rūpaṃ yojayati
K02psp_1u:795: na viyojayati na vedanāṃ yojayati na viyojayati, na saṃjñāṃ yojayati na
K02psp_1u:796: viyojayati, na saṃskārān yojayati na viyojayati, na vijñānaṃ yojayati na
K02psp_1u:797: viyojayati, na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati, pūrvāntam eva na
K02psp_1u:798: samanupaśyati, na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati, aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na vāyojayati,
K02psp_1u:799: pratyutpannam eva na samanuupaśyati, na vedanāṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati, pūrvāntam eva na samanupāśyati, na (PvsP1-1: 67) vedanām aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati, aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na vedanāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati, pratyutpannam eva na
K02psp_1u:800: samanupaśyati, na saṃjñāṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati, pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃjñām aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati, aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃjñāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
K02psp_1u:801: pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃskārān pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati, pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃskārān aparāntena
K02psp_1u:802: yojayati na viyojayati, aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃskārān pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati, pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:803: na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati, pūrvāntam eva na
K02psp_1u:804: samanupaśyati, na vijñānam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati, aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati, na vijñānaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
K02psp_1u:806: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati, na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntena vā aparāntena vā yojayati, nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati, na pūrvāntam aparāntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati, adhvaśūnyatām upādāya. evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:807: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran evaṃ yujyate, yathā yujyamāno na sarvākārajñatām atītena yojayati, atītam eva na samanupaśyati, katham atītena sarvākārajñatāṃ yojayati. na sarvākārajñatām anāgatena yojayati, anāgatam eva na samanupaśyati, katham anāgatena sarvākārajñatāṃ yojayati. na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratyutpannena
K02psp_1u:808: yojayati, pratyutpannam eva samanupaśyati, kathaṃ pratyutpannena sarvākārajñatāṃ yojayati, evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:810: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rūpam eva na samanupaśyati, na vedanāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vedanām eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃjñāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati saṃjñām eva na samanupaśyati, na saṃskārān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati saṃskārān eva na samanupaśyati, na vijñānaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati, na cakṣuḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati, na śrotraṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati śrotram eva na samanupaśyati, na ghrāṇaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati ghrāṇam eva na samanupaśyati, na jihvāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati jihvām eva na samanupaśyati, na kāyañ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati kāyam eva na samanupaśyati, na manaḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati mana eva na samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rūpam eva na samanupaśyati, na śabdān sarvākārajñatayāyojayati śabdān eva na samanupaśyati, na gandhān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati gandhān eva na samanupaśyati, na rasān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rasān eva na samanupaśyati, na spraṣṭavyaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati spraṣṭavyaṃ eva na samanupaśyati, na dharmān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati dharmān eva na samanupaśyati, evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:811: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati dānapāramitām eva na
K02psp_1u:812: samanupaśyati, na śīlapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati śīlapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati, na kṣāntipāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati kṣāntipāramitām eva na samanupaśyati, na vīryapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā
K02psp_1u:813: yojayati vīryapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati, na dhyānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati, dhyānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati, na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati prajñāpāramitām eva na
K02psp_1u:814: samanupaśyati, na smṛtyupasthānāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati smṛtyupasthānāny eva na samanupaśyati, na samyakprahāṇāni (PvsP1-1: 69)
K02psp_1u:815: sarvākārajñatayā yojayati samyakprahāṇāny eva na samanupaśyati, na ṛddhipādān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati ṛddhipādān eva na samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:816: nendriyāṇi sarvākārajñatayā yojayati indriyāṇy eva na samanupaśyati, na balāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati balāny eva na samanupaśyati, na bodhyaṅgāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati bodhyaṅgāny eva na samanupaśyati, na mārgān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati mārgān eva na samanupaśyati, na pratisaṃvideiḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati pratisaṃvida eva na
K02psp_1u:817: samanupaśyati, na vaiśāradyāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vaiśāradyāny eva
K02psp_1u:818: na samanupaśyati, nābhijñāḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayaty abhijñā eva na
K02psp_1u:819: samanupaśyati, na daśatathāgatabalāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati daśatathāgatabalāny eva na samanupaśyati, nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvākārajñatayā yojayaty aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān eva na
K02psp_1u:820: samanupaśyati, evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:821: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati buddham eva na samanupaśyati, na sarvākārajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati sarvākārajñatām eva na samanupaśyati, na bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati bodhim eva na samanupaśyati, na sarvākārajñatāṃ bodhyā yojayati sarvākārajñatām eva na samanupaśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ? buddha eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva buddhaḥ, bodhir eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva bodhiḥ, evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra
K02psp_1u:822: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:823: iti buddharatnāvavādaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhavatīti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhavatīti yojayati, na vedanā bhavatīti yojayati na vedanā vibhavatīti yojayati, na saṃjñā bhavatīti
K02psp_1u:824: yojayati na saṃjñā vibhavatīti yojayati, na saṃskārā bhavatīti (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:825: 70) yojayati na saṃskārā vibhavatīti yojayati, na vijñānaṃ bhavatīti
K02psp_1u:826: yojayati na vijñānaṃ vibhavatīti yojayati, na rūpaṃ nityam iti yojayati na
K02psp_1u:827: rūpam anityam iti yojayati, na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati, na rūpam ātmeti yojayati na rūpam anātmeti yojayati, na rūpaṃ śāntam iti yojayati, na rūpam aśāntam iti yojayati, na vedanā nityeti yojayati na vedanā anityeti yojayati, na vedanā sukheti yojayati na vedanā duḥkheti yojayati, na vedanā ātmeti yojayati na vedanā anātmeti
K02psp_1u:828: yojayati, na vedanā śānteti yojayati na vedanā aśānteti yojayati, na saṃjñā nityeti yojayati na saṃjñā anityeti yojayati, na saṃjñā sukheti
K02psp_1u:829: yojayati na saṃjñā duḥkheti yojayati, na saṃjñā ātmeti yojayati na saṃjñā
K02psp_1u:830: anātmeti yojayati, na saṃjñā śānteti yojayati na saṃjñā aśānteti yojayati,
K02psp_1u:831: na saṃskārā nityā iti yojayati na saṃskārā anityā iti yojayati, na saṃskārāḥ sukhā iti yojayati na saṃskārā duḥkhā iti yojayati, na saṃskārā ātmāna iti yojayati na saṃskārā anātmāna iti yojayati, na saṃskārāḥ śāntā
K02psp_1u:832: iti yojayati na saṃskārā aśāntā iti yojayati, na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati, na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati, na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati na vijñānam
K02psp_1u:833: anātmeti yojayati, na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti yojayati na vijñānam aśāntam iti
K02psp_1u:834: yojayati, na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti yojayati na rūpam aśūnyam iti yojayati, na rūpaṃ sanimittam iti vā carati na rupam animittam iti vā carati, na rūpaṃ sapraṇihitam iti vā carati na rūpam apraṇihitam iti vā carati, na vedanā śūnyā iti vā carati na vedanā aśūnyā iti vā carati, na vedanā sanimittā
K02psp_1u:835: iti vā carati na vedanā animittā iti vā carati, na vedanā sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na vedanā apraṇihitā iti vā carati, na saṃjñā śūnyā iti vā carati na saṃjñā aśūnyā iti vā carati, na saṃjñā sanimittā iti vā carati
K02psp_1u:836: na saṃjñā animittā iti vā carati, na saṃjñā sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na saṃjñā apraṇihitā iti vā carati, na saṃskārāḥ śūnyā iti vā carati na saṃskārā aśūnyā iti vā carati, na saṃskārāḥ sanimittā iti vā carati na saṃskārā animittā iti (PvsP1-1: 71) vā carati, na saṃskārāḥ sapraṇihitā
K02psp_1u:837: iti vā carati na saṃskārā apraṇihitā iti vā carati, na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vā carati na vijñānam aśūnyam iti vā carati, na vijñānaṃ sanimittam iti vā carati na vijñānam animittam iti vā carati, na vijñānaṃ sapraṇihitam iti vā carati na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vā carati, ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti nopaiti na caratīti nopaiti, carati ca na
K02psp_1u:838: carati ceti nopaiti, naiva carati na caratīti nopaiti, evaṃ caran śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:839: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ
K02psp_1u:840: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:841: carati, na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, nāvinivartanīyabhūmeḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na sattvaparipākahetoḥ kṛtaśaḥ
K02psp_1u:843: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:844: carati, na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K02psp_1u:845: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na mahāśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ
K02psp_1u:846: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:848: nātyantaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, nānavakāraśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ
K02psp_1u:851: carati, nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na bhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, nābhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ
K02psp_1u:852: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na parabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:853: carati, na tathatāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na dharmadhātoḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:854: carati, tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya saṃbhedaṃ samanupaśyati. evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na divyasya śrotrasya kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na paracittajñānasya kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:855: carati, na pūrvanivāsānusmṛteḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na ṛddhividheḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati, kuta eva bodhisattvaṃ kuta eva sarvākāraṃ sarvābhijñāḥ, evaṃ hi śāriputra
K02psp_1u:856: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:857: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:858: divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:859: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:860: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:861: cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:862: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:863: 73) divyena cakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K02psp_1u:864: sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdāṃ śroṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:865: teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ
K02psp_1u:866: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:867: cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdāṃ śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:868: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:869: cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:870: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣinasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:871: cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:872: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:873: cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:874: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti,
K02psp_1u:875: teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ
K02psp_1u:876: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:877: 74) sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān
K02psp_1u:878: śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:879: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:880: cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti, divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmīti, teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti, teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
K02psp_1u:881: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayan yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:882: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate, sarve cāsyānye 'pi laukikā ye kecit
K02psp_1u:884: ye 'pi te śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās
K02psp_1u:885: trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā
K02psp_1u:886: bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ rakṣanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṅ kārṣīt, ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti, tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:887: tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
K02psp_1u:888: ye 'pi te śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto
K02psp_1u:889: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca
K02psp_1u:890: deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā, ye ca pratyekabuddhā, ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
K02psp_1u:891: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
K02psp_1u:892: rakṣanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṅ
K02psp_1u:893: kārṣīt, ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti,
K02psp_1u:894: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
K02psp_1u:895: ye 'pi te śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto
K02psp_1u:896: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
K02psp_1u:898: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parītābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ rakṣanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid
K02psp_1u:899: antarāyaṅ kārṣīt, ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
K02psp_1u:900: ye 'pi te śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto
K02psp_1u:901: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ (PvsP1-1: 76) bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ rakṣanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid
K02psp_1u:902: antarāyaṅ kārṣīt, ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
K02psp_1u:903: ye 'pi te śāriputra uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K02psp_1u:904: buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad
K02psp_1u:905: akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
K02psp_1u:906: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
K02psp_1u:907: ye 'pi te śāriputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca
K02psp_1u:908: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
K02psp_1u:909: ye 'pi te śāriputra dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca
K02psp_1u:910: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniśṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
K02psp_1u:911: ye 'pi te śāriputra paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca
K02psp_1u:912: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniśṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
K02psp_1u:913: ye 'pi te śāriputra adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca (PvsP1-1: 77)
K02psp_1u:914: deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca
K02psp_1u:915: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti,
K02psp_1u:916: ye 'pi te śāriputra ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K02psp_1u:917: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ
K02psp_1u:918: kurvanti, mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
K02psp_1u:919: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:920: carataḥ, alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni cāmukhībhavanti sarvopapattyāyataneṣu ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayati nanu kadācid buddhair bhagavadbhir virahito bhavati, yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya iti, evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:921: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati, asti sa kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ saha saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā.
K02psp_1u:922: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati, kañcid ahaṃ kṣiprataraṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ vā na cābhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi dharmadhātur dharmadhātunābhisaṃbudhyate, evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:923: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kiñcid dharmadhātor vyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātor dharmanānākaraṇaṃ karoti, nāpy asyaivaṃ bhavati, ayaṃ dharmadhātur evaṃ
K02psp_1u:924: pratividhyate na vā pratividhyata iti, tathā hi na sa kañcid dharmaṃ
K02psp_1u:925: samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa tāṃ dharmatāṃ pratividhyed iti, tathā hi sa na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyam iti yojayati nāśūnyam iti yojayati, evaṃ hi (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:926: 78) śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti
K02psp_1u:928: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayanti, na rūpadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rūpadhātunā yojayati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātunā
K02psp_1u:930: na śrotradhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śrotradhātunā yojayati, na śabdadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śabdadhātunā yojayanti, na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayati.
K02psp_1u:931: na ghrāṇadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇadhātunā yojayanti, na gandhadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ gandhadhātunā yojayati, na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātunā
K02psp_1u:933: na jihvādhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ jihvādhātunā yojayanti, na rasadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rasadhātunā yojayati, na jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ jihvāvijñānadhātunā
K02psp_1u:935: na kāyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ kāyadhātunā yojayati, na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ spraṣṭavyadhātunā
K02psp_1u:936: yojayati, na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ
K02psp_1u:938: na manodhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manodhātunā yojayanti, na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ dharmadhātunā yojayati, na manovijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manovijñānadhātunā
K02psp_1u:939: yojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa hi śāriputra paramo yogo bodhisattvasya
K02psp_1u:940: mahāsattvasya yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ, śūnyatāyāṃ śāriputra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau patati buddhakṣetraṃ
K02psp_1u:941: pariśodhayati sattvān paripācayati kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02psp_1u:943: ye kecic chāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yogās teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitāyogo (PvsP1-1: 79) 'gra ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate varaḥ pravara uttamo 'nuttamo niruttamo 'samo 'samasamaḥ praṇīta
K02psp_1u:944: ākhyāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? niruttamo hy eṣaḥ śāriputra yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śūnyatāyoga ānimittayogo 'praṇihitayogaḥ, evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛta iti dhārayitavyaḥ,
K02psp_1u:946: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati, na cāsyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati, māṃ buddhā bhagavanto
K02psp_1u:947: vyākariṣyantīti, aham āsannībhūto vyākaraṇasyeti, ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmīti, ahaṃ sattvān paripācayiṣyāmīti, aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na viviktīkaroti, na ca dharmadhātor
K02psp_1u:948: anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret, yo vā buddhair
K02psp_1u:949: bhagavadbhir vyākriyeta anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:950: tathā hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na
K02psp_1u:951: sattvasaṃjñotpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sattvo notpadyate na nirūdhyate, anutpādānirodhadharmatvāt, yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. evaṃ caran bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:952: mahāsattvaḥ sattvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, sattvaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, sattvānupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K02psp_1u:954: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ sarvān anyān yogān abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhate, atra hi śāriputra
K02psp_1u:955: yoge caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahākaruṇām abhinirharati, mahāmaitrīm
K02psp_1u:956: abhinirharati, na ca mātsaryacittam utpādayati, na dauḥśīlyacittam utpādayati, na vyāpādacittam utpādayati, na kuśīdacittam utpādayati, na vikṣiptacittam utpādayati, na dauṣprajñācittam utpādayati.
K02psp_1u:958: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa kutaś cyuta ihopapadyate, ito vā cyutaḥ kutropapatsyate?
K02psp_1u:959: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa itaś cyuta ihaiva buddhakṣetre upapadyate, anyebhyo vā buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyutas tuṣitebhyo vā devebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate.
K02psp_1u:961: tatra śāriputra yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyutvā manuṣyāṇām eva sabhāgatāyām upapadyate, tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti, na ca kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate,
K02psp_1u:962: na cāsya dhāraṇīmukham abhimukhībhavati na ca samādhimukham,
K02psp_1u:963: yat punaḥ śāriputra evaṃ vadasi, yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaimaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate sa itaś cyutaḥ kutropapadyata iti, yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate, sa ito buddhakṣetrāc cyutaḥ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati, tatra buddhakṣetre buddhān bhagavata ārāgayiṣyati, na kadācid buddhavirahito
K02psp_1u:965: iti bodhisattvaśraddhānusārī yaḥ punaḥ śāriputrāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate tasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇi bhavanti, sa kṣipram imaṃ yogam
K02psp_1u:966: āpadyate, yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogam, tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpy amī
K02psp_1u:967: gambhīragambhīrā dharmā abhimukhībhavanti, sa paścāt prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ
K02psp_1u:968: samāpadyate, yatra yatra buddhakṣetre upapadyate tatra tatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
K02psp_1u:969: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tuṣitebhyo devebhyaś cyutvā ihopapanno bhavati tasyāpi paṭutarāṇīndriyāṇi bhavanti, avipramuṣitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ sarvadhāraṇīsamādhimukhāni cābhimukhībhavanti.
K02psp_1u:970: iti bodhisattvadharmānusārī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā vyāyacchantaḥ sattvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyabalena srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkurvanti, na ca tena manyante.
K02psp_1u:971: iti srotaāpannaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupāyakuśalā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādayanti pāramitāsu ca caranti, tena ca dhyānalābhena dīrghāyuṣkeṣu
K02psp_1u:972: deveṣūpapadyante, sacet tataś cyutvā manuṣyeṣu deveṣu copapadyante,
K02psp_1u:973: buddhāṃś ca bhagavata ārāgayiṣyanti, teṣām api dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
K02psp_1u:974: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānāni ca samāpadyante prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca caranti, te cānupāyakauśalyena dhyānāny utsṛjya kāmadhātāv upapadyante, teṣām api śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
K02psp_1u:975: iti dvitīyatṛtīyaphalapratipannakaḥ śraddhādhimuktaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpādya catvāry apramāṇāni samāpadyante, catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
K02psp_1u:976: samāpadyante, mahākāruṇikā upāyakauśalyena copapadyante, na dhyānavaśena nāpramāṇavaśena nārūpyasamāpattivaśena tatra copapadyante yatra tathāgatān
K02psp_1u:977: arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti, te punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitā ihaiva bhadrakalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K02psp_1u:978: iti dvitīyatṛtīyaphalapratipannako dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante,
K02psp_1u:981: apraṇihitasamādhiṃ samāpadyante, na ca teṣāṃ vaśena gacchanti saṃmukhībhūtāṃś (PvsP1-1: 82) ca buddhān bhagavata ārāgayitvā tatra brahmacaryaṃ caritvā punar eva tuṣitānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante, te tatra yāvad āyus tiṣṭhanti, te tatra yāvad āyuḥ sthitvā ahīnendriyāḥ
K02psp_1u:982: smṛtimantaḥ saṃprajānānā anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā ihopapattiṃ darśayitvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:983: iti sakṛdāgāmī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhino ye na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātāv upapadyante, api tu buddhakṣetreṇa
K02psp_1u:984: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti, tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ
K02psp_1u:985: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya prajñaptir apy asti.
K02psp_1u:986: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv amitam āyuḥ.
K02psp_1u:987: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ ye lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti, te tatropasaṃkramya yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatrāvasthitāḥ buddhaśabdaṃ ca
K02psp_1u:988: dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ ca sattvānāṃ saṃśrāvayanti, trayāṇāṃ ca ratnānāṃ
K02psp_1u:989: varṇaṃ bhāṣante, te tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tataś
K02psp_1u:990: cyutā yatra yatra buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti te tatra tatropapadyante.
K02psp_1u:991: ity anāgāmī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ, te copāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ
K02psp_1u:993: kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu (PvsP1-1: 83) vopapadyante sattvaparipākāya.
K02psp_1u:994: ity ayaṃ manuṣyakulaṃkulaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante, te 'py
K02psp_1u:995: upāyakauśalyabalena dhyānasamādhisamāpattivaśena vā cāturmahārājakāyikānām api devānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante, trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ
K02psp_1u:996: nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante, te tatra sthitvā sattvān paripācayanti, buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti, buddhāṃś ca bhagavata ārāgayanti.
K02psp_1u:997: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ, te tataś cyutāḥ santa upāyakauśalyena brahmaloke yāvad akaniṣṭhe upapadyante, te tatra bhavanti brahmāṇo mahābrahmāṇas teṣu brahmabhavaneṣu tiṣṭhanti, te tatra sthitvā
K02psp_1u:998: buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti, ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tāṃs tathāgatān
K02psp_1u:1000: iti devakulaṃkulaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhinas teṣāṃ cānubodhāya caranti,
K02psp_1u:1001: caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ lābhino na ca tāni pratividhyanti, te punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā veditavyāḥ.
K02psp_1u:1002: ity ekavīcikaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādāya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhavanti, caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
K02psp_1u:1006: upāyakauśalyena brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
K02psp_1u:1007: tatra cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ kurvanti.
K02psp_1u:1008: ity antarā parinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaivānuttarāṃ
K02psp_1u:1009: (PvsP1-1: 84) samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante, dharmacakraṃ pravartayanty aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā nirūpadhiśeṣe
K02psp_1u:1010: nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti, teṣāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:1012: ity upapadyaparinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti, tatra ca sattvān bodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti, te nityam udyuktāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na kadācid anarthasaṃhitāṃ vācaṃ
K02psp_1u:1013: bhāṣante, sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo nityam udyuktā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
K02psp_1u:1014: saṃkrāmanti, te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyair
K02psp_1u:1015: aprameyaiḥ kalpair nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1016: ity abhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmanti, avinivartanīyabhūmau vāvatiṣṭhante,
K02psp_1u:1018: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyante, te 'nekair
K02psp_1u:1019: bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya saṃkrāmanti, nānābuddhakṣetreṣu cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1020: ity anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carantaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānapāramitāṃ puraskṛtya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhariṣyanti, annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ
