K02psp_1u:1021: pānārthikebhyaḥ, evaṃ gandhamālyavilepanacūrṇadhūpaśayanāsanopāśrayagṛhadhanadhānyamaṇimuktāsuvarṇarūpyapravāḍābharaṇāni jīvitopakaraṇāni upasaṃhariṣyanti, yāvad daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu sattvān
K02psp_1u:1022: pratiṣṭhāpya brahmakāyikeṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyamānā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1023: ity akaniṣṭhaparamaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādya dhyānebhyaḥ parihīṇāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam āsādya brahmakāyikeṣu
K02psp_1u:1024: deveṣūpapadyante, te punar dhyānāni niṣpādyākaniṣṭheṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1025: iti plutaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye brahmalokāc cyutvā
K02psp_1u:1026: śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyante, te śuddhāvāsānām ekaṃ vā dve vā sthāne vilaṅghyākaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1027: ity ardhaplutaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathāgatasadṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya tuṣitabhavanaṃ pariśodhya brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyopāyakauśalyena nairayikāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
K02psp_1u:1028: deśayanti, tiryagyonigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti, yāmalaukikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
K02psp_1u:1029: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā yādṛśas tathāgatakāyas tādṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti, tathāgatāṃś ca paryupāsate, buddhakṣetraṃ ca niṣpādayanti, dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti, evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām ūrdhvam adhaḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ adiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti, buddhakṣetrāṇi ca niṣpādayanti, buddhāṃś ca paryupāsate, dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti, te tebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo nirmitāni nirmāya śreṣṭhāni viśiṣṭāny anuttarāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi niṣpādayanti,
K02psp_1u:1030: ekajātipratibaddhāś ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra tatra buddhakṣetreṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02psp_1u:1033: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dhyānārūpyasamāpattīr āsādayanto brahmakāyikeṣu yāvac chubhakṛtsneṣu deveṣūpapadyante, tatra ākāśānantyāyatane yāvad bhavāgre upapadyante, tato
K02psp_1u:1035: iti bhavāgraparamaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas ta ākāśānantyāyatane yāvad bhavāgre upapadyante, tato
K02psp_1u:1037: iti rūpavītarāgaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtamūrtayo niruttaraiḥ pariśuddhair indriyaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavanti, te taiḥ pariśuddhair indriyaiḥ samanvāgatā bahujanasya priyāś ca bhavanti, manaāpāś ca ye punaḥ sattvās tān
K02psp_1u:1038: bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyanti, te tenaiva cittaprasādenānupūrveṇa
K02psp_1u:1039: tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti, evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāyapariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ vākpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ manaḥpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:1040: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranta uttaptānīndriyāṇi pratilabhante, te tair uttaptair indriyair nātmānam utkarṣayanti na parān paṃsayanti.
K02psp_1u:1041: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā naivaṃ kadācid apāyadurgativinipāteṣūpapadyante yāvad avinivartanīyabhūmim
K02psp_1u:1043: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu daśakuśalān karmapathān utsṛjanti, yāvad avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim
K02psp_1u:1045: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā rājānaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānaṃ sattvebhyo dattvā tān eva daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K02psp_1u:1046: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā anekāni cakravartirājyaśatāni parigṛhṇanti, (PvsP1-1: 87) anekāni cakravartirājyaśatasahasrāṇi parigṛhṇanti, tatra sthitvā anekāni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ārāgayanti, tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti, tato 'nuttarāṃ
K02psp_1u:1048: iti dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaś caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaś catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas te tābhir vikrīḍantaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:1049: samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ
K02psp_1u:1050: samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ
K02psp_1u:1051: samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ
K02psp_1u:1052: samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpadyante, tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante.
K02psp_1u:1053: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyenāvaskandakena samādhiṃ samāpadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1054: iti kāyasākṣī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sattvānāṃ buddhadharmāvabhāsaṃ kurvanti, ātmanāpi buddhadharmāvabhāsenāvirahitā bhavanti, yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02psp_1u:1056: ity arhattvapratipannakaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'buddhakeṣu lokadhātuṣu apagataśrāvakeṣu pratyekāṃ bodhim abhisaṃbudhyante, ta upāyakauśalyena (PvsP1-1: 88) bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu yāneṣu paripācyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1057: iti pratyekabuddhaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāṇāṃ lābhino daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ, na ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuvanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ
K02psp_1u:1058: nārhattvaṃ prāpnuvanti, na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prāpnuvanti, te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena sarvasattvān mārge 'vatārya
K02psp_1u:1060: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpayanti, arhattvaṃ prāpayanti, pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpayanti, svayam asākṣātkurvantaḥ parāṃs tatra pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K02psp_1u:1061: iti śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgalabhyāni phalāni yac chāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sānutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_1u:1063: iti svayam aprāpte dharme parapratiṣṭhāpanam amī śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā veditavyāḥ, ye 'nayā
K02psp_1u:1065: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā tuṣitabhavanaṃ viśodhayanti, te khalu punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhadrakalpikā veditavyāḥ, amī śāriputrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣām ayam udayo buddhadharmeṣu tasmāt tarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena
K02psp_1u:1066: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sāvadyasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo 'vakāśo na dātavyaḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhaye ca śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:1068: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: katamad bhagavan sāvadyaṃ kāyakarma sāvadyaṃ vākkarma sāvadyaṃ manaskarma?
K02psp_1u:1069: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: iha śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati, katamaḥ sa kāyaḥ, yena kāyena kāyakarma samārabheya, katamā sā vāg, yayā vākkarma samārabheya, katamat tan manaḥ, yena manaskarma samārabheya? evam upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kāyam
K02psp_1u:1070: upalabhate, vācam upalabhate, mana upalabhate, ayaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmasamārambhaḥ sāvadyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:1071: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyam upalabhate, na vācam upalabhate, na mana upalabhate, yena kāyena vācā manasā mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādakausīdyavikṣepadauṣprajñacittam
K02psp_1u:1072: utpādayet. asthānam etac chāriputrānavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1073: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyam utpādayet, naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu
K02psp_1u:1074: pāramitāsu caran kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ śodhayati, vāgdauṣṭhulyaṃ śodhayati,
K02psp_1u:1076: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyaṃ śodhayati?
K02psp_1u:1077: bhagavān āha: yataḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāyam upalabhate,
K02psp_1u:1078: na vācam upalabhate, na mana upalabhate.
K02psp_1u:1079: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyaṃ
K02psp_1u:1080: śodhayati, sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā anuvartante, na ca śrāvakacittaṃ pratyekabuddhacittaṃ cotpādayati, satatasamitaṃ cāsya sarvasattveṣu mahākāruṇācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. evaṃ hi śāriputra
K02psp_1u:1081: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyaṃ śuddham iti vadāmi.
K02psp_1u:1082: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayanto dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti, śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:1085: śāriputra āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ (PvsP1-1: 90)
K02psp_1u:1087: bhagavān āha: yadā śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kāyam upalabhate, na vācam upalabhate, na mana upalabhate, na dānapāramitām upalabhate, na śīlapāramitām upalabhate, na kṣāntipāramitām upalabhate, na vīryapāramitām upalabhate, na dhyānapāramitām upalabhate,
K02psp_1u:1088: na prajñāpāramitām upalabhate, na śrāvakam upalabhate, na pratyekabuddham upalabhate, na bodhisattvam upalabhate, na buddham upalabhate. ayaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yad uta sarvadharmānupalambho 'nena mārgeṇa gacchan bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran na śakyo 'vamarditum.
K02psp_1u:1089: ity aśaktyavavādaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran na rūpaṃ manyate, na vedanāṃ manyate, na saṃjñāṃ manyate, na saṃskārān manyate, na vijñanaṃ manyate, na pṛthivīdhātuṃ manyate, nābdhātuṃ manyate,
K02psp_1u:1090: na tejodhatuṃ manyate, na vāyudhātuṃ manyate, nākāśadhātuṃ manyate, na vijñānadhatuṃ manyate, na cakṣurdhātuṃ manyate, na rūpadhātuṃ manyate, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ manyate, na śrotradhātuṃ manyate, na śabdadhātuṃ manyate, na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ manyate, na ghrāṇadhātuṃ manyate, na gandhadhātuṃ manyate, na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ manyate, na jihvādhātuṃ manyate, na rasadhātuṃ manyate, na jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ manyate, na kāyadhātuṃ manyate, na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ manyate, na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manyate, na manodhātuṃ manyate, na dharmadhātuṃ manyate, na manovijñānadhātuṃ manyate, na smṛtyupasthānāni manyate, na samyakprahāṇāni manyate, narddhipādān manyate, nendriyāṇi manyate, na balāni manyate, na bodhyaṅgāni manyate, na mārgaṃ manyate, na dānapāramitāṃ manyate, na śīlapāramitāṃ manyate, na kṣāntipāramitāṃ manyate, na vīryapāramitāṃ manyate, na dhyānapāramitāṃ manyate, na prajñāpāramitāṃ manyate, na vaiśāradyāni manyate, na pratisaṃvido manyate, na daśatathāgatabalāni manyate, nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān manyate, na srotaāpattiphalaṃ manyate, na sakṛdāgamiphalaṃ manyate, nānāgāmiphalaṃ manyate, nārhattvaṃ
K02psp_1u:1091: manyate, na pratyekabodhiṃ manyate, na (PvsP1-1: 91) bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ manyate, nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ manyate. evaṃ hi śāriputra
K02psp_1u:1092: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir vardhate, na ca kenacid
K02psp_1u:1094: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayanti, yena jñānena samanvāgatānāṃ sarvāṇy apāyadvārāṇi pithitāni bhavanti, nāpi manuṣyadāridryavipattim anubhavanti,
K02psp_1u:1095: nāpi tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇanti, yena nindyā bhavanti sadevakasya
K02psp_1u:1097: ity apariśrāntyavavādaḥ śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_1u:1099: bhagavān āha: yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ
K02psp_1u:1100: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyati teṣāṃ ca dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti, saṃghaṃ ca paryupāste,
K02psp_1u:1101: buddhakṣetraviśuddhiṃ ca paśyati, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyati, teṣāṃ ca dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti, saṃghaṃ ca paryupāste, buddhakṣetraviśuddhiṃ ca paśyati,
K02psp_1u:1102: yena jñānena samanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na buddhasaṃjñā
K02psp_1u:1103: bhavati, na bodhisaṃjñā bhavati, na śrāvakasaṃjñā bhavati, na pratyekabuddhasaṃjñā bhavati, nātmasaṃjñā bhavati, na parasaṃjñā bhavati,
K02psp_1u:1104: na buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā bhavati, yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahasattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati, śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K02psp_1u:1106: carati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na ca pāramitāmupalabhate,
K02psp_1u:1107: yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ smṛtyupasthānāni
K02psp_1u:1110: balavaiśāradyāveṇikān (PvsP1-1: 92) buddhadharmān samudānayati, na ca balavaiśāradyāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhate. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya jñānaṃ, yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmāṃś ca paripūrayati, na ca sarvabuddhadharmāṃś
K02psp_1u:1112: iti pratipatsaṃparigrahāvavādaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye pañcacakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante
K02psp_1u:1113: pariśodhayanti, katamāni pañca yad uta māṃsacakṣuḥ divyacakṣuḥ
K02psp_1u:1115: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ?
K02psp_1u:1116: bhagavān āha: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣuḥ, yad yojanaśataṃ paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yad yojanaśatadvayaṃ paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya
K02psp_1u:1117: mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yaj jaṃbudvīpaṃ paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yac cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ
K02psp_1u:1118: paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat
K02psp_1u:1119: sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yad dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ
K02psp_1u:1120: lokadhātuṃ paśyati. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ.
K02psp_1u:1121: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ divyacakṣuḥ?
K02psp_1u:1122: bhagavān āha: yac chāriputra cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus
K02psp_1u:1123: tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte, yat trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad
K02psp_1u:1124: bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte, yad yāmānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1125: prajānīte, yat tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
K02psp_1u:1126: yan nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte, yat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
K02psp_1u:1127: yad brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
K02psp_1u:1128: yad brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
K02psp_1u:1129: yan mahābrahmaṇāṃ devānāṃ (PvsP1-1: 93) divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1130: prajānīte, yat parīttābhānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1131: prajānīte, yad apramāṇābhānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1132: prajānīte, yad ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1133: prajānīte, yac chubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1134: prajānīte, yad anabrakānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1135: prajānīte, yat puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1136: prajānīte, yad bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1137: prajānīte, yad asaṃjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1138: prajānīte, yac chuddhābhāsānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:1139: prajānīte, yad aspṛhāṇāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
K02psp_1u:1140: yad atapānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte, yat sudṛśānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte, yat sudarśānānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte, yad akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tadbodhisattvaḥ prajānīte.
K02psp_1u:1141: yat punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya divyaṃ cakṣus tac cāturmahārājakāyikā devā na prajānanti, na trayastriṃśā devāḥ prajānanti,
K02psp_1u:1142: na yāmā devāḥ prajānanti, na tuṣitā devāḥ prajānanti, na nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajānanti, na paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajānanti, na brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajānanti, na brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajānanti, na mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajānanti, na parīttabhā devāḥ prajānanti,
K02psp_1u:1143: nāpramāṇābhā devāḥ prajānanti, nābhāsvarā devāḥ prajānanti, na parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajānanti, nāpramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajānanti, na śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajānanti, nānabhrakā devāḥ prajānanti, na puṇyaprasavā devāḥ prajānanti, na bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajānanti, nāsaṃjñisattvā devāḥ prajānanti, na śuddhāvāsā devāḥ prajānanti, nāspṛhādevāḥ prajānanti,
K02psp_1u:1144: nātapā devāḥ prajānanti, na sudṛśā devāḥ prajānanti, na sudarśanā devāḥ
K02psp_1u:1145: prajānanti, yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya divyaṃ cakṣus tad akaniṣṭhā devā na prajānanti.
K02psp_1u:1146: tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K02psp_1u:1148: prajānāti, tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:1149: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:1150: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi
K02psp_1u:1151: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, evam uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, adho diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K02psp_1u:1152: lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ.
K02psp_1u:1153: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ?
K02psp_1u:1154: bhagavān āha: yena śāriputra prajñācakṣuṣā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kañcid dharmaṃ prajānāti, saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā sāvadyaṃ vā anavadyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vā anāsravaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ
K02psp_1u:1155: vā niṣkleśaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃkliṣṭaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā,
K02psp_1u:1156: yena prajñācakṣuṣā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kaścid dharmo na dṛṣṭo na śruto na mato na vijñātaḥ. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ,
K02psp_1u:1157: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ?
K02psp_1u:1158: bhagavān āha: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmacakṣuṣaivaṃ jānāti, ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śraddhānusārī, ayaṃ pudgalo dharmānusārī, (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:1159: 95) ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śūnyatāvihārī, ayaṃ pudgalo 'nimittavihārī, ayaṃ pudgalo 'praṇihitavihārī.
K02psp_1u:1160: ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śūnyatāvihārī, asya pudgalasya śūnyatāvimokṣamukheṇa
K02psp_1u:1163: vimuktijñānadarśanena trīṇi saṃyojanāni prahāsyati, satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāṃ ceti, ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ srotaāpannaḥ, sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvād ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ
K02psp_1u:1165: kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇād ayam ucyate pudgalo 'nāgāmī, sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ mānam auddhatyaṃ ca prahāyāyam ucyate pudgalo 'rhan.
K02psp_1u:1166: ayaṃ pudgalo 'nimittavihārī, asya pudgalasyānimittavimokṣamukhena pañcendriyāṇy utpatsyante, pañcabhir indriyair ānantaryasamādhiṃ prakṣyati ānantaryeṇa samādhinā vimuktijñānadarśanam utpādayiṣyati,
K02psp_1u:1167: vimuktijñānadarśanena trīṇi saṃyojanāni prahāsyati, satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāṃ ceti, ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ srotaāpannaḥ, sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvād ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ
K02psp_1u:1169: kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇād ayam ucyate pudgalo 'nāgāmī, sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ mānam auddhatyaṃ ca prahāyāyam ucyate pudgalo 'rhan.
K02psp_1u:1170: ayaṃ pudgalo 'praṇihitavihārī, asya pudgalasyāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhena pañcendriyāṇy utpatsyante, pañcabhir indriyair ānantaryasamādhiṃ
K02psp_1u:1172: vimuktijñānadarśanena trīṇi saṃyojanāni prahāsyati, satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāṃ ceti, ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ srotaāpannaḥ, sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvādayam ucyate pudgalaḥ
K02psp_1u:1175: tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ mānam auddhatyaṃ ca prahāyāyam ucyate pudgalo 'rhan. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
K02psp_1u:1176: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti, yat kiñcit samudayadharmī sarvaṃ tan nirodhadharmīti prajānāti, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcendriyāṇi prāpnoti. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
K02psp_1u:1177: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti, ayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādiko yo dānapāramitāyāṃ vā carati,
K02psp_1u:1178: śīlapāramitāyāṃ vā carati, sa tataḥ śuddhendriyaṃ pratilabhate,
K02psp_1u:1179: vīryendriyaṃ ca, sa upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ
K02psp_1u:1180: parigṛhṇāti, kuśalamūlopalambhaś ca bhavati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣūpapatsyate,
K02psp_1u:1181: ayaṃ gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ trayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ yāmeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, ayan tuṣiteṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, ayaṃ yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapatsyate, sa tatra sthitvā sattvān paripācayiṣyati,
K02psp_1u:1182: sarvasukhopadhānena ca sattvān pratyupasthāsyati, buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiśyati, tathāgatāṃś cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyati,
K02psp_1u:1183: satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nivartate yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti. idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
K02psp_1u:1184: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti, amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, amī bodhisattvā na
K02psp_1u:1185: vyākṛtā, amī bodhisattvā avinivartanīyāḥ, amī bodhisattvā nāvinivartanīyāḥ, eṣāṃ bodhisattvānām abhijñāḥ paripūrṇāḥ, eṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na paripūrṇāḥ, ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā tathāgatān
K02psp_1u:1187: pūjayati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo nābhijñāparipūrṇo yāvan na pūjayati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'bhijñānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo nābhijñānāṃ
K02psp_1u:1188: lābhī bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpariśuddhaṃ
K02psp_1u:1189: buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati, anena bodhisattvena sattvāḥ pariśodhitāḥ, anena bodhisattvena sattvā na pariśodhitāḥ, asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_1u:1190: buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante, asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na
K02psp_1u:1191: bhāṣante, amī bodhisattvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyanti,
K02psp_1u:1192: amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāsannasthāyino bhaviṣyanti, asya bodhisattvasya parimitam āyur bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasyāparimitam āyur bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasya parimitaḥ saṃgho bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasyāparimitaḥ saṃgho bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na
K02psp_1u:1193: bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāṃ
K02psp_1u:1194: cariṣyati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na duṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣyati, ayaṃ bodhisattvaś caramabhavikaḥ, ayaṃ bodhisattvo na caramabhavikaḥ, ayaṃ bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyate, ayaṃ bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe na
K02psp_1u:1195: niṣatsyate, asya bodhisattvasya māro bhaviṣyati, asya bodhisattvasya na
K02psp_1u:1196: māro bhaviṣyati. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
K02psp_1u:1197: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhacakṣuḥ?
K02psp_1u:1198: bhagavān āha: yac chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicittānantaraṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti, daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataḥ,
K02psp_1u:1199: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgataḥ, yena ca cakṣuṣā
K02psp_1u:1200: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāsti kiñcid adṛṣṭaṃ vāśrutaṃ (PvsP1-1: 98)
K02psp_1u:1201: vāmataṃ vāvijñātaṃ vā sarvair ākāraiḥ. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ
K02psp_1u:1202: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcacakṣūṃṣi śodhayitukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra
K02psp_1u:1203: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarve kuśalā dharmā antargatāḥ sarvaśrāvakadharmāś ca sarvapratyekabuddhadharmāś ca bodhisattvadharmāś ca, yat khalu śāriputra
K02psp_1u:1204: samyag vadanto vadeyuḥ sarvakuśaladharmasaṃgraha iti prajñāpāramitāṃ khalu samyag vadantovadeyuḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarvāsāṃ pāramitānām, eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ bodhisattvacakṣuṣām, eṣu ca śāriputra pañcasu bodhisattvacakṣuḥṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K02psp_1u:1205: iti pañcacakṣur avavādaḥ atra śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, so 'nekavidham ṛddhividhiṃ pratyanubhavati,
K02psp_1u:1206: pṛthivīm api kampayati, eko 'pi bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati, bahudhāpi bhūtvā eko bhavati, āvirbhāvaṃ tirobhāvam api pratyanubhavati, tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāraṃ tiraḥparvatam apy asakto gacchati tadyathāpi nāmākāśe 'pi
K02psp_1u:1207: krāmati tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ, pṛthivyām apy unmajjanimajjaṃ
K02psp_1u:1208: karoti tadyathāpi nāmodake, udake 'bhidyamāno gacchati tadyathāpi nāma
K02psp_1u:1209: pṛthivyām, dhūmāyaty api prajjalaty api tadyathāpi nāma mahān
K02psp_1u:1210: agniskandhaḥ, udakam api kāyāt pramuñcati tadyathāpi nāma mahāmeghaḥ, imāv api sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi yāvad brahmalokād api kāyaṃ vaśena vartayati, tayā ca ṛddhyā na
K02psp_1u:1211: manyate, tathā hi satām ṛddhiṃ nopalabhate yayā manyate tad api na manyate yenāpi manyate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya, svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya,
K02psp_1u:1212: svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya, sa na ṛddhicetanām apy utpādayati na
K02psp_1u:1213: ṛddhyabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā anyatra sarvajñatā manasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ṛddhividhyabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam (PvsP1-1: 99) abhinirharati.
K02psp_1u:1214: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakāṃś ca, na ca tena divyena śrotreṇa manyate, ahaṃ śabdān śṛṇomi, tathā hi sa tarn api śabdaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya
K02psp_1u:1215: svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya, sa na divyaśrotracetanām apy utpādayati, na divyaśrotrābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatra sarvākārajñatāmanaskārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaśrotrābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
K02psp_1u:1216: sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K02psp_1u:1217: sarāgacittaṃ sarāgacittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, sadoṣaṃ cittaṃ sadoṣaṃ
K02psp_1u:1218: cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, vītadoṣaṃ cittaṃ vītadoṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, samohaṃ cittaṃ samohaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ
K02psp_1u:1219: prajānāti, vītamohaṃ cittaṃ vītamohaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K02psp_1u:1220: satṛṣṇaṃ cittaṃ satṛṣṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, vīatatṛṣṇaṃ cittaṃ vītatṛṣṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, sopādānaṃ cittaṃ sopādānaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, nirūpādānaṃ cittaṃ nirūpādānaṃ
K02psp_1u:1221: cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ
K02psp_1u:1222: prajānāti, parīttaṃ cittaṃ parīttaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K02psp_1u:1223: vipulaṃ cittaṃ vipulaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, mahadgataṃ cittaṃ mahadgataṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ samāhitaṃ
K02psp_1u:1224: cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, asamāhitaṃ cittam asamāhitaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, viviktaṃ cittaṃ viviktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ
K02psp_1u:1225: prajānāti, aviviktaṃ cittam aviviktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K02psp_1u:1226: sāsravaṃ cittaṃ sāsravaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, anāsravaṃ cittam anāsravaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, sāṅgaṇaṃ cittaṃ sāṅgaṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, anaṅgaṇaṃ cittam anaṅgaṇaṃ
K02psp_1u:1227: cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, sottaraṃ (PvsP1-1: 100) cittaṃ sottaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, anuttaraṃ cittam anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, tena ca na manyate, tathā hi tac cittam acittam acintyatām upādāya, so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na manyate, tad eva cittaṃ
K02psp_1u:1228: nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya, svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya, na sa paracittacetanām apy utpādayati, na paracittābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatrasarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvacittacaritābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
K02psp_1u:1229: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena sa ekām api jātim anusmarati, dve tisro yāvaj
K02psp_1u:1230: jātiśatasahasrāṇy apy anusmarati, sa ekam api cittam anusmarati yāvac
K02psp_1u:1231: cittaśatam api, ekam api divasaṃ divasaśatam api, ekam api māsaṃ māsaśatam
K02psp_1u:1232: api, ekam api varṣaṃ varṣaśatam api, ekam api kalpaṃ kalpaśatam api,
K02psp_1u:1233: anekāni api kalpaśatāny anekāny api kalpasahasrāṇy anekāny api kalpaśatasahasrāṇy anekāny api kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anusmarati yāvat pūrvāntakoṭīm apy anusmarati, amutrāham āsam evaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātir evamāhāra evaṃcirasthitikaḥ, evamāyuṣparyantaḥ, sa tataś cyuto
K02psp_1u:1234: 'mutropapannaḥ, tataś cyuta ihāsmy upapanna iti, sa evaṃ sākāraṃ sādṛśaṃ sanirdeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati, tena ca pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhijñānena na manyate, tathā hi tajjñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya, so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na manyate, sa tad eva jñānaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya
K02psp_1u:1235: svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya, na sa pūrvanivāsānusmṛticetanām apy
K02psp_1u:1237: sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtisākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
K02psp_1u:1238: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānān utpadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatau durgatau yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti, amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ (PvsP1-1: 101)
K02psp_1u:1239: kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāksucaritena samanvāgatāḥ manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ, āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ tena kāyavāṅmanaḥsucaritena hetunā sugatau svargaloka upapadyante.
K02psp_1u:1240: ime punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ, vāgduścaritena
K02psp_1u:1241: samanvāgatāḥ, manoduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ, āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ
K02psp_1u:1243: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmadhātuparame ākāśadhātuparyavasāne ṣaḍgatikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
K02psp_1u:1244: tena ca na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur acintyatām upādāya, so 'haṃ
K02psp_1u:1245: paśyāmīti na manyate, tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
K02psp_1u:1246: svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya, svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya, na sa divyacakṣuścetanām apy utpādayati, na divyacakṣurabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā
K02psp_1u:1248: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati, so
K02psp_1u:1249: 'nutpādasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānam abhinirharati, na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati, nāpy anyaṃ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsati anyatrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyamīti, sa tayā āsravakṣaya
K02psp_1u:1250: sākṣātkriyābhijñājñānābhinirhārakuśalatayā na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya, so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na manyate, tad eva ca
K02psp_1u:1251: jñānaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya, na sa āsravakṣayacetanām apy utpādayati nāsravakṣayābhijñābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt.
K02psp_1u:1252: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam
K02psp_1u:1253: evaṃ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ paripūryante pariśudhyante ca, abhijñāḥ (PvsP1-1: 102)
K02psp_1u:1255: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1257: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1259: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1261: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1263: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1265: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1267: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
K02psp_1u:1268: atyantaśūnyatām upādāya, dānaṃ parigrahatām upādāya prajñapyate, śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyam upādāya prajñapyate, kṣāntir akṣāntitām upādāya prajñapyate,
K02psp_1u:1269: vīryaṃ kauśīdyam upādāya prajñapyate, samādhir asamāhitatām upādāya
K02psp_1u:1270: prajñapyate, prajñā dauṣprajñam upādāya prajñapyate, sa tīrṇa iti na
K02psp_1u:1271: manyate, na tīrṇa iti na manyate, dānaṃ parigraha iti na manyate, śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyam iti na manyate, kṣāntiḥ kṣobha iti na manyate, vīryaṃ kauśīdyam iti na manyate, samādhir asamāhiteti na manyate, prajñādauṣprajñam iti na
K02psp_1u:1272: manyate, ākruṣṭo 'ham iti na manyate, vandito 'ham iti na manyate, satkṛto
K02psp_1u:1273: 'ham iti na manyate, asatkṛto 'ham iti na manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śāriputra anutpāda ākruṣṭo 'ham iti manyate, (PvsP1-1: 103) vandito 'ham
K02psp_1u:1274: iti manyate, satkṛto 'ham iti manyate, asatkṛto 'ham iti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā sarvamananāḥ samucchinatti, iha śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato ye guṇā bhavanti na te sarve śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante, sa imān guṇān
K02psp_1u:1275: paripūrayan sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
K02psp_1u:1276: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādayati, sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādya sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhate, sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhya sarvasattvān sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati, sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca,
K02psp_1u:1277: sarvabodhisattvānāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakānāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca, sa yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣā amanaāpāni rūpāṇi paśyati, na śrotreṇāmanaāpān śabdān śṛṇoti, na ghrāṇenāmanaāpān gandhāñ jighrati, na jihvayāmanaāpān rasān āsvādayati, na kāyenāmanaāpān sparśān spṛśati, na manasāmanaāpān dharmān vijānāti, na ca parihīyate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K02psp_1u:1278: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trīṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni bhagavantaṃ yathāvṛtaiś cīvarair abhicchādayāmāsur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayāmāsuḥ. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
K02psp_1u:1279: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ samutthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya
K02psp_1u:1280: prādurbhāvāya, nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti?
K02psp_1u:1281: bhagavān āha: etāny ānanda trīṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe
K02psp_1u:1282: mahāketunāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpatsyante,
K02psp_1u:1283: tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutāni santi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre upapatsyate, ṣaṣṭiś ca devaputrasahasrāṇi
K02psp_1u:1284: (PvsP1-1: 104) yāni yāny anayā dharmadeśanayā paripācitāni tāni tāni maitreyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike parinirvāsyanti.
K02psp_1u:1285: atha khalu bhagavato 'nubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma, catasraḥ pariṣado bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ
K02psp_1u:1286: parṣanmaṇḍalād, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti, paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti, uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti,
K02psp_1u:1287: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti, pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti, dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti,
K02psp_1u:1288: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti, adha ūrdhvam ekaikasyāṃ
K02psp_1u:1289: diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti, mahato buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyanti, na ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti yān daśasu
K02psp_1u:1290: dikṣu teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti sma.
K02psp_1u:1291: atha khalu bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalād daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ praṇidhānāni kṛtāni vayaṃ tāni puṇyāni kariṣyāmo yaiḥ puṇyair eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmaha iti.
K02psp_1u:1292: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
K02psp_1u:1293: ānanda āha: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya?
K02psp_1u:1294: bhagavān āha: paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi.
K02psp_1u:1296: bhagavān āha: etāny ānanda daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi itaś cyutāni teṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣūpapatsyante, na ca kadācit tathāgatavirahitāni
K02psp_1u:1297: bhaviṣyanti, tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas tathāgatā loke utpatsyante.
K02psp_1u:1298: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapaḥ, ete cānye ca saṃbahulā abhijñātā abhijñātā bhikṣavo bodhisattvāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca bhagavantam etad avocan: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ
K02psp_1u:1300: viśiṣṭapāramiteyaṃ pravarapāramiteyam anuttarapāramiteyaṃ niruttarapāramiteyaṃ asamapāramiteyaṃ ākāśapāramiteyaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ sarvaguṇasamanvāgatapāramiteyaṃ,
K02psp_1u:1301: anavamardanīyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta
K02psp_1u:1303: atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caradbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvair asamasamaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tair asamasamā dānapāramitā paripūritā, tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K02psp_1u:1304: tair asamasamaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ, tair asamasamā śīlapāramitā paripūritā,
K02psp_1u:1305: tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K02psp_1u:1306: tair asamasamā kṣāntir bhāvitā, tair asamasamā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā,
K02psp_1u:1307: tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K02psp_1u:1308: tair asamasamaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ, tair asamasamā vīryapāramitā paripūritā,
K02psp_1u:1309: tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K02psp_1u:1310: tair asamasamaṃ dhyānam utpāditaṃ, tair asamasamā dhyānapāramitā
K02psp_1u:1311: paripūritā, tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, te 'samasamasya
K02psp_1u:1312: dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K02psp_1u:1313: tair asamasamā prajñā bhāvitā, tair asamasamā prajñāpāramitā paripūritā,
K02psp_1u:1314: tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K02psp_1u:1315: atraiva ca tvaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asamasamasya rūpasya lābhī jāto 'samasamāyā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām asamasamasya vijñānasya lābhī jāto 'samasamāṃ bodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'samasamaṃ
K02psp_1u:1317: evam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'traiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante ca abhisaṃbudhyante ca, tasmāt tarhi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ (PvsP1-1: 106)
K02psp_1u:1318: pāraṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ
K02psp_1u:1319: karaṇīyaḥ, namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'syāṃ
K02psp_1u:1321: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān saṃbahulān śrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān etad
K02psp_1u:1322: avocat: evam etat kulaputra evam etat, namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā
K02psp_1u:1323: mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti.
K02psp_1u:1324: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya lokasya loke prādurbhāvo
K02psp_1u:1326: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulānāṃ gṛhapatimahāśālakulānāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ yāmānāṃ devānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ mahābrahmāṇāṃ devānāṃ parīttābhānāṃ devānām apramāṇābhānāṃ devānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ devānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānām anabhrakānāṃ devānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ devānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ śuddhābhāsānāṃ devānām aspṛhāṇāṃ devānām atapānāṃ devānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ devānāṃ sudarśanānāṃ devānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānām ākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānāṃ devānām ākiñcānyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
K02psp_1u:1327: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, laukikānāṃ ca sarvajīvitopakaraṇānām annapānavastraśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariskārāṇāṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
K02psp_1u:1328: bhavati, yāvac chāriputra sarvasukhopadhānāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāṃ ca
K02psp_1u:1329: bhavasukhānāṃ ca nirvāṇasukhānāṃ ca (PvsP1-1: 107) loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, sarvaśaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvam āgamya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:1330: bodhisattvo hi śāriputra caryāñ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sattvān niyojayati,
K02psp_1u:1331: dānaṃ dāpayati śīlaṃ samādāpayati kṣāntyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryaṃ niyojayati dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāyāṃ niyojayati, sarve ca sattvā
K02psp_1u:1332: bodhisattvam āgamya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti, tasmāc chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāya pratipanno bhavati.
K02psp_1u:1333: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirnāmayitvā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa.
K02psp_1u:1334: atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo niśceruḥ,
K02psp_1u:1335: niḥsṛtya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ, paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān
K02psp_1u:1338: lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ, pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ, dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ,
K02psp_1u:1343: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ yāvad ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvās tān prabhāvyūhān dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti sma: kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam eva prabhāvabhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate?
K02psp_1u:1344: te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān evam āhuḥ: eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścime yāvad adho digbhāge sahāyāṃ lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddḥs tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, tena jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā iokadhātavo
K02psp_1u:1345: (PvsP1-1: 108) 'vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yāvad ūrdhvaṃ diśi, evaṃ daśasu dikṣu
K02psp_1u:1348: te bodhisattvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhuḥ: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya, tāṃś ca daśadiksaṃnipatitān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃs tāṃ
K02psp_1u:1350: te buddhā bhagavanta āhuḥ: gacchata kulaputrā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyadhvam.
K02psp_1u:1351: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśabhyo digbhyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr gṛhītvā nānāratnasuvarṇarūpyapuṣpapuṭāni ca gṛhītvā mahatyā tūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītyā bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan.
K02psp_1u:1352: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmapurohitā devā mahābrahmāṇo devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā anabhrakā devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhābhāsā devā aspṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā utpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravakesaratamālapatrāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāman.
K02psp_1u:1353: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma.
K02psp_1u:1354: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi vaihāyasam abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātor upariṣṭāt puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt catusthūṇaś caturasro bhāgataḥ suvibhakto ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ.
K02psp_1u:1355: atha khalu tataḥ parṣadaḥ prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ (PvsP1-1: 109)
K02psp_1u:1356: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02psp_1u:1357: vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate 'dhvani evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, evaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ parikarṣema evaṃ ca parṣadi dharmaṃ deśayema yac caitarhi tathāgato bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02psp_1u:1358: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āsayaṃ viditvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyānabhisaṃskārāyāprādurbhāvāya kṣāntiṃ viditvā smitam
K02psp_1u:1359: akarot. atha tato 'nekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārān niścaritās te sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar evāgatā bhagavato mūrdhany antardhīyante sma.
K02psp_1u:1360: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ janumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya
K02psp_1u:1362: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat: etad ānanda prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram aṣṭaṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭībhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpatsyante puṣpākare kalpe.
K02psp_1u:1363: iti ṣaḍabhijñāvavādaḥ atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
K02psp_1u:1364: pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya yathā bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāyur iti.
K02psp_1u:1365: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat, kiṃ nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ svakena
K02psp_1u:1366: prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty utāho
K02psp_1u:1367: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: yat kiñcid (PvsP1-1: 110) āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanty
K02psp_1u:1368: upadiśanti sarvaḥ sa tathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:1369: yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇās tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtvā yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaṃ tad dharmatayā na virudhyate, tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputra upāyayogena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati, aviṣayo 'tra śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadeṣṭum.
K02psp_1u:1370: iti darśanamārgāvavādopakṣepaḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: bodhisattva iti bhagavann ucyate, katamasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti? nāhaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1371: iti, so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vadiṣyāmi?
K02psp_1u:1372: bhagavān āha: nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā iti bodhisattva iti ca, tad api ca bodhisattvanāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sattvaḥ sattva iti
K02psp_1u:1373: cocyate, na ca kācit sattvopalabdhiḥ, yac ca tannāma tat prajñaptimātraṃ prajñaptidharmaḥ
K02psp_1u:1374: iti duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
K02psp_1u:1375: vyavahriyate, evam ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāḥ sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva
K02psp_1u:1377: evam eva subhūte yā ca prajñāpāramitā, yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo, yac ca bodhisattvanāma sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ, sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
K02psp_1u:1378: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam adhyātmikaṃ rūpam iti dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ (PvsP1-1: 111) tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1380: vedaneti dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
K02psp_1u:1381: saṃjñeti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
K02psp_1u:1383: saṃskārā iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
K02psp_1u:1385: vijñānam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
K02psp_1u:1387: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā ca bodhisattvaś ca bodhisattvanāma ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās teṣāñ ca prajñaptidharmāṇāṃ notpādona nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
K02psp_1u:1388: cakṣur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
K02psp_1u:1389: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta cakṣur iti, tac ca cakṣur nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1390: śrotram iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
K02psp_1u:1391: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta śrotram iti, tac ca śrotraṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1392: ghrāṇam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyās ca dharmaprajñapter
K02psp_1u:1393: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta ghrāṇam iti, tac ca ghrāṇaṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1394: jihveti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
K02psp_1u:1395: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta
K02psp_1u:1396: jihveti, sā ca jihvā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1397: kāya iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
K02psp_1u:1398: (PvsP1-1: 112) notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta kāya iti, sa ca kāyo nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam
K02psp_1u:1400: mana iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1401: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta mana iti, tac ca mano nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1402: rūpam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1403: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate rūpam iti.
K02psp_1u:1404: śabda iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1405: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate śabda iti.
K02psp_1u:1406: gandha iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1407: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate gandha iti.
K02psp_1u:1408: rasa iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1409: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate rasa iti.
K02psp_1u:1410: sparśa iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1411: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, sparśa iti.
K02psp_1u:1412: dharma iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair
K02psp_1u:1413: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, dharma iti.
K02psp_1u:1414: cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho
K02psp_1u:1415: 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:1416: śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo nirodho 'nyatra (PvsP1-1: 113) nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, te ca nādhyātman
K02psp_1u:1418: ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyās ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho
K02psp_1u:1419: 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:1420: jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram
K02psp_1u:1421: etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam
K02psp_1u:1423: kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho
K02psp_1u:1424: 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:1425: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho
K02psp_1u:1426: 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:1427: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti, bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:1428: bodhisattvanāmeti ca dharmaprajñaptimātram etat, tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
K02psp_1u:1429: vyavahriyate, tac ca nāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam
K02psp_1u:1431: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yad etad ādhyātmikaṃ śarīraṃ śarīram iti
K02psp_1u:1432: vyavahriyate, śiro grīvā udaram aṃsau skandhau bāhū pṛṣṭhaṃ pārśvakāḥ kaṭhyūrū jaṅghe pādāv asthīnīti vyavahriyante, te ca prajñaptidharmās
K02psp_1u:1433: teṣāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante, tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1434: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās teṣāṃ ca notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante, tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:1435: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bāhyaṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ śākhāparṇapalāśaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyate, teṣāñ ca nāmnāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1436: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante, tāni ca nāmāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā
K02psp_1u:1438: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās te ca nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyante, teṣāṃ ca nāmnāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1439: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante, tāni ca nāmāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā
K02psp_1u:1440: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:1441: punar aparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma svapnapratiśrutkāmarīcipratibhāsamāyopamās tathāgatanirmitāḥ sarve te dharmaprajñaptimātrās teṣāñ ca notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1442: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
K02psp_1u:1444: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
K02psp_1u:1445: vyavahriyate, tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam
K02psp_1u:1447: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasaṃketaprajñaptyām avavādaprajñaptyāṃ dharmaprajñaptyāṃ ca śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_1u:1448: iti duḥkhe dharmajñānam evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ nityam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam anityam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ sukham iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam ātmeti samanupaśyati, na rūpam anātmeti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ śāntam iti
K02psp_1u:1449: samanupaśyati, na rūpam aśāntam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti
K02psp_1u:1450: samanupaśyati, na rūpam aśūnyam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ nimittam iti
K02psp_1u:1451: samanupaśyati, na rūpam animittam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ praṇihitam
K02psp_1u:1452: iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam apraṇihitam iti (PvsP1-1: 115) samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:1453: na rūpaṃ saṃskṛtam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam asaṃskṛtam iti
K02psp_1u:1454: samanupaśyati, na rūpam utpannam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam anutpannam
K02psp_1u:1455: iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ niruddham iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam aniruddham iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ viviktam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam aviviktam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ kuśalam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam akuśalam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ sāvadyam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam anavadyam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ sāsravam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpam anāsravam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ saṃkleśam iti samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:1456: na rūpaṃ niḥkleśam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ laukikam iti samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:1457: na rūpaṃ lokottaram iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ saṃkleśam iti
K02psp_1u:1458: samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ vyavadānam iti samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ saṃsāra iti
K02psp_1u:1459: samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ nirvāṇam iti samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1460: na vedanā nityeti samanupaśyati, na vedanānityeti samanupaśyati, na sukheti samanupaśyati, na duḥkheti samanupaśyati, nātmeti nānātmeti na
K02psp_1u:1461: śānteti nāśānteti, na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti, na nimitteti nānimitteti, na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihiteti vedanāṃ samanupaśyati, na saṃskṛteti nāsaṃskṛteti, notpanneti nānutpanneti, na niruddheti nāniruddheti, na vivikteti nāvivikteti na kuśaleti nākuśaleti, na sāvadyeti nānavadyeti, na sāsraveti nānāsraveti, na saṃkleśeti na niḥkleśeti, na laukiketi na
K02psp_1u:1462: lokottareti, na saṃkleśeti na vyavadānam iti, na saṃsāra iti na nirvāṇam iti, vedanāṃ samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1463: na saṃjñā nityeti samanupaśyati, na saṃjñānityeti samanupaśyati, na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti, na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti, na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihiteti saṃjñāṃ
K02psp_1u:1464: samanupaśyati, na saṃskṛteti nāsaṃskṛteti notpanneti nānutpanneti, na niruddheti nāniruddheti na vivikteti nāvivikteti, na kuśaleti nākuśaleti
K02psp_1u:1465: na sāvadyeti nānavadyeti na sāsraveti nānāsraveti, na saṃkleśeti na
K02psp_1u:1466: niḥkleśeti na laukiketi na lokottareti na saṃkleśam iti na vyavadānam iti na saṃsāra iti na nirvāṇam iti saṃjñāṃ samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1467: na saṃskārā nityā iti samanupaśyati, na saṃskārā anityā iti samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:1468: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmāna iti nānātmāna iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā iti saṃskārān samanupaśyati, na saṃskṛtā iti nāsaṃskṛtā iti notpannā iti nānutpannā iti na niruddhā iti nāniruddhā iti na viviktā iti
K02psp_1u:1469: nāviviktā iti, na kuśalā iti nākuśalā iti, na sāvadyā iti nānavadyā iti,
K02psp_1u:1470: na sāsravā iti nānāsravā iti, na saṃkleśā iti na niḥkleśā iti, na laukikā iti na lokottarā iti na saṃkleśā iti na vyavadānam iti na saṃsāra iti na nirvāṇam iti saṃskārān samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1471: na vijñānaṃ nityam iti samanupaśyati, na vijñānam anityam iti
K02psp_1u:1472: samanupaśyati, na sukham iti na duḥkham iti, nātmeti nānātmeti, na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati, na saṃskṛtam iti nāsaṃskṛtam iti notpannam iti nānutpannam iti, na niruddham iti
K02psp_1u:1473: nāniruddham iti na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti na kuśalamiti nākuśalam
K02psp_1u:1474: iti, na sāvadyam iti nānavadyam iti na sāsravam iti nānasravam iti na saṃkleśam iti na niḥkleśam iti, na laukikam iti na lokottaram iti, na saṃkleśam iti na vyavadānam iti, na saṃsara iti na nirvāṇam iti vijñānaṃ
K02psp_1u:1476: evaṃ na cakṣurdhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1477: na cakṣurdhātuḥ sukha iti vā duḥkha iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ sukha iti vā duḥkha iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ sukha iti vā duḥkha iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1478: na cakṣurdhātur ātmeti vā anātmeti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātur ātmeti
K02psp_1u:1479: vā anātmeti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātur ātmeti vā anātmeti vā
K02psp_1u:1481: na cakṣurdhātuḥ śānta iti vā aśānta iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ śānta iti vā aśānta iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ śānta iti vā aśānta iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1482: na cakṣurdhātuḥ śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1483: na cakṣurdhātur nimitta iti vā animitta iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātur nimitta iti vā animitta iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātur nimitta iti vā animitta iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1484: na cakṣurdhātuḥ praṇihita iti vā apraṇihita iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ praṇihita iti vā apraṇihita iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ praṇihita iti vā apraṇihita iti vā samanupaśyati.

K02psp_1u:1486: na cakṣurdhātur utpanna iti vā anutpanna iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātur utpanna iti vā anutpanna iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātur utpanna iti vā anutpanna iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1487: na cakṣurdhātur niruddha iti vā aniruddha iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātur niruddha iti vā aniruddha iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātur niruddha iti vā aniruddha iti vā samanupaśyati.

K02psp_1u:1489: na cakṣurdhātuḥ kuśala iti vā akuśala iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ kuśala iti vā akuśala iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ kuśala
K02psp_1u:1490: iti vā akuśala iti vā samanupaśyati.
K02psp_1u:1491: na cakṣurdhātuḥ sāvadya iti vā anavadya iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ sāvadya iti vā anavadya iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ sāvadya iti vā anavadya iti vā samanupaśyati.

K02psp_1u:1493: na cakṣurdhātuḥ saṃkleśa iti vā niḥkleśa iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ saṃkleśa iti vā niḥkleśa iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ (PvsP1-1: 118) saṃkleśa iti vā niḥkleśa iti vā

K02psp_1u:1497: na cakṣurdhātuḥ saṃsāra iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā samanupaśyati, na rūpadhātuḥ saṃsara iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā samanupaśyati, na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ saṃsāra iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā samanupaśyati.

K02psp_1u:1698: yad api manodharmamanovijñānasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā, tad api na saṃsāram iti vā na nirvāṇam iti
K02psp_1u:1701: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K02psp_1u:1702: prajñāpāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitānāma taṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ tac ca bodhisattvanāma na samanupaśyati, saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau
K02psp_1u:1703: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naitān sarvadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati, so 'vikalpe dharme sthitvā smṛtyupasthānāni
K02psp_1u:1704: bhāvayati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāṃ nāpi prajñāpāramitānāma samanupaśyati, na bodhisattvaṃ nāpi bodhisattvanāma
K02psp_1u:1706: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitātathāgatabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāṃ nāpi prajñāpāramitānāma, na bodhisattvaṃ nāpi bodhisattvanāma samanupaśyati,
K02psp_1u:1709: tathā hi tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmalakṣaṇaṃ pratividdhaṃ
K02psp_1u:1710: bhavati, yac ca dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tan na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir anuboddhavyā.
K02psp_1u:1711: iti samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ sa nāmasāṃketikyā dharmaprajñaptyā avabuddhayā na rūpam abhinivekṣyate, na vedanām abhinivekṣyate, na saṃjñām abhinivekṣyate, na saṃskārān abhinivekṣyate, na vijñānam abhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1712: na cakṣur abhinivekṣyate, na rūpam abhinivekṣyate, na cakṣurvijñānam abhinivekṣyate, na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśam abhinivekṣyate, yad api cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:1714: na śrotram abhinivekṣyate na śabdaṃ na śrotravijñānaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ,
K02psp_1u:1715: yad api śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1716: na ghrāṇam abhinivekṣyate na gandhaṃ na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśam, yad api ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1717: na jihvām abhinivekṣyate na rasaṃ na jihvāvijñānaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ, yad api jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1718: na kāyam abhinivekṣyate na spraṣṭavyaṃ na kāyavijñānaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśaṃ,
K02psp_1u:1719: yad api kāyaḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ (PvsP1-1: 130) sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1720: na mano 'bhinivekṣyate na dharmān na manovijñānaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ, yad api manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate, nāpi saṃskṛtadhātum abhinivekṣyate, nāpy asaṃskṛtadhātum abhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1721: iti samudaye dharmajñānam sa na dānapāramitām abhinivekṣyate, na śīlapāramitām abhinivekṣyate, na kṣāntipāramitām abhinivekṣyate, na vīryapāramitām abhinivekṣyate, na dhyānapāramitām abhinivekṣyate, na prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyate, na nāmāpi na lakṣaṇam api tāsām abhinivekṣyate, na kāye 'bhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1722: na māṃsacakṣuṣy abhinivekṣyate, na divyacakṣuṣy abhinivekṣyate, na prajñācakṣuṣy abhinivekṣyate, na dharmacakṣuṣy abhinivekṣyate, na buddhacakṣuṣy abhinivekṣyate, nābhijñāsv abhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1725: mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na parabhāvaśūnyatāyām abhinivekṣyate.
K02psp_1u:1726: na tathatāyāṃ na bhūtakoṭyāṃ na dharmadhātau na sattvaparipāke na buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau nopāyakauśalye 'bhinivekṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:1727: tathā hi te sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante yas cābhiniviśeta yena cābhiniviśeta yatra cābhiniviśeta.
K02psp_1u:1729: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu dānapāramitayā vivardhate, śīlapāramitayā
K02psp_1u:1734: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim avakrāmati.
K02psp_1u:1735: iti nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhijñāḥ paripūrayati, abhijñāḥ paripūrya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati, sattvāṃś ca paripācayati, buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati
K02psp_1u:1736: pūjayati tenaiva kuśalamūlena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cāntika
K02psp_1u:1737: upapadyate, dharmaṃ ca śṛṇoti śrutāś cāsya dharmā na jātūcchetsyante yāvadā bodhimaṇḍād iti dhāraṇīmukhāni pratilapsyate samādhimukhāni
K02psp_1u:1738: pratilapsyate. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir anuboddhavyā.
K02psp_1u:1739: iti nirodhe dharmajñānam tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yad ucyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity api tu rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, vedanā bodhisattva iti, saṃjñā bodhisattva iti, saṃskārā bodhisattva iti, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1740: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte 'nyatra rūpād bodhisattva iti, anyatra vedanāyā bodhisattva iti, anyatra saṃjñāyā bodhisattva iti, anyatra saṃskārebhyo bodhisattva iti, anyatra vijñānād bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1741: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpe bodhisattva iti, vedanāyāṃ bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:1742: saṃjñāyāṃ bodhisattva iti, saṃskāreṣu bodhisattva iti, vijñāne bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1743: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte boadhisattve rūpam iti, bodhisattve vedaneti,
K02psp_1u:1744: bodhisattve saṃjñeti, bodhisattve saṃskārā iti, bodhisattve vijñānam iti?
K02psp_1u:1745: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte arūpo bodhisattva iti, avedano bodhisattva (PvsP1-1: 132) iti, asaṃjño bodhisattva iti, asaṃskaro bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:1747: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte cakṣur bodhisattvo 'nyatra cakṣuṣaś cakṣuṣi bodhisattvo bodhisattve cakṣur acakṣuṣko bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:1748: śrotraṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra śrotrāc chrotre bodhisattvo bodhisattve śrotram aśrotro bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1749: ghrāṇaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra ghrāṇād ghrāṇe bodhisattvo bodhisattve ghrāṇam aghrāṇo bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1750: jihvā bodhisattvo 'nyatra jihvāyā jihvāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve jihvājihvo bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1751: kāyo bodhisattvo 'nyatra kāyāt kāye bodhisattvo bodhisattve kāyo 'kāyo
K02psp_1u:1753: mano bodhisattvo 'nyatra manaso manasi bodhisattvo bodhisattve mano 'manasko bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1755: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra rūpād rūpe bodhisattvo bodhisattve rūpam arūpo bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1756: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte śabdo bodhisattvo 'nyatra śabdāc chabde bodhisattvo bodhisattve śabdo 'śabdo bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1757: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte gandho bodhisattvo 'nyatra gandhād gandhe bodhisattvo bodhisattve gandho 'gandho bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1758: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte raso bodhisattvo 'nyatra rasād rase bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:1760: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte spraṣṭavyaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra spraṣṭavyāt spraṣṭavye bodhisattvo bodhisattve spraṣṭavyam aspraṣṭavyo bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1762: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dharmo bodhisattvo 'nyatra dharmād dharme bodhisattvo bodhisattve dharmo 'dharmo bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1763: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānāni bodhisattvo (PvsP1-1:
K02psp_1u:1764: 133) 'nyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ, etāni tasmin vinā cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānair bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1766: ebhya eṣu '; saḥ, etāni tasmin vinā śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānair bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1767: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānāni bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1768: ebhya eṣu saḥ, etāni tasmin vinā ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānair bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1769: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte jihvārasajihvāvijñānāni bodhisattvo 'nyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ, etāni tasmin vinā jihvārasajihvāvijñānair bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1770: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānāni bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1771: ebhya eṣu saḥ, etāni tasmin vinā kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānair bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1772: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte manodharmamanovijñānāni bodhisattvo 'nyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ, etāni tasmin vinā manodharmamanovijñānair bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1774: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte pṛthivīdhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1775: pṛbthivīdhātos tatra bodhisattvo bodhisattve pṛthivīdhātur apṛthivīdhātuko bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1776: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte 'bdhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatrābdhātos tatra bodhisattvo bodhisattve 'bdhātur anabdhātuko bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1777: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tejodhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatra tejodhātos tatra bodhisattvo bodhisattve tejodhātur atejodhātuko bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1778: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vāyudhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatra vāyudhātos tatra bodhisattvo bodhisattve vāyudhātur avāyudhātuko bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1779: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ākāśadhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatrākāśadhātos tatra bodhisattvo bodhisattve ākāśadhātur anākāśadhātuko bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1780: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vijñānadhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatra vijñānadhātos tatra bodhisattvo bodhisattve vijñānadhātur avijñānadhātuko bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1783: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte avidyā bodhisattvo 'nyatrāvidyāyā
K02psp_1u:1785: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte saṃskārā bodhisattvo 'nyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ saṃskāreṣu bodhisattvo bodhisattve saṃskārā asaṃskāro bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1786: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vijñānaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra vijñānād vijñāne bodhisattvo bodhisattve vijñānam avijñāno bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1787: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte nāmarūpaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra nāmarūpān nāmarūpe bodhisattvo bodhisattve nāmarūpam anāmarūpo bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1788: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ṣaḍāyatanaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra ṣaḍāyatanāt ṣaḍāyatane bodhisattvo bodhisattve ṣaḍāyatanam aṣaḍāyatano bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1790: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte sparśo bodhisattvo 'nyatra sparśāt sparse bodhisattvo bodhisattve sparśo 'sparśo bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1791: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vedanā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vedanāyā vedanāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vedanāvedano bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1792: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tṛṣṇā bodhisattvo 'nyatra tṛṣṇāyāḥ tṛṣṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve tṛṣṇātṛṣṇo bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1793: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte upādānaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra upādānād upādāne bodhisattvo bodhisattve upādānam anupādāno bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:1794: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte bhavo bodhisattvo 'nyatra bhavād bhave bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:1796: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte jātir bodhisattvo 'nyatra jāter jātau bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:1798: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte jarāmaraṇaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra jarāmaraṇād jarāmaraṇe bodhisattvo bodhisattve jarāmaraṇam ajarāmaraṇo bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1802: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte 'pi nu yā rūpasya tathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra rūpatathatāyā rūpatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve rūpatathatā arūpatathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1803: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā vedanātathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1804: vedanātathatāyā vedanātathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vedanātathatā avedanātathato bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1805: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā saṃjñātathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1806: saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve saṃjñātathatā asaṃjñātathato bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1807: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā saṃskāratathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1808: saṃskāratathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve saṃskāratathatā asaṃskāratathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1809: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā vijñānatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1810: vijñānatathatāyā vijñānatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vijñānatathatā avijñānatathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1812: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi vyasteṣu skandheṣu na bodhisattvaḥ samasteṣu bhavatu yā skandhatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1813: skandhatathatāyāḥ skandhatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve skandhatathatā askandhatathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1815: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatāyāś cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatā acakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathato bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1817: evaṃ śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānatathatā ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānatathatā jihvārasajihvāvijñānatathatā kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñanatathatāyā manodharmamanovijñānatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1818: manodharmamanovijñānatathatāyā manodharmamanovijñānatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve nmanodharmamanovijñānatathatā amanodharmamanovijñānatathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1820: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā pṛthivīdhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāḥ pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve pṛthivīdhātutathatā apṛthivīdhātutathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1822: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā abdhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatrābdhātutathatāyā abdhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve
K02psp_1u:1825: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā tejodhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra tejodhātutathatāyāḥ tejodhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve tejodhātutathatā atejodhātutathato bodhisattva iti.
K02psp_1u:1827: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā vāyudhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vāyudhātutathatāyāḥ vāyudhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vāyudhātutathatā avāyudhātutathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1829: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā ākāśadhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra ākāśadhātutathatāyā ākāśadhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve ākāśadhātutathatā anākāśadhātutathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1832: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā vijñānadhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1833: vijñānadhātutathatāyā vijñānadhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vijñānadhātutathatā anvijñānadhātutathato bodhisattva iti?
K02psp_1u:1835: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yadi vyasteṣu dhātuṣu na bodhisattvaḥ samasteṣu bhavatu yā dhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1836: dhātutathatāyā dhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve dhātutathatā adhātutathato bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:1838: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yā cakṣustathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra cakṣustathatāyāś cakṣustathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve cakṣustathatā acakṣustathato bodhisattva iti. evaṃ yā śrotratathatāghrāṇatathatājihvātathatākāyatathatā,
K02psp_1u:1839: tat kiṃ manyase subhūe yā manastathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra
K02psp_1u:1840: manastathatāyā manastathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve manastathatā amanastathato bodhisattva
