K02psp_1u:3135: śāriputra āha: ātmadṛṣṭer bhagavan sattvadṛṣṭer jīvadṛṣṭer jantudṛṣṭer poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakadṛṣṭer cchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭeḥ skandhadṛṣṭer dhātudṛṣṭer āyatanadṛṣṭeḥ pratītyasamutpādadṛṣṭer bodhipakṣadharmadṛṣṭer balavaiśāradyadṛṣṭer āveṇikabuddhadharmadṛṣṭeḥ sattvaparipācanadṛṣṭer buddhakṣetrapariśodhanadṛṣṭer bodhisattvadṛṣṭer buddhadṛṣṭer dharmacakrapravartanadṛṣṭer iti, āsāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayaty anupalambhayogena, tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3136: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpadṛṣṭir bhavati, vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānadṛṣṭir bhavati?
K02psp_1u:3137: śāriputra āha: ihāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhavati, sa rūpam upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena, evaṃ vistareṇa vyastasamastaṃ
K02psp_1u:3139: upalambhayogena, evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitābhijñākṣarāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena, evaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena.
K02psp_1u:3140: iti prahāṇamahattvam atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3142: subhūtir āha: yad api bhagavan bodhicittam asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tatrāpi citte 'saktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ
K02psp_1u:3143: traidhātuke tatrāpi citte 'saktas tena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K02psp_1u:3144: śāriputra āha: katamad āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ
K02psp_1u:3145: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā
K02psp_1u:3146: samanupaśyati, na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ nāgatiṃ na gatiṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ yatra cāyuṣman śāriputra na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na gatir nāgatir na hānir na vṛddhir notpādo na nirodhaḥ, tac ca na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam, idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3147: śāriputra āha: yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha, tatrāpi śrāvakapratyekabuddhacitte 'sakta iti, nanv āyuṣman subhūte rūpam apy asaktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktam.
K02psp_1u:3148: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam apy asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā
K02psp_1u:3149: saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktaṃ, yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam apy asaktaṃ, evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'py asaktāḥ, yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā
K02psp_1u:3150: dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy asaktāḥ.
K02psp_1u:3151: śāriputra āha: yad apy āyuṣmān subhūtir idam āha, yad api tat
K02psp_1u:3152: sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannam iti, nanv āyuṣman subhūte
K02psp_1u:3153: bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām
K02psp_1u:3154: upādāya, nanu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:3155: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
K02psp_1u:3156: śāriputra āha: rūpam api subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām
K02psp_1u:3157: upādāya, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy āyuṣman subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, nanv āyuṣman subhūte saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ
K02psp_1u:3159: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām (PvsP1-2: 33) upādāya,
K02psp_1u:3160: yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K02psp_1u:3162: śāriputra āha: yad api tad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha, acittatvāt tatrāpi citte asakta iti, nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'rūpe 'pi rūpam asaktam avedanāyām
K02psp_1u:3163: api vedanā asaktāsaṃjñāyām api saṃjñā asaktāsaṃskāreṣv api saṃskārā asaktāvijñāne 'pi vijñānam
K02psp_1u:3164: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
K02psp_1u:3165: śāriputra āha: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'smṛtyupasthāneṣv api smṛtyupasthānāny asaktāni, evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñābalavaiśāradyāni yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣv api āveṇikabuddhadharmā asaktāḥ.
K02psp_1u:3166: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi, rūpe 'py āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñāne 'pi vijñānam
K02psp_1u:3167: asaktam, evaṃ vyastasamastā api skandhadhātava āyatanāni satyāni
K02psp_1u:3168: pratītyasamutpādo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, pāramitā abhijñā bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ, āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv āveṇikā buddhadharmā asaktāḥ, evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tenāpi bodhicittena asamasamacittena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair asādhāraṇacittena na manyate
K02psp_1u:3170: ity adhigamamahattvam ity uktaḥ pratipattyuddeśaḥ pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3172: pūrṇa āha: mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa sattvo mahāyānasamārūḍhaḥ sa sattvas tena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3173: śāriputra āha: kiyatā ayuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahasattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?
K02psp_1u:3174: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prādeśikānāṃ
K02psp_1u:3175: sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti, api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na
K02psp_1u:3176: prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, na sattvaparicchedena bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:3177: mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ saṃnahyate, iyataḥ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi,
K02psp_1u:3178: iyataḥ sattvān na parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti, iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya
K02psp_1u:3179: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi, iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya na pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena sannāhaṃ saṃnahyate, evaṃ cāsya bhavati,
K02psp_1u:3180: ātmanā ca dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:3184: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ, ātmanā ca bhāvayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca tāsu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv ātmanā ca sthāsyāmi
K02psp_1u:3185: sarvasattvāṃś ca teṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, iyatāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3186: iti pratipattisvarūpam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yāvad dānasya sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye niryātanā,
K02psp_1u:3187: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato
K02psp_1u:3189: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā śrāvakapratyekabuddhamanasikārāṇāṃ parivarjanatā, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ (PvsP1-2: 35) dadataḥ
K02psp_1u:3191: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā teṣāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā, ayam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaḥ.
K02psp_1u:3192: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā vīryāsraṃsanatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_1u:3194: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato yā cittasyaikāgratā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittasyānavakāśaṃ dānatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3195: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato
K02psp_1u:3197: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā māyākṛtasaṃjñopasthitā naiva dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakaṃ na deyaṃ,
K02psp_1u:3198: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ
K02psp_1u:3199: prajñāpāramitāsannāhaḥ, yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena tāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā na nimittīkaroti
K02psp_1u:3201: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran mahāsannāhasannaddho
K02psp_1u:3202: iti dānapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ prathamam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttrāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena, iyaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3203: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato yā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyaspṛhaṇatā prāg eva pṛthagjanabhūmeḥ, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3204: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā dharmāṇāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣāntipāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3205: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā vīryāsraṃsanatā anavalīnatā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato vīryapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3206: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viharato yac chrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittotpādānām anavakāśadānaṃ tasya kṛtaśaḥ kuśalamūlasya sarvasattvasādhāraṇī kṛtasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmanā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_1u:3208: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñāpratyupasthitā bhavati, tac ca śīlaṃ na manyate nopalabhate,
K02psp_1u:3209: iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitayāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3210: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K02psp_1u:3211: iti śīlapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ dvitīyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3212: (PvsP1-2: 37) iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā, evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3213: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanatāyai sarvasattvaparipākāya ca prayujyate prajñayā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac cakuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3214: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3215: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K02psp_1u:3216: iti kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ tṛtīyam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3217: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3218: evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā
K02psp_1u:3220: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām
K02psp_1u:3222: śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kusalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3223: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3224: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K02psp_1u:3225: iti vīryapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ caturtham punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K02psp_1u:3226: (PvsP1-2: 38) caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02psp_1u:3227: pariṇāmayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā, evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3228: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati,
K02psp_1u:3229: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3230: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3231: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K02psp_1u:3232: iti dhyānapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ pañcamam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā, evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3233: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tasya sarvapāramitāsu sarvadharmeṣu ca māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratiśrutkāpratibimbanirmāṇasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā
K02psp_1u:3234: bhavati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_1u:3235: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati, yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenaitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā na nimittīkaroti nopalabhate.
K02psp_1u:3236: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran mahāsannāhasannaddho bhavati, evaṃ ca punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:3237: mahāsattva ekaikasyāṃ pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati.
K02psp_1u:3238: iti prajñāpāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ ṣaṣṭham punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate na ca dhyānāny āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
K02psp_1u:3239: evam apramāṇāni cārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na ca tā āsvādayati na ca tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsāṃ vaśenopapadyate, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalagatā prajñāpāramitā veditavyā.
K02psp_1u:3240: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu vivekadarśanena ca viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadarśanena ca viharati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_1u:3242: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhas tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti, evaṃ mahāsannāhasannaddhasyāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanta udānam udānayanti varṇam udīrayanti nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti,
K02psp_1u:3243: amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha iti sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
K02psp_1u:3244: iti sannāhaṣaṭkopasaṃhāraḥ ity uktā sannāhapratipattiḥ śāriputra āha: kiyat āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati?
K02psp_1u:3245: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ, evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, imāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etaiś cārūpyair dānapāramitāyāṃ carann ākāśākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś ca tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K02psp_1u:3247: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vācyam.
K02psp_1u:3248: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyate catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate, yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etābhiś cārūpyasamāpattibhir viharati, sa etā dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś cākāśākāraliṅganimittāni manasikaroti, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anyāni ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ
K02psp_1u:3251: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāsu caran mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca
K02psp_1u:3253: iti dhyānārūpyasamāpattivyutthānaprasthānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ manasikāram utpādya kleśānāṃ dhvaṃsanāya sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti cittam utpādayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3254: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tair eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam ākrāmati deśayati, tatra ca prathame dhyāne pratiṣṭhate na cānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3256: 41) manasikārair dhyānārūpyair viharata evaṃ bhavati, sarvasattvānāṃ kleśakṣayāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti, yāvat teṣāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā avabodha upanidhyāpanam, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3257: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvakuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati vīryaṃ ca na sraṃsayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3258: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na copalabhate, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3259: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prathamadhyānāṅgāni dvitīyāni tṛtīyāni caturthāni dhyānāṅgāni anityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa śūnyākāreṇa ānimittākāreṇa apraṇihitākāreṇa pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3260: idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
K02psp_1u:3261: iti ṣaṭpāramitāprasthānam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yat sarvākāraṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati, sarvākāraṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhasamādhiṃ bhāvayati, sarvākāraṃ balāni vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati.
K02psp_1u:3262: idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
K02psp_1u:3263: ity āryamārgaprasthānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maitrīsahagatena cittena vipulena mahadgatenādvayenāpramāṇenāvaireṇāsapatnenānāvaraṇenāvyāvadhena sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokam ekāṃ diśaṃ sphuritvopasaṃpadya viharati, yāvad daśa diśaḥ sphuritvopasaṃpadya viharati, evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatena
K02psp_1u:3264: upekṣāsagatena cittenavipulena mahadgatenādvayenāpramāṇenāvaireṇāsapatnenānāvaraṇenāvyāvādhena sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ, ekāṃ diśaṃ sphuritvopasaṃpadya (PvsP1-2: 42) viharati,
K02psp_1u:3265: yāvad daśa diśaḥ sphāritvopasaṃpadya viharati. imāny ucyante bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇāni.
K02psp_1u:3266: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvo maitrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyate mayā sarvasattvās trātavyā iti nirṇāmayati, karuṇāṃ ca samādhiṃ
K02psp_1u:3267: samāpadyate klībakāruṇyatāṃ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati, muditāṃ ca samādhiṃ
K02psp_1u:3268: samāpadyate aham eva modayiṣyāmīti sattveṣu nirṇāmayati, upekṣāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate āsravakṣayaṃ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato dānapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3269: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāpramāṇākāraliṅganimittāni samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayaty anyatra
K02psp_1u:3272: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tābhir dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattibhir avyavakīrṇo viharati, ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye vā na spṛhayate sarvākārajñataivāsya kṣamate rocate ceyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carataḥ kṣāntipāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3273: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair anikṣiptadhuro viharati akuśaladharmaprahāṇāya kuśaladharmopasaṃpade, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato vīryapāramitā,
K02psp_1u:3274: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etāni ca dhyānāny etāś cāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate, na ca dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattivaśenopapadyate, na ca tā āsvādayati na ca
K02psp_1u:3275: tābhiḥ saṃhriyate, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato
K02psp_1u:3277: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca tāś cānityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa śūnyākāreṇa animittākāreṇa apraṇihitākāreṇa pratyavekṣate, na ca śrāvakanyāmaṃ vā pratyekabuddhanyāmaṃ vābhikrāmati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carataḥ prajñāpāramitā. idam āyuṣman śāriputra
K02psp_1u:3279: ity apramāṇaprasthānam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam, yad adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na copalambhayogena, yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na copalambhayogena, yad adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na
K02psp_1u:3282: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yat sarvadharmeṣu na śikṣiṣyate cittaṃ samāhitaṃ taj jñānam. idam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyanam.
K02psp_1u:3283: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yad asya na
K02psp_1u:3284: nityam iti jñānaṃ pravartate nānityam iti, na duḥkham iti nāduḥkham iti,
K02psp_1u:3285: na sukham iti nāsukham iti, nātmeti nānātmeti, na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti,
K02psp_1u:3286: na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti, na nimittam iti nānimittam iti, na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti jñānaṃ pravartate. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyanam.
K02psp_1u:3287: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yad atīte 'dhvani jñānaṃ na pravartate, anāgate 'dhvani jñānaṃ na pravartate,
K02psp_1u:3288: pratyutpanne 'dhvani jñānaṃ na pravartate, na cāsya triṣv adhvasv ajñānaṃ pravartate, tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
K02psp_1u:3289: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yan na kāmadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate na rūpadhātau jñānaṃ pravartatenārūpyadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate, na cāsya kāmarūpārūpyadhātāv ajñānaṃ pravartate, tac
K02psp_1u:3290: cānupalambhayogena. idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
K02psp_1u:3291: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yan na laukikeṣu lokottareṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravartate, na sāsraveṣu dharmeṣu
K02psp_1u:3292: nānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu na saṃskṛteṣu nāsaṃskṛteṣu na cāsyalaukikalokottarasāsravānāsravasaṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu dharmeṣv ajñānaṃ
K02psp_1u:3293: pravartate, tac cānupalambhayogena. idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya
K02psp_1u:3295: ity anupalambhayogena prasthānam śāriputra āha: kiyatāyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate?
K02psp_1u:3296: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitām ārohati, sa naiva dānapāramitām upalabhate na dāyakaṃ
K02psp_1u:3297: na pratigrāhakaṃ na dānam upalabhate anupalambhayogena, evaṃ hy āyuṣman
K02psp_1u:3298: śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvodānapāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate, evaṃ śīlapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ kṣāntipāramitāsamārūḍho vīryapāramitāsamārūḍho dhyānapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām ārohati,
K02psp_1u:3299: sa naivaprajñāpāramitām upalabhate na bodhisattvaṃ na manasikāram upalabhate anupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3300: iti trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiprasthānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena
K02psp_1u:3301: sarvākārajñatācittotpādena saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3303: sarvākārajñatācittotpādena śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīn bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3305: sarvākārajñatācittotpādena daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3306: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
K02psp_1u:3307: vyavahāramātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
K02psp_1u:3308: idam api nāmamātraṃ yad uta rūpaṃ rūpānupalabdhitām upādāya, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānaṃ vijñānānupalabdhitām upādāya,
K02psp_1u:3309: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cakṣuś cakṣuṣo (PvsP1-2: 45) 'nupalabdhitām
K02psp_1u:3310: upādāya, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta mano manaso 'nupalabdhitām upādāya, evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad
K02psp_1u:3312: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddhadharmābuddhadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya,
K02psp_1u:3313: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta tathatā dharmadhātuś ca dharmaniyāmatā ca bhūtakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭyanupalabdhitām upādāya, nāmamātraṃ yad uta bodhir buddhaś ca buddhānupalabdhitām upādāya. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3314: ity uddeśaprasthānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhir atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇatvāt
K02psp_1u:3315: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
K02psp_1u:3316: buddhakṣetre buddhakṣetre ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati, yo yasya buddhasya aupayikapūjāsatkāravidhis tebhyaś ca
K02psp_1u:3317: buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dharmaṃ śṛṇoti, yad uta idam eva mahāyānam, sa tatra bodhisattvayāne abhiruhya buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ
K02psp_1u:3318: saṃkrāmati, buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati, na cāsya buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā pravartate na sattvasaṃjñā pravartate, so
K02psp_1u:3319: 'dvayabhūmau sthitvā yādṛśenātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ śaknoty arthakaraṇāya tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya parigṛhṇāti, sa na jātu tena mahāyānena virahito bhavati, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
K02psp_1u:3320: ity abhijñāprasthānam sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati, apravartanīyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair devanāgayakṣagandhrvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāsureṇa lokena,
K02psp_1u:3321: tasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya, pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti (PvsP1-2: 46) yaśaḥ prakāśayanti, eṣā amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare
K02psp_1u:3322: 'mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāyānam abhiruhya sarvākārajñatānuprāptā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam,
K02psp_1u:3323: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti yaśaḥ prakāśayanti, eṣāmuṣmin lokadhātuprasare 'mukena
K02psp_1u:3324: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatānuprāptā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3325: iti sarvākārajñatāprasthānam ity uktā prasthānapratipattiḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mahāsannāhasannaddho mahāsannāhasannaddha iti bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate,
K02psp_1u:3326: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?
K02psp_1u:3327: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta dānapāramitāsannāhaṃ śīlapāramitāsannāhaṃ kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṃ vīryapāramitāsannāhaṃ dhyānapāramitāsannāhaṃ prajñāpāramitāsannāhaṃ
K02psp_1u:3332: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāsannāhaṃ sannahya, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsannāhaṃ sannahya, abhijñābalasannāhaṃ
K02psp_1u:3335: sannahya, buddhavigrahasannāhaṃ sannahya, trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena spharati ca, ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān nirvāṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva (PvsP1-2: 47) evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas
K02psp_1u:3336: tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti, tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante, te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena
K02psp_1u:3337: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti, evaṃ tiryagyonito yamalokato vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti ca devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca
K02psp_1u:3338: parigṛhṇanti, evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
K02psp_1u:3339: uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena spharati ca ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarveṣu nairayika bhavaneṣu ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān nirvāṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti, tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante, te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayabhyo vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra yatra budhhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti, evaṃ tiryagyonibhyo yamalokebhyo
K02psp_1u:3340: vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3341: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato nirayāṃs tiryagyoniyamalokaṃ ca nirmimīte nirmāya teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdam
K02psp_1u:3342: anuśrāvayati, tatas tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tebhyo
K02psp_1u:3343: nirayatiryagyoniyamalokebhyo vyutthāya devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyeran, api tu subhūte tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyo vyutthāpitaḥ?
K02psp_1u:3345: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asaṃkhyeyeṣv
K02psp_1u:3346: aprameyeṣv apramāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāṃs tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ parimocya na kaścit sattvaḥ parimocito bhavati. tat kasya (PvsP1-2: 48) hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:3348: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍho mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3349: iti karuṇāsaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā mahāsannāhasannaddhas trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryam ayaṃ nirmimīte vaiḍūryam ayaṃ nirmāya cakravartivyūhaṃ nirmimīte cakravartivyūhaṃ nirmāya annārthikebhyo 'nnaṃ dadāti, evaṃ yāvad vastrayānagandhamālyapuṣpadhūpavilepanacūrṇapariṣkāraṃ vāsaśayanāsanaprāvaraṇajīvitopakaraṇabhaiṣajyasuvarṇarūpyamaṇiratnapravāḍaśaṅkhaśilāmuktābharaṇāni yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāraṃ dadāti, so 'nnam annārthikebhyo datvā yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāraṃ datvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02psp_1u:3350: yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam, te khalu punaḥ sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā na jātu tābhiḥ pāramitābhir virahitā bhavanti yavād
K02psp_1u:3351: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3352: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe sthitvā mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmimīte nirmāya annam annārthikebhyo dadyād anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāran tad arthikebhyo
K02psp_1u:3353: dadyāt. tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā
K02psp_1u:3356: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvac
K02psp_1u:3357: cakravartivyūham abhinirmāya annam annārthikebhyo dadatā yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadatā na kasmaicit sattvāya yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāḥ pariṣkārā dattā bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:3358: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte
K02psp_1u:3360: iti dānasaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā saṃcintyopapattiparigraheṇa cakravartikule pratyājāyate, sa tatra (PvsP1-2: 49) sthitvā sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K02psp_1u:3361: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu
K02psp_1u:3362: pratiṣṭhāpayati, saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati, yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati, te ca sattvā na jātu virahitā bhavanti tayā dharmadeśanayā, yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02psp_1u:3364: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet, yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet, tena tāvataḥ sattvān yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs
K02psp_1u:3365: tāvataḥ sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya, yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3366: iti śīlasaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntau samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, kathaṃ ca subhūte
K02psp_1u:3367: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntau samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:3368: mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya, evaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate, sacen mama sarvasattvā daṇḍaloṣṭamuṣṭiśastraprahāran dadyus tatra mayā ekam api
K02psp_1u:3369: kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayitavyaṃ sarvasattvāś caivaṃrūpāyāṃ kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.
K02psp_1u:3370: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmimīte te 'pi sarve tasya māyākārasya daṇḍair loṣṭair muṣṭibhiḥ śastrair vā prahāraṃ dadyuḥ, sa ca teṣu ekam api kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayet tāṃś ca sattvān nirmitān evaṃ rūpāyāṃ kṣāntau
K02psp_1u:3371: pratiṣṭhāpayet, tena tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kṣāntau
K02psp_1u:3372: pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte (PvsP1-2: 50)
K02psp_1u:3373: dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3374: iti kṣāntisaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K02psp_1u:3375: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ
K02psp_1u:3376: kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvasattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye samādāpayati niveśayati
K02psp_1u:3377: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet, tena tāṃs tāvataḥ
K02psp_1u:3378: sattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye praviṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3379: iti vīryasaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K02psp_1u:3380: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
K02psp_1u:3381: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatāyāṃ sthitvā na kasyacid dharmasya vikṣepaṃ vā avikṣepaṃ vā samanupaśyati, evaṃ hi subhūte
K02psp_1u:3382: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati, sa tathaiva sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, te ca samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti, na jātu virahitā bhavanti dhyānapāramitayā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
K02psp_1u:3383: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā (PvsP1-2: 51)
K02psp_1u:3384: caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya taṃ janakāyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet, tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ sattvo 'pi dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo
K02psp_1u:3385: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3386: iti dhyānasaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K02psp_1u:3387: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
K02psp_1u:3388: yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasyāpāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhate, evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:3389: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati, sa tathaiva sarvasattvān api tatra samādāpayati niveśayati
K02psp_1u:3390: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekasattvo 'pi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ prajñā apāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3391: iti prajñāsaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, dharmaṃ ca (PvsP1-2: 52)
K02psp_1u:3392: deśayati, yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam, te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha
K02psp_1u:3393: ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:3394: vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, dharmaṃ ca deśayati, yad uta imam eva
K02psp_1u:3395: ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ, te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02psp_1u:3397: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu
K02psp_1u:3398: tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpito bhavati, niveśito vā pratiṣṭhāpito vā bhavet.
K02psp_1u:3400: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ
K02psp_1u:3401: māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity
K02psp_1u:3402: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ sannahya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena viharan nānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti, iyanto mayā sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:3403: vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyām iyanto mayā sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti, iyantaḥ sattvāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na
K02psp_1u:3405: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na
K02psp_1u:3406: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ, evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale iyantaḥ sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.
K02psp_1u:3407: api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
K02psp_1u:3408: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ, evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K02psp_1u:3409: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabuddhatve asaṃkhyeyā aprameyāḥ sattvā buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ.
K02psp_1u:3410: iti śamathasaṃbhāraḥ tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyaṃ nirmāya taṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet, yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayed evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya yāvat sarvākāravaropete
K02psp_1u:3411: sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ yad imāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:3412: subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā
K02psp_1u:3413: asannāhasannaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ, cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyam, rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
K02psp_1u:3414: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyam, evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ
K02psp_1u:3416: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ (PvsP1-2: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyam, evaṃ
K02psp_1u:3420: dānapāramitāpi bhagavan dānapāramitayā śūnyā, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā,
K02psp_1u:3421: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā, bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā,
K02psp_1u:3422: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā bodhipakṣair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
K02psp_1u:3423: daśatathāgatabalāni daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni, vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā, bodhisattvo 'pi bhagavan bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ, mahāyānasannāho 'pi bhagavan mahāyānasannāhena śūnyaḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa asannāhasannaddho bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ.
K02psp_1u:3424: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte
K02psp_1u:3425: yathā vadasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā, te 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ, yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
K02psp_1u:3426: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā
K02psp_1u:3427: anabhisaṃskṛtā, te 'pi sattvā akṛtā vikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ, yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
K02psp_1u:3428: bhagavān āha: kārakānupalabdhitām upādāya subhūte sarvākārajñatā akṛtā vikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā, te 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte rūpaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ, na vijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
K02psp_1u:3429: na cakṣuḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃna jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na rūpaṃ (PvsP1-2: 55) karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmāḥ kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti.
K02psp_1u:3430: na cakṣurvijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na śrotravijñānaṃ na
K02psp_1u:3431: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na jihvāvijñānaṃ na kāyavijñānaṃ na manovijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
K02psp_1u:3432: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
K02psp_1u:3433: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:3434: ātmā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, evaṃ na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na
K02psp_1u:3435: jānako na paśyakaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:3436: tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:3437: svapnaḥ subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti, evaṃ pratiśrutkā pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ marīcir na nirmāṇaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na
K02psp_1u:3439: adhyātmaśūnyatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy adhyātmaśūnyatā atyantatayā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:3440: atyantānupalabdhitām upādāya, bahirdhāśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bahirdhāśūnyatā na vidyate nopalabhyate, atyantānupalabdhitām upādāya, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na vidyate nopalabhyate, atyantānupalabdhitām
K02psp_1u:3441: upādāya, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti
K02psp_1u:3442: nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na vidyate (PvsP1-2: 56) nopalabhyate, atyantānupalabdhitām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:3443: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā na kurvanti na vikurvanti
K02psp_1u:3444: nābhisaṃskurvanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante, daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:3445: tathatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:3446: tathatā hy atyantatayā na vidyate nopalabhyate, evam avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir acintyadhātur bodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:3447: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā, te
K02psp_1u:3448: 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ, yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena
K02psp_1u:3449: mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:3450: iti vidarśanāsaṃbhāraḥ subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi, rūpaṃ bhagavann abaddham amuktaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, vijñānaṃ bhagavann abaddham
K02psp_1u:3452: pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha: rūpam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti
K02psp_1u:3453: vadasi, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, vijñānam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi.
K02psp_1u:3454: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman pūrṇa.
K02psp_1u:3455: pūrṇa āha: katamat tad āyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yad abaddham amuktam? katame te vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ? katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad abaddham amuktam?
K02psp_1u:3456: subhūtir āha: yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa svapnopamaṃ rūpaṃ tad abaddham amuktam, ya ete svapnopamā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, yad etat svapnopamaṃ
K02psp_1u:3457: vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam, evaṃ pratiśrutkopamā māyopamā marīcyupamā pratibhāsopamā yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa (PvsP1-2: 57) nirmitopamaṃ rūpaṃ tad
K02psp_1u:3458: abaddham amuktam, ya ete nirmitopamā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, yad etaṃ nirmitopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam.
K02psp_1u:3459: atītam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam, atītā vedanā saṃjñā
K02psp_1u:3460: saṃskārāḥ, atītam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam, evam anāgataṃ pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam, pratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam.
K02psp_1u:3461: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpasya, evaṃ tad rūpam abaddham
K02psp_1u:3462: amuktam, asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānasyaivaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam, evaṃ viviktatvāc chāntatvāc chūnyatvād ānimittatvād apraṇihitatvād
K02psp_1u:3463: asaṃskṛtatvād anutpannatvāt kuśalam akuśalaṃ saṃkleśaṃ niṣkleśaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam,
K02psp_1u:3464: āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād rūpasyaivaṃ tad rūpam abaddham amuktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:3465: asattvād vijñānasya evaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam.
K02psp_1u:3466: sarvadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ.
K02psp_1u:3467: dānapāramitāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa
K02psp_1u:3468: abaddhā amuktā, asattvād abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad
K02psp_1u:3470: adhyātmaśūnyatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā, bahirdhāśūnyatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā
K02psp_1u:3471: amuktā, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
K02psp_1u:3472: saptatriṃśad āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhipakṣyā dharmā abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktāḥ.
K02psp_1u:3473: bodhir apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā, sarvākārajñatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa
K02psp_1u:3474: abaddhā amuktā, bodhisattvo 'py abaddho 'muktaḥ, tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddho 'muktaḥ, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddho 'muktaḥ.
K02psp_1u:3475: tathatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā, avitathatāpy ananyatathatāpi dharmatāpi dharmadhātur api dharmaniyāmatāpi bhūtakoṭir apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
K02psp_1u:3476: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'baddho 'muktaḥ, evaṃ ṣaḍ api
K02psp_1u:3477: pāramitā abaddhā amuktāḥ, yāvat sarvākārajñatāpy abaddhā amuktā, yāvat sarvākārajñatāpy abaddhā amuktā, sattvān api yān parinirvāpayiṣyati, te
K02psp_1u:3478: 'py abaddhā amuktāḥ, buddhakṣetrāṇy api yāni pariśodhayiṣyati, tāny apy abaddhāny amuktāni, yān api buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyate te 'py
K02psp_1u:3479: abaddhā amuktāḥ, yam api dharmaṃ śroṣyati so 'py abaddho 'muktaḥ, buddhair bhagavadbhir na jātu virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ, nābhijñābhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ, na pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ, tathā nānyaiḥ samādhibhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ, abaddhām amuktāṃ mārgākārajñatām utpādayiṣyati, abaddhām amuktāṃ sarvākārajñatām avabhotsyate, abaddham amuktaṃ dharmacakraṃ
K02psp_1u:3480: pravartayiṣyati, abaddhān amuktān sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayiṣyaty abaddho amuktaḥ.
K02psp_1u:3481: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abaddho
K02psp_1u:3482: 'muktaḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate asattvam upādāya, evaṃ viviktatāṃ yāvad anutpannatām
K02psp_1u:3483: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abaddho 'mukto
K02psp_1u:3485: iti yuganaddhamārgasaṃbhāraḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:3486: mahāsattvo mahāyanasaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyati?
K02psp_1u:3487: kva vā tad yānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā tena yānena niryāsyati?
K02psp_1u:3488: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yat subhūte (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:3489: 59) evaṃ vadasi, katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti. ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam. katamāḥ ṣaṭ?
K02psp_1u:3490: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3491: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā?
K02psp_1u:3492: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānaṃ dadāti yad
K02psp_1u:3493: utādhyātmikabāhyāni vastūni tāni ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, parāṃś ca tatra samādāpayaty
K02psp_1u:3494: anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3495: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā?
K02psp_1u:3496: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ, ātmanā ca daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate, parāṃś ca daśa kuśale karmapathe samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3497: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā?
K02psp_1u:3498: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ, ātmanā ca kṣāntisamāpanno
K02psp_1u:3499: bhavati, parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā.
K02psp_1u:3500: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā?
K02psp_1u:3501: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ pañcasu pāramitāsu anikṣiptadhuro viharati, parāṃś ca tāsu pañcasu pāramitāsu samādāpayaty
K02psp_1u:3504: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā?
K02psp_1u:3505: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpadyate,
K02psp_1u:3506: (PvsP1-2: 60) na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate, parāṃś ca dhyāneṣu samādāpayaty
K02psp_1u:3509: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
K02psp_1u:3510: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena sarvadharmān
K02psp_1u:3511: sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ pratyavekṣate, sarvadharmaprakṛtipratyavekṣāyāṃ ca sattvāṃś ca samādāpayaty anupalaṃbhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya
K02psp_1u:3514: ity upāyakauśalasaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā
K02psp_1u:3517: tatra katamā adhyātmaśūnyatā? adhyātmikā dharmā ucyante cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ, tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyam
K02psp_1u:3518: akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:3519: asyaiṣā, jihvā jihvayā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:3520: prakṛtir asyā eṣā, kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, mano manasāśūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām
K02psp_1u:3521: upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate adhyātmaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3522: tatra katamā bahirdhāśūnyatā? ye bahirdhā dharmās tadyathā
K02psp_1u:3523: rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāḥ, tatra rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām (PvsP1-2: 61) upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:3524: asyaiṣā, evaṃ śabdagandharasasparśāḥ, dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā
K02psp_1u:3525: akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3526: tatra katamā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā? ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni, iyam ucyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3527: tatra katame adhyātmikā dharmā bahirdhādharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ?
K02psp_1u:3528: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanāṃsy adhyātmikāni rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā.
K02psp_1u:3529: tatra katame bahirdhā dharmā adhyātmikair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ?
K02psp_1u:3530: rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanobhiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3531: tatra katamā śūnyatāśūnyatā? yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā tayā śūnyatayā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyā eṣā, iyam ucyate śūnyatāśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3532: tatra katamā mahāśūnyatā? pūrvā dik pūrvayā diśā śūnyā, evaṃ dakṣiṇā paścimā uttarā uttarapūrvā pūrvadakṣiṇā dakṣiṇapaścimā paścimottarā adha ūrdhvā dik ūrdhvayā diśā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir āsām eṣā, iyam ucyate mahāśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3533: tatra katamā paramārthaśūnyatā? paramārtha ucyate nirvāṇaṃ, tac ca nirvāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:3535: tatra katamā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā? saṃskṛta ucyate kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātuś ca, tatra kāmadhātuḥ kāmadhātunā śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām
K02psp_1u:3536: upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, rūpadhātū rūpadhātunā śūnyo
K02psp_1u:3537: 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā,
K02psp_1u:3538: ārūpyadhātur ārūpyadhātunā śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3539: tatra katamā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā? asaṃskṛta ucyate yasya notpādo na nirodho
K02psp_1u:3540: na sthitir nānyathātvam, idam ucyate asaṃskṛtam (PvsP1-2: 62) asaṃskṛtena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3541: tatra katamā atyantaśūnyatā? yasyānto nopalabhyate tad atyantam atyantena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate atyantaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3542: tatra katamā anavarāgraśūnyatā? yasya naivāgraṃ nāvaram upalabhyate, tasya
K02psp_1u:3543: madhyābhāvaḥ, yasya ca nādir na madhyaṃ nāvaram upalabhyate tasya nāgatir
K02psp_1u:3544: na gatiḥ, ādimadhyāvasānāny api ādimadhyāvasānaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate anavarāgraśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3545: tatra katamā anavakāraśūnyatā? yasya dharmasya na kaścid avakāraḥ, avakāro nāma avikiraṇaṃ choraṇam utsargaḥ, anavakāro 'navakāreṇa śūnyo
K02psp_1u:3546: 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate anavakāraśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3547: tatra katamā prakṛtiśūnyatā, yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ saṃskṛtānāṃ vā asaṃskṛtānāṃ vā na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā na tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kṛtā nāpakṛtā, prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyā śūnyā
K02psp_1u:3548: akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyā eṣā, iyam ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3549: tatra katamā sarvadharmaśūnyatā? sarvadharmā ucyante rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manorūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ
K02psp_1u:3550: śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā saṃskṛtā dharmā
K02psp_1u:3551: asaṃskṛtā dharmā ima ucyante sarvadharmāḥ. tatra dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3552: tatra katamā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā? rūpeṇālakṣaṇaṃ rūpam, anubhavalakṣaṇā
K02psp_1u:3554: saṃskārā, vijānanālakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ, yac ca saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaṃ, yac cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
K02psp_1u:3555: lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaṃ sarva ete dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇeṇa śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām
K02psp_1u:3556: upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3557: tatra katamā anupalambhaśūnyatā? ye dharmā atītānāgatapratyutpannās te
K02psp_1u:3558: nopalabhyante. tat kasya hetoḥ? nātīta anāgatā upalabhyante nāpy anāgata atītā, na pratyutpanne 'tītānāgatā upalabhyante, nāpy atītānāgatayoḥ pratyutpannā eṣām iyam anupalabdhir ādiviśuddhitvād akūṭasthāvināśitām
K02psp_1u:3559: upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate anupalambhaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3560: tatra katamā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā? nāsti sāṃyogikasya dharmasya svabhāvaḥ
K02psp_1u:3562: upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3563: tatra katamā bhāvaśūnyatā? bhāva ucyate pañcopādānaskandhāḥ, sa ca bhāvo
K02psp_1u:3564: bhāvena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:3566: tatra katamā abhāvaśūnyatā? abhāva ucyate asaṃskṛtaṃ, tac cāsaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:3568: tatra katamā svabhāvaśūnyatā? svabhāvo hi prakṛtir aviparītatā tasyā yā
K02psp_1u:3569: tayā śūnyatā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya, na sā jñānena darśanena ca kṛtā.
K02psp_1u:3570: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, iyam ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatā.
K02psp_1u:3571: tatra katamā parabhāvaśūnyatā? yā utpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ anutpādād vā
K02psp_1u:3572: sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmadhātur dharmaniyāmatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā bhūtakoṭis tasyā yā tayā śūnyatā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya, na sā pareṇa kṛtā. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:3574: idam ucyate subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
K02psp_1u:3575: iti jñānasaṃbhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:3576: yad uta śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ, ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ, siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiḥ, sucandro nāma samādhiḥ, candradhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3577: sarvadharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ, avalokitamūrdhvā nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3578: dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ, niyatadhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3579: vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ, dharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3580: samādhirājasupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ, raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3581: balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ, samudgato nāma samādhiḥ, niruktinirdeśapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ, adhivacanasaṃpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ, digvilokito nāma samādhiḥ, ādhāraṇamudro nāma samādhiḥ, asaṃpramuṣito nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3582: sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudro nāma samādhiḥ, ākāśasphāraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, tejovatī nāma samādhiḥ, apramāṇāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3583: asaṃgānāvaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmapravṛttisamucchedo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3584: raṇajaho nāma samādhiḥ, vairocano nāma samādhiḥ, animiṣo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3585: aniketasthito nāma samādhiḥ, niścitto nāma samādhiḥ, vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ, anantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ, prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3586: samantāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ, śuddhasāro nāma samādhiḥ, vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ, ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ, vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ, akṣayo nāma samādhiḥ, vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ, akṣayāpagato nāma samādhiḥ, aniñjyo nāma samādhiḥ, vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ, sūryapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3587: candravimalo nāmasamādhiḥ, śuddhaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ, ālokakaro nāma samādhiḥ, kārākāro nāma samādhiḥ, jñānaketur nāma samādhiḥ, vajropamo
K02psp_1u:3588: nāmasamādhiḥ, cittasthitir nāma samādhiḥ, samantāvaloko nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3589: supratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ, ratnakoṭir nāma samādhiḥ, varadharmamudro nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhiḥ, ratijaho nāmasamādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3590: sarvadharmodgatapūrṇo nāma samādhiḥ, vikiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3591: sarvadharmapadaprabhedo nāma samādhiḥ, samākṣaro nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3592: akṣarāpagato nāma samādhiḥ, ārambaṇacchedo nāma samādhiḥ, avikāro nāma samādhiḥ, aprakāro nāma samādhiḥ, nāma nimittāpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3593: aniketacārī nāma samādhiḥ, timirāpagato nāma samādhiḥ, cāritravatī nāma samādhiḥ, acalo nāma samādhiḥ, viṣayatīrṇo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3595: 65) samādhiḥ, śubhapuṣpitaśuddhir nāma samādhiḥ, bodhyaṅgavān nāma samādhiḥ, anantapratibhāso nāma samādhiḥ, asamasamo nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3596: sarvadharmātikramaṇo nāma samādhiḥ, paricchedakaro nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3597: vimativikiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, niradhiṣṭhāno nāma samādhiḥ, ekavyūho nāma samādhiḥ, ākārābhinirhāro nāma samādhiḥ, ekākāravyūho nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3598: akārānavakāro nāma samādhiḥ, nirvedhikasarvabhāvatalādhikāro nāma samādhiḥ, saṃketarutapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ, gītanirghoṣākṣaravimukto nāma samādhiḥ, jvalanolko nāma samādhiḥ, lakṣaṇapariśodhano nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3599: anabhilakṣito nāma samādhiḥ, sarvākāravaropeto nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3600: sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ, akṣayākāro nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3601: dhāraṇīpratipattir nāma samādhiḥ, sarvasamyaktvamithyātvasaṃgraho nāma samādhiḥ, sarvarodhanirodhapraśamano nāma samādhiḥ, anusārapratisāro nāma samādhiḥ, vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ, sāravatī nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3602: paripūrṇacandravimalo nāma samādhiḥ, mahāvyūho nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3603: sarvākāraprabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ, samādhisamatā nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3604: araṇasamavasaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, araṇasaraṇasarvasamavasaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, anilāniketo nāma samādhiḥ, tathatāsthitiniścito nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3605: kāyakalisaṃpramathano nāma samādhiḥ, vākkalividhvaṃsano nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3606: gaganakalpo nāma samādhiḥ, ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3607: tatra katamaḥ śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ? yena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ
K02psp_1u:3608: gocaram anubhavati, ayam ucyate śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3609: tatra katamo ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ? yena samādhinā sarvasamādhayo
K02psp_1u:3610: mudritā, ayam ucyate ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3611: tatra katamaḥ siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3612: sarvasamādhibhir vikrīḍati, ayam ucyate siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiḥ,
K02psp_1u:3613: tatra katamaḥ sucandro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn
K02psp_1u:3614: avabhāsayati, ayam ucyate sucandro nāma samadhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3615: tatra katamaś candradhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ? yaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ
K02psp_1u:3617: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3618: sarvasamādhibhir udgacchati, ayam ucyate sarvadharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3619: tatra katamo 'valokitamūrdhnā nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3620: sarvasamādhīnāṃ mūrdhnānam avalokayati, ayam ucyate avalokitamūrdhnā nāma
K02psp_1u:3622: tatra katamo dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3623: dharmadhātor niścayaṃ gacchati, ayam ucyate dharmadhātuniyato nāma
K02psp_1u:3625: tatra katamo niyatadhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3626: sarvasamādhīnāṃ niyatadhvajaṃ dhārayati, ayam ucyate niyatadhvajaketur
K02psp_1u:3628: tatra katamo vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3629: sarvasamādhibhir na bhidyate, ayam ucyate vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3630: tatra katamo dharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3631: sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrāṃ praviśati, ayam ucyate dharmapraveśamudro nāma
K02psp_1u:3633: tatra katamaḥ samādhirājasupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ rājasupratiṣṭhānena pratitiṣṭhati, ayam ucyate samādhirājasupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3634: tatra katamo raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3635: sarvasamādhīnāṃ raśmīn avasṛjati, ayam ucyate raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3636: tatra katamo balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3637: sarvasamādhīnāṃ balavyūhaṃ dhārayati, ayam ucyate balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3638: tatra katamaḥ samudgato nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā samādhayaḥ
K02psp_1u:3639: samudāgacchanti, ayam ucyate samudgato nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3640: tatra katamo niruktinirdeśapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3641: sarvasamādhīnāṃ niruktinirdeśaṃ praviśati, ayam ucyate niruktinirdeśapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3643: samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām adhivacananāmadheyāni praviśati, ayam ucyate adhivacanasaṃpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3644: tatra katamo digvilokito nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3645: sarvasamādhīnāṃ diśo vyavalokyante, ayam ucyate digvilokito nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3646: tatra katama ādhāraṇamudro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3647: sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrā ādhārayati, ayam ucyate ādhāraṇamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3648: tatra katamo 'saṃpramuṣito nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3649: sarvasamādhayo na pramuṣyante, ayam ucyate asaṃpramuṣito nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3650: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā tasya sarvasamādhayaḥ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇatāṃ
K02psp_1u:3651: gacchanti, ayam ucyate sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3652: tatra katama ākāśasphāraṇo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3653: sarvasamādhīnām ākāśasphāraṇatayā spharati, ayam ucyate ākāśasphāraṇo nāma
K02psp_1u:3655: tatra katamas tejovatī nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3656: sarvasamādhīnāṃ tejasā ca dhiyā ca jvalayati, tenocyate tejovatī nāma
K02psp_1u:3658: tatra katamo 'pramāṇāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3659: apramāṇam avabhāsate, tenocyate apramāṇāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3660: tatra katamo 'saṅgānāvaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3661: sarvasaṃgarahitatām upādāya nirāvaraṇo 'vabhāsate, tenocyate asaṃgānāvaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3662: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmapravṛttisamucchedo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmeṣu pravṛttiṃ samucchinatti tenocyate sarvadharmapravṛttisamucchedo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3663: tatra katamo raṇajaho nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā (PvsP1-2: 68)
K02psp_1u:3664: sarvasamādhīnāṃ nimittāny api jahāti prāg evānyāni nimittāni kleśānāṃ,
K02psp_1u:3666: tatra katamo vairocano nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn avabhāsayati tapati virocate, tenocyate vairocano nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3667: tatra katamo 'nimiṣo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā na kaścid dharmam eṣati, tenocyate 'nimiṣo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3668: tatra katamo 'niketasthito nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3669: sarvasamādhiṣu na kañcid dharmam aniketaṃ samanupaśyati tenocyate
K02psp_1u:3671: tatra katamo niścitto nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā nihīnāṃś cittacaitasikān dharmān na pravartayati tenocyate niścitto nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3672: tatra katamo vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3673: sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ dhārayati tenocyate vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3674: tatra katamo 'nantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā anantāṃ prabhāṃ karoti tenocyate 'nantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3675: tatra katamaḥ prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3676: sarvasamādhīnāṃ prabhāṃ karoti tenocyate prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3677: tatra katamaḥ samantāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ? yasya samādheḥ saha
K02psp_1u:3678: pratilambhena sarvasamādhimukhany avabhāsante, tenocyate samantāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3679: tatra katamaḥ śuddhasāro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3680: sarvasamādhīnāṃ śuddhasamatām anuprāpnoti, tenocyate śuddhasāro nāmasamādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3681: tatra katamo vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3682: sarvasamādhīnāṃ balam ākarṣayati sarvasamādhīn prabhāvayati, tenocyate vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3683: tatra katamo ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3684: sarvasamādhīnāṃ ratim anubhavati, tenocyate ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3685: tatra katamo vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3686: sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ karoti, tenocyate vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3687: tatra katamo 'kṣayo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ naivākṣayaṃ na kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati, tenocyate 'kṣayo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3688: tatra katamo vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3689: sarvasamādhimaṇḍalāni dhārayati, ayam ucyate vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3690: tatra katamo 'kṣayāpagato nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3691: sarvasamādhīnāṃ kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati tathā ca paśyati yathā aṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, tenocyate 'kṣayāpagato nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3692: tatra katamo 'niñjyo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn neñjayati na manyate na spandati na prapañcayati, tenocyate 'niñjyo nāma
K02psp_1u:3694: tatra katamo vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn vivṛtān samanupaśyati, tenocyate vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3695: tatra katamaḥ sūryapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3696: sarvasamādhīnāṃ raśmimukham avabhāsayati, tenocyate sūryapradīpo nāma
K02psp_1u:3698: tatra katamaś candravimalo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3699: sarvasamādhīnām andhakāraṃ vidhamayati, tenocyate candravimalo nāma
K02psp_1u:3701: tatra katamaḥ śuddhaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3702: sarvasamādhīnāṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhate, tenocyate śuddhaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3703: tatra katama ālokakaro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3704: sarvasamādhimukhānām ālokaṃ karoti, tenocyate ālokakaro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3705: tatra katamaḥ kārākāro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samā adhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ kāragatāṅ kriyāṅ karoti, tenocyate kārākāro nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3706: tatra katamo jñānaketur nāmasamādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3707: sarvasamādhīnāṃ jñānaketuṃ samanupaśyati, tenocyate jñānaketur nāma
K02psp_1u:3709: tatra katamo vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā (PvsP1-2: 70)
K02psp_1u:3710: sarvadharmān nirvidhyate samādhim api na samanupaśyati, tenocyate vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3711: tatra katamaś cittasthitir nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā cittaṃ na varṇayati na vivartate na pratibhāsate na vighātam āpatsyate na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati cittam iti, tenocyate cittasthitir nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3712: tatra katamaḥ samantāloko nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3713: sarvasamādhīnāṃ samantālokaṃ samanupaśyati, tenocyate samantāloko nāma
K02psp_1u:3715: tatra katamaḥ supratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3716: sarvasamādhiṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati, tenocyate supratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3717: tatra katamo ratnakoṭir nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3718: sarvasamādhayaḥ samantād ratnakotir iva saṃdṛśyante, tenocyate ratnakoṭir nāma samādhiḥ.
K02psp_1u:3719: tatra katamo varadharmamudro nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_1u:3720: sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti, ādimudrāmudritām upādāya, tenocyate varadharmamudro nāma
K02psp_1u:3721: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā na kañcid dharmaṃ samatānirmuktaṃ samanupaśyati, tenocyate sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhiḥ.
