K02psp_1u:4452: nopalabhyate, abhimukhī bhūmir bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate, dūraṅgamā bhūmir bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate, acalā bhūmir bhūmyanupalabdhyā
K02psp_1u:4453: nopalabhyate, sādhumatī bhūmir bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate, dharmameghā bhūmir bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:4454: punar aparaṃ subhūte daśa bhūmayo bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyante. katamā
K02psp_1u:4455: daśa? śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmiḥ vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmir buddhabhūmiḥ.
K02psp_1u:4456: adhyātmaśūnyatayā prathamā bhūmir nopalabhyate, bahirdhāśūnyatayā prathamā bhūmir nopalabhyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā prathamā bhūmir
K02psp_1u:4457: nopalabhyate, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā prathamā bhūmir nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4458: yāvad daśamī bhūmir adhyātmaśūnyatayā daśamī bhūmir nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4459: bahirdhāśūnyatayā daśamī bhūmir nopalabhyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā daśamī bhūmir nopalabhyate, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā daśamī bhūmir
K02psp_1u:4461: adhyātmaśūnyatayā sattvaparipāko nopalabhyate, bahirdhāśūnyatayā sattvaparipāko nopalabhyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā sattvaparipāko nopalabhyate, evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā sattvaparipāko nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:4462: adhyātmaśūnyatayā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir nopalabhyate, bahirdhāśūnyatayā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir nopalabhyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir nopalabhyate, evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā
K02psp_1u:4464: adhyātmaśūnyatayā pañca cakṣūṃṣi nopalabhyante, bahirdhāśūnyatayā pañca cakṣūṃṣi nopalabhyante, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā pañca cakṣūṃṣi
K02psp_1u:4465: nopalabhyante, evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā pañca cakṣūṃṣi nopalabhyante, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena sarvadharmāṇāṃ mahāyānena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4467: iti bhāvanāmārge dvitīyagrāhakavikalpapratipakṣaḥ ity uktā saṃbhārapratipattiḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam itīdaṃ bhagavann ucyate, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati tenocyate mahāyānam iti, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānaṃ, tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann
K02psp_1u:4468: ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ, evam eva bhagavann asmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4469: avakāśaḥ. evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4470: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya nāpy āgamo dṛśyate na nirgamo na sthānaṃ dṛśyate, evam evāsya bhagavan mahāyānasya naivāgama upalabhyate na nirgamo na sthānam upalabhyate, tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśasya nāpi pūrvānta
K02psp_1u:4471: upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate adhyavasamatām
K02psp_1u:4472: upādāya. evam eva bhagavann asya mahāyānasya na pūrvānto nāparānto na
K02psp_1u:4473: madhya upalabhyate, adhvasamatām upādāya, evam idaṃ bhagavan mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate.
K02psp_1u:4474: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4475: yad imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā, dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā
K02psp_1u:4476: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā, idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya
K02psp_1u:4478: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvasamādhimukhāni śūraṅgamaḥ samādhir vistareṇa kāryaḥ, yāvad asaṅgākāśavimuktinirupalepaḥ samādhiḥ, idaṃ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
K02psp_1u:4479: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, yāvad
K02psp_1u:4482: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02psp_1u:4484: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti, katamaś ca sadevamānuṣāsuro loko yad uta kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātuḥ
K02psp_1u:4485: sacet subhūte kāmadhātus tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo
K02psp_1u:4486: 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya
K02psp_1u:4487: nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito
K02psp_1u:4488: 'yathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati,
K02psp_1u:4489: sacet subhūte rūpadhātus tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī
K02psp_1u:4490: bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ
K02psp_1u:4491: saṃdarśito 'yathāvat sarvam idam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati,
K02psp_1u:4492: sacet subhūte ārūpyadhātus tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī
K02psp_1u:4493: bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte ārūpyadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ
K02psp_1u:4494: saṃdarśito 'yathāvat sarvam idam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4495: sacet subhūte rūpaṃ tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:4496: 116) aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4497: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam
K02psp_1u:4498: avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
K02psp_1u:4499: sacet subhūte vijñānaṃ tathatābhaviśyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4500: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4501: vijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam
K02psp_1u:4502: avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4503: sacet subhūte cakṣus tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ
K02psp_1u:4504: bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo
K02psp_1u:4505: 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuaraṃ lokam abhibhūya
K02psp_1u:4506: nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte cakṣuḥ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4507: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā
K02psp_1u:4509: sacet subhūte manas tathatābhaviṣyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ
K02psp_1u:4510: bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo
K02psp_1u:4511: 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya
K02psp_1u:4512: nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte manaḥ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4514: sacet subhūte rūpaṃ tathatābhaviṣyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ
K02psp_1u:4515: bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya
K02psp_1u:4516: nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4519: sacet subhūte dharmas tathatābhaviṣyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4520: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte dharmaḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito 'nityo 'dhruvo 'śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī,
K02psp_1u:4521: abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4522: sacet subhūte cakṣurvijñānaṃ tathatā sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ bhaviṣyat,
K02psp_1u:4523: avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4524: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4525: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam
K02psp_1u:4526: avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4528: sacet subhūte manovijñānaṃ tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4529: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4530: manovijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam
K02psp_1u:4531: avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4532: sacet subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśas tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4533: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4535: 'vipariṇāmadharmī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ
K02psp_1u:4537: sacet subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśas tathatā abhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato (PvsP1-2: 118)
K02psp_1u:4539: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4541: 'vipariṇāmadharmī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4542: sacet subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato
K02psp_1u:4544: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4545: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā kalpitā viṭhapitā saṃdarśitā anityā adhruvā aśāśvatā avipariṇāmadharmiṇī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā
K02psp_1u:4546: ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā,
K02psp_1u:4547: sacet subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato
K02psp_1u:4549: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4550: manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā kalpitā viṭhapitā saṃdarśitā anityā adhruvā aśāśvatā avipariṇāmadharmiṇī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4551: sacet subhūte dharmadhātur bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4552: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4553: dharmadhātur abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭiḥ.
K02psp_1u:4554: sacet subhūte acintyadhātur bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4555: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4556: acintyadhātur abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirnāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4557: sacet subhūte dānapāramitā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4558: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4559: dānapāramitābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā (PvsP1-2: 119)
K02psp_1u:4561: sacet subhūte prajñāpāramitā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4562: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4563: prajñāpāramitābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4564: sacet subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatābhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4565: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4566: adhyātmaśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4567: sacet subhūte bahirdhāśūnyatā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4568: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4569: bahirdhāśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4570: sacet subhūte adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4572: evaṃ yāvat sacet subhūte abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4573: sacet subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4574: evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni.
K02psp_1u:4575: sacet subhūte āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4576: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4577: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam
K02psp_1u:4579: sacet subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya (PvsP1-2: 120)
K02psp_1u:4580: nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4581: evaṃ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ.
K02psp_1u:4582: sacet subhūte aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān
K02psp_1u:4584: ity agratāniryāṇam sacet subhūte gotrabhūdharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4585: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4586: gotrabhūdharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4587: sacet subhūte aṣṭamakadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4588: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4589: aṣṭamakadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4590: evaṃ srotaāpannnadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā
K02psp_1u:4591: sacet subhūte buddhadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4592: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4593: buddhadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4594: sacet subhūte gotrabhūmir bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4595: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4596: gotrabhūmir abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4597: evam aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho
K02psp_1u:4599: sacet subhūte buddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4600: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte buddho
K02psp_1u:4601: 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya
K02psp_1u:4603: sacet subhūte sadevamānuṣāsuro loko bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4604: iti prahāṇaniryāṇam sacet subhūte prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāvad ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās te bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan
K02psp_1u:4605: nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
K02psp_1u:4606: yasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās te abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4607: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvo
K02psp_1u:4608: 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān abhāvān viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam anuprāpnuyāt, yasmāt subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānam abhāvo na bhāvas
K02psp_1u:4609: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān abhāvān iti viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam anuprāpnoti, evaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevanānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4610: sacet subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā cābhyabhaviṣyat,
K02psp_1u:4611: yasmāt subhūte dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny abhāvo nabhāvas tasmāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā cābhibhavanti.
K02psp_1u:4612: sacet subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathagato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
K02psp_1u:4613: avabhāsenāsphāriṣyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K02psp_1u:4614: 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena
K02psp_1u:4615: sacet subhūte tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān
K02psp_1u:4617: tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan
K02psp_1u:4618: samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv aprameyasaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇābhivijñapayati.
K02psp_1u:4619: sacet subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ bhāvo
K02psp_1u:4620: 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatas triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ prāvartayiṣyat, apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇa, yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakram abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathagatena triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa.
K02psp_1u:4621: sacet subhūte sattvā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ naiva te sattvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyan yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā abhāvo na bhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ tasmāt te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
K02psp_1u:4622: ity adhigamaniryāṇam iti trividham uddeśaniryāṇam yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti, evam etat subhūte
K02psp_1u:4623: evam etat, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānaṃ, yathākāśasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na
K02psp_1u:4624: dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate, evam eva subhūte tasya yānasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate,
K02psp_1u:4625: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na mañjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇam, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na
K02psp_1u:4626: dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na māñjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4628: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na (PvsP1-2: 123)
K02psp_1u:4629: pratyutpannaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4630: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na hānir na vṛddhiḥ, evam eva subhūte
K02psp_1u:4631: tasya mahāyānasya na hānir na vṛddhis tenocyate, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4632: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ, evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tenocyate, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4633: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir na viṣṭhitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ, evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasyanotpādo na nirodho na sthitir na viṣṭhitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4634: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ na vyākṛtaṃ
K02psp_1u:4635: nāvyākṛtaṃ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ na
K02psp_1u:4636: vyākṛtaṃ nāvyākṛtaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4637: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ na mataṃ na vijñātaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4638: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ na mataṃ na vijñātaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4639: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na prahātavyaṃ na sākṣātkartavyaṃ na bhāvayitavyaṃ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na prahātavyaṃ na sākṣātkartavyaṃ na bhāvayitavyaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4640: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na vipāko na vipākadharmi, evam eva subhūte
K02psp_1u:4641: tan mahāyānaṃ na vipāko na vipākadharmi tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam
K02psp_1u:4643: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ nārūpyadhātuparyāpannaṃ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ
K02psp_1u:4644: nārūpyadhātuparyāpannaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4645: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādaḥ, evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyāne na prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho (PvsP1-2: 124) na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādas tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4646: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvibhūmiḥ, evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyāne na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvibhūmis tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4647: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na buddhatvaṃ, evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyāne na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na buddhatvaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4648: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na
K02psp_1u:4649: samyaksaṃbuddhabhūmiḥ, evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyānena śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na samyaksaṃbuddhabhūmis tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4650: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ, evam eva subhūte
K02psp_1u:4651: tan mahāyānaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃna visaṃyuktaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4652: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ tenocyate
K02psp_1u:4654: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitaṃ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitaṃ tenocyate
K02psp_1u:4656: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko nāndhakāraḥ,
K02psp_1u:4657: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko nāndhakāras tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4658: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate, evam eva subhūte
K02psp_1u:4659: tan mahāyānaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
K02psp_1u:4660: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāraḥ, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāras tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad
K02psp_1u:4662: iti samatāniryāṇam yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ, evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4663: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśa iti, evam etat subhūte evam
K02psp_1u:4664: etat, yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4665: avakāśaḥ, evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayā hi subhūte ākāśāsattā
K02psp_1u:4666: veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa
K02psp_1u:4667: tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
K02psp_1u:4668: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4669: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4670: avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac
K02psp_1u:4671: ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāprameyaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4672: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā asaṃkhyeyāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4673: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4674: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā tathāgatāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4675: tathāgatāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā aparimāṇāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4677: 126) avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāparimāṇaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4678: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā tathāgatāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4679: tathāgatāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā asaṃskṛtāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4680: saṃskṛtāsattayāprameyāsattā veditavyā, aprameyāsattayā asaṃkhyeyāsattā veditavyā, asaṃkhyeyāsattayā aparimāṇāsattā veditavyā, aparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4681: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yaś ca tathāgato yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāsaṃskṛtaṃ yac cāprameyaṃ yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yac cāparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4682: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā, jānakapaśyakāsattayā bhūtakoṭyasattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4684: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4685: avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yaś ca yāvaj jānakapaśyako yā ca bhūtakoṭir yac cāprameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4686: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4688: acintyadhātvasattayā rūpaskandhāsattā veditavyā, rūpaskandhāsattayā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaskandhāsattā veditavyā, vijñānaskandhāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4690: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4691: avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete
K02psp_1u:4692: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:4697: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4698: avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete
K02psp_1u:4699: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4700: jānakapaśyakāsattayā dānapāramitāsattā veditavyā, dānapāramitayāsattayā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattā veditavyā, prajñāpāramitāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4701: ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4702: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4703: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4704: jānakapaśyakāsattayā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā
K02psp_1u:4705: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4706: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyāṇām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4707: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4708: jānakapaśyakāsattayā smṛtyupasthānāsattā veditavyā, smṛtyupasthānāsattayā samyakprahāṇāsattā veditayā, samyakprahāṇāsattayā ṛddhipādāsattā veditavyā, ṛddhipādāsattayā indriyāsattā veditavyā, indriyāsattayā balāsattā veditavyā, balāsattayā bodhyaṅgāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4709: bodhyaṅgāsattayā mārgāsattā veditavyā, mārgāsattayā apramāṇāsattā veditayā, (PvsP1-2: 128) apramāṇāsattayā dhyānāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4710: dhyānāsattayā ārūpyasamāpattyasattā veditavyā, ārūpyasamāpattyasattayā pratisaṃvidasattā veditavyā, pratisaṃvidasattayā daśabalāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4711: daśabalāsattayā vaiśāradyāsattā veditavyā, vaiśāradyāsattayā āveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā veditavyā, āveṇikabuddhadharmāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā, ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4712: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4713: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4714: jānakapaśyakāsattayā gotrabhūmyasattā veditavyā, gotrabhūmyasattayā aṣṭamakabhūmyasattā veditavyā, aṣṭamakabhūmyasattayā darśanabhūmyasattā veditavyā, darśanabhūmyasattayā tanūbhūmyasattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4715: tanūbhūmyasattayā vītarāgabhūmyasattā veditavyā, vītarāgabhūmyasattayā kṛtāvibhūmyasattā veditavyā, kṛtāvibhūmyasttayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4716: ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4717: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvadye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4718: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4719: jānakapaśyakāsattayā srotaāpannāsattā veditavyā, srotaāpannāsattayā sakṛdāgāmyasattā veditavyā, sakṛdāgāmyasattayā anāgāmyasattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4720: anāgāmyasattayā arhadasattā veditavyā, arhadasattayā pratyekabuddhāsattā veditavyā, pratyekabuddhāsattayā yāvad ākāśamahāyānāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇasarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām
K02psp_1u:4721: avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete
K02psp_1u:4722: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4725: pratyekabuddhayānāsattayā tathāgatāsattā veditavyā, tathāgatāsattayā sarvākārajñatāsattā veditavyā, sarvākārajñatāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
K02psp_1u:4726: ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā, mahāyānāsattayā yāvat sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā, evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4727: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4728: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nirvāṇadhātāv aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ, evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
K02psp_1u:4729: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ, evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām
K02psp_1u:4731: iti sattvārthaniryāṇam yad api subhūtir evam āha, nāpi tasya mahāyānasya āgatir dṛśyate nāpi
K02psp_1u:4732: gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyata iti. evam etat subhūte tasya mahāyānasyāgatir na
K02psp_1u:4733: dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? acalā hi subhūte
K02psp_1u:4734: sarvadharmās te na kvacid gacchanti na kutaścid āgacchanti na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4735: tiṣṭhanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte rūpasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid
K02psp_1u:4736: āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ, na hi subhūte vijñānasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4737: na subhūte rūpatathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4738: tiṣṭhati, vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ, na subhūte vijñānasya tathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4739: na subhūte rūpasvabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4740: tiṣṭhati, na vedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ na saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvo na subhūte vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid
K02psp_1u:4742: na subhūte rūpasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na vedanāyā lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃjñāyā lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃskārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na subhūte vijñānasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati (PvsP1-2: 130)
K02psp_1u:4743: na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4744: na subhūte cakṣuṣaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, evaṃ na śrotrasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na subhūte manasaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4745: na subhūte pṛthivīdhātoḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, evaṃ nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na subhūte vijñānadhātoḥ prakṛtir
K02psp_1u:4746: na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4747: na subhūte dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na dharmadhātos tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4748: na subhūte tathatāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na tathatāyās tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4749: na subhūte bhūtakoṭeḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na bhūtakoṭes tathatā na bhūtakoṭeḥ svabhāvo na bhūtakoṭer lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4751: na subhūte acintyadhātoḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na subhūte acintyadhātos tathatā nācintyadhātoḥ svabhāvo
K02psp_1u:4752: nācintyadhātor lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4754: na subhūte dānapāramitāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na dānapāramitāyās tathatā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo
K02psp_1u:4755: na dānapāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4757: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na prajñāpāramitāyas tathatā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na prajñāpāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:4758: 131) āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4759: na subhūte smṛtyupasthānānāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ tathatā na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4760: evaṃ na samyakprahāṇānāṃ na ṛddhipādānāṃ nendriyāṇāṃ na balānāṃ na bodhyaṅgānāṃ nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya tathatā
K02psp_1u:4761: nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya svabhāvo nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4762: na subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ tathatā nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ svabhāvo nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4763: na subhūte daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ tathatā na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ svabhāvo na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4764: evaṃ na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ na catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na subhūte aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4765: na subhūte bodheḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, na bodhes tathatā na bodheḥ svabhāvo na bodher lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02psp_1u:4766: na subhūte asaṃskṛtasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, nāsaṃskṛtasya tathatā nāsaṃskṛtasya svabhāvo nāsaṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit
K02psp_1u:4769: yad api tat subhūtir evam āha, nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmān mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate, evam etat subhūte evam etat, nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmān mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte atīto 'dhvā atītenādhvanā śūnyaḥ, anāgato 'dhvā
K02psp_1u:4771: tryadhvasamatā tryadhvasamatayā śūnyā, mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena śūnyaṃ
K02psp_1u:4773: na subhūte śūnyatā ekā vā dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭa vā nava vā daśa vā tasmāt tryadhvasamatayā samam idaṃ yānaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, nāpi tatra samam upalabhyate na viṣamaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4774: nāpi tatra rāga upalabhyate na virāgaḥ, na doṣa upalabhyate nādoṣaḥ, na moha upalabhyate nāmohaḥ, na nāma upalabhyate nānāma, yāvan na kuśalam
K02psp_1u:4775: upalabhyate nākuśalaṃ, na sāsravam upalabhyate nānāsravaṃ, na sāvadyam upalabhyate nānavadyaṃ, na kleśa upalabhyate nākleśaḥ, na kleśakṣaya upalabhyate nākleśakṣayaḥ, na laukikam upalabhyate na lokottaraṃ, na saṃkleśa upalabhyate na vyavadānaṃ, na saṃsāra upalabhyate na nirvāṇaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4776: nāpy atra nityam upalabhyate nānityaṃ, na sukham upalabhyate na duḥkhaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4777: nātmā upalabhyate nānātmā, na śāntam upalabhyate nāśāntaṃ, na kāmadhātur upalabhyate na kāmadhātusamatikramaḥ, na rūpadhātur upalabhyate na
K02psp_1u:4779: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya svabhāvo nopalabhyate, atītaṃ subhūte rūpam atītena rūpeṇa śūnyam, anāgataṃ rūpam anāgatena rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
K02psp_1u:4780: pratyutpannaṃ rūpaṃ pratyutpannena rūpeṇa śūnyam. evam atītā vedanā saṃjñā
K02psp_1u:4781: saṃskārāḥ, atītaṃ vijñānam atītena vijñanena śūnyam, anāgataṃ vijñānam anāgatena vijñānena śūnyaṃ, pratyutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyutpannena
K02psp_1u:4783: na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4784: nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4785: na śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:4786: 133) śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4787: na śūnyatāyām atītā saṃjñā upalabhyate, śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4788: nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītā saṃjñā upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4789: na śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyante śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalapsyante,
K02psp_1u:4790: na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4791: evaṃ na śūnyatāyām anāgataṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāvijñānam upalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4792: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4793: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4794: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalapsyate,
K02psp_1u:4795: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyante śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃskārā upalapsyante,
K02psp_1u:4796: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate.
K02psp_1u:4797: na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām
K02psp_1u:4799: na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam
K02psp_1u:4801: pūrvāntataḥ subhūte dānapāramitā nopalabhyate, aparāntato 'pi subhūte dānapāramitā nopalabhyate, pratyutpannato 'pi subhūte dānapāramitā nopalabhyate, tryadhvasamatayā dānapāramitā nopalabhyate, na subhūte tryadhvasamatāyām atīto 'dhvā upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4808: pūrvāntataḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate, aparāntato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate pratyutpannato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate, tryadhvasamatayā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate, na subhūte samatāyām atīto 'dhvā upalabhyate nānāgato na pratyutpanno 'dhvā
K02psp_1u:4809: upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām
K02psp_1u:4811: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante tryadhvasamatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante, na subhūte samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpanno 'dhvā nopalabhyante, samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannāni smṛtyupasthānāni upalapsyante,
K02psp_1u:4812: evaṃ samyakprahāṇābni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, ṛddhipādāḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, indriyāṇi pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, balāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, bodhyaṅgāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, daśa tathāgatabalāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, catvāri vaiśāradyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante, tryadhvasamatayā āveṇikabuddhadharmā nopalabhyante, na subhūte samatāyāṃ (PvsP1-2: 135)
K02psp_1u:4813: atītānāgatapratyutpannādhvā upalabhyante samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā upalapsyante.
K02psp_1u:4814: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate, aparāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate, pratyutpannataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4815: tryadhvasamatayā pṛthagjano nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:4818: aparāntatas tathāgato nopalabhyate, madhyatas tathāgato nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4819: tryadhvasamatayā tathāgato nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:4821: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā triṣv adhvasu śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā. idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tryadhvasamatayā mahāyānaṃ, atra sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
K02psp_1u:4822: ity antaniryāṇam atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: sādhu sādhu bhagavan
K02psp_1u:4823: subhāṣitam idaṃ bhagavato bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānam, atra bhagavan mahāyāne śikṣamāṇair atīte 'dhvani bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā, anāgatā api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā atra mahāyāne
K02psp_1u:4824: śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti, ye 'pi bhagavan daśadiśi loke
K02psp_1u:4825: 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyutpannās te 'py atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti, tasmāt tarhi bhagavan
K02psp_1u:4826: mahāyānam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta tryadhvasamatānām,
K02psp_1u:4827: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte
K02psp_1u:4828: evam etat, atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ca.
K02psp_1u:4829: atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat: ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam upadeṣṭavyaṃ manyeta.
K02psp_1u:4830: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan
K02psp_1u:4832: bhagavan āha: na hi subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānam
K02psp_1u:4833: upadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye kecit kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ
K02psp_1u:4835: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ
K02psp_1u:4836: pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ
K02psp_1u:4837: bhagavān āha: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni
K02psp_1u:4839: catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā, daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā, ime subhūte kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ
K02psp_1u:4840: pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ
K02psp_1u:4841: yac ca subhūte mahāyānaṃ yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitāyā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca dānapāramitā, yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ, yac ca cakṣur yac ca śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yac ca rūpaṃ yaś ca śabdo yaś ca gandho yaś ca raso yaś ca sparśo ye ca dharmā yac ca
K02psp_1u:4842: cakṣurvijñānaṃ yac ca śrotravijñānaṃ yac ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ yac ca jihvāvijñānaṃ yac ca kāyavijñānaṃ yac ca manovijñānaṃ yaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yaś ca śrotrasaṃsparśo yaś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśo yaś ca jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā yā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanāyā ca kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā,
K02psp_1u:4843: yāni ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāni ca samyakprahāṇāni ye ca ṛddhipādā yāni cendriyāni yāni ca balāni yāni ca bodhyaṅgāni yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo yāni cāpramāṇāni yāni ca dhyānāni yāś cārūpyasamāpattayo yāni ca tathāgatabalāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ye cāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yac ca duḥkhaṃ yaś ca samudayo yaś ca nirodho yaś ca mārgo yaś ca kāmadhātur yaś ca rūpadhātur yaś cārūpyadhātur yā cādhyātmaśūnyatāyā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, yaś ca tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayoyaś ca dharmadhātur yā ca tathatā yā ca
K02psp_1u:4844: bhūtakoṭir yaś cācintyadhātur yac ca nirvāṇaṃ, sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad
K02psp_1u:4846: anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ
K02psp_1u:4847: vyapadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyā
K02psp_1u:4848: prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā dānapāramitā, iti hi mahāyānañ ca prajñāpāramitā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, na subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni iti hi mahāyānaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, evaṃ nānyan mahāyānam anye samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca
K02psp_1u:4850: advaidhīkāraṃ, nānyan mahāyānaṃ anyā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti hi
K02psp_1u:4852: nānyan mahāyānam anye daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad
K02psp_1u:4853: advaidhīkāraṃ, anena kāraṇena subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi.
K02psp_1u:4854: iti prāptiniryāṇam subhūtir āha: api tu khalu punar bhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:4855: aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:4856: rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā
K02psp_1u:4858: (PvsP1-2: 138) bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate
K02psp_1u:4859: nopalabhyate, evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4861: api tu khalu punar bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:4862: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā, evam asvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ, na tad rūpaṃ
K02psp_1u:4863: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitayām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
K02psp_1u:4864: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret, saced evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na
K02psp_1u:4865: saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām.
K02psp_1u:4866: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, madhyato
K02psp_1u:4868: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā?
K02psp_1u:4869: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ bodhisattva
K02psp_1u:4870: iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate, evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ, asamanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
K02psp_1u:4871: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, yāvad eva nāmadheyamātram etat,
K02psp_1u:4872: yad uta bodhisattva iti, yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā, evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad
K02psp_1u:4873: anabhinivṛttaṃ katame te vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ ye (PvsP1-2: 139)
K02psp_1u:4874: cānabhinivṛttā na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad
K02psp_1u:4875: vijñānaṃ, tat kim anabhinivṛttam anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
K02psp_1u:4876: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, na cānyatrānabhinivṛtte bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret?
K02psp_1u:4877: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, saced evam upadiśyamāne
K02psp_1u:4878: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām iti?
K02psp_1u:4879: subhūtir āha: sattvāsattayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, sattvaśūnyatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:4880: sattvaviviktatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:4881: sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, evam aparāntato madhyataś ca vaktavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayā śūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā pūrvāntādīnām anupalabdheḥ, na cānyatra sattvāsattāśūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyat pūrvāntādi iti hi yā ca sattvāsattā yāvad yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02psp_1u:4882: rūpāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, evam āyataneṣu dhātuṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaitīti vaktavyam.
K02psp_1u:4884: dānapāramitāśūnyatayā dānapāramitāviviktatayā dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, prajñāpāramitāśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatayā
K02psp_1u:4885: pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsattāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4886: śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām (PvsP1-2: 140) asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante, na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā
K02psp_1u:4887: śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvaḥ, anyā dānapāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā
K02psp_1u:4888: dhyānapāramitā anyā prajñāpāramitā anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni, iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cāsattā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvatā yāś ca ṣaṭ pāramitā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad
K02psp_1u:4890: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:4891: adhyātmaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante, na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo
K02psp_1u:4892: 'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni, iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad
K02psp_1u:4893: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02psp_1u:4894: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:4895: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthanāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti, evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ
K02psp_1u:4896: viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśaveṇikabuddhadharmāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni upalabhyante,
K02psp_1u:4897: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā anyāni
K02psp_1u:4899: buddhadharmā anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni, iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yāvad yo ca aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yaś ca
K02psp_1u:4900: bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02psp_1u:4901: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:4902: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra sarvasamādhyasattayā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāsattayā dharmadhātvasattayā tathatāsattayā bhūtakoṭyasattayā bhūtakoṭiśūnyatayā bhūtakoṭiviviktatayā bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra samādhyasattāyāṃ yāvad
K02psp_1u:4903: bhūtakoṭyasattāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiśūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiviviktatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante, na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ samādhir anyad dhāraṇīmukham anyo dharmadhātur anyā
K02psp_1u:4904: tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭir anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni. iti hy āyuṣman
K02psp_1u:4905: śāriputra yā ca samādhyasattā yāvad yā ca bhūtakoṭyasattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
K02psp_1u:4906: sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa
K02psp_1u:4908: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02psp_1u:4909: pratyekabuddhāsattayā bodhisattvāsattayā sarvajñāsattayā sarvajñaśūnyatayā sarvajñaviviktatayā sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvat
K02psp_1u:4910: sarvajñāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante, na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā
K02psp_1u:4911: śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyaḥ śrāvako 'nyaḥ pratyekabuddho
K02psp_1u:4912: 'nyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ sarvajñaḥ, anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni. iti hy āyuṣman śāriputrayā ca śrāvakāsattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad yā
K02psp_1u:4913: ca sarvajñāsattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni (PvsP1-2: 142) sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02psp_1u:4914: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
K02psp_1u:4915: iti prāptiniryāṇe prāpyapratiṣedhaḥ yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena
K02psp_1u:4917: vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti, rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā ākāśasamā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣman śāriputra yathā ākāśasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02psp_1u:4918: upalabhyate, anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate.
K02psp_1u:4919: evam evāyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpaśūnyatām upādāya.
K02psp_1u:4920: na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate, vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ, vijñānasya naivapūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? vijñānaśūnyatām
K02psp_1u:4921: upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4923: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02psp_1u:4926: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:4927: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasya naivādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣman śāriputra buddhadharmāṇāṃ nādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate buddhadharmaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4928: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa buddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02psp_1u:4929: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate iti?
K02psp_1u:4930: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman
K02psp_1u:4931: śāriputra śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ
K02psp_1u:4932: saṃvidyate, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, na śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
K02psp_1u:4934: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate
K02psp_1u:4935: nopalabhyate, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4936: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
K02psp_1u:4937: śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā, kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā śūnyā,
K02psp_1u:4938: vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā, dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā śūnyā, prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā, na śunyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate. adhyātamaśūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā, evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā.
K02psp_1u:4939: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni, evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā
K02psp_1u:4940: indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāny ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ
K02psp_1u:4941: śūnyā, dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyo
K02psp_1u:4942: dhāraṇimukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyaṃ buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakatvena
K02psp_1u:4943: śrāvakaḥ śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhatvena pratyekabuddhaḥ śūnyas tathāgatatvena tathāgataḥ śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgato vidyate śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate.
K02psp_1u:4944: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api (PvsP1-2:
K02psp_1u:4945: 144) na vidyate nopalabhyate, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4946: yad apy āyuṣman śāriputra āha, kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi, evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamāno
K02psp_1u:4947: 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
K02psp_1u:4948: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpe rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4949: vedanā vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, vedanā rūpe na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4950: nopalabhyate, rūpaṃ vedanā ca saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4951: saṃjñā saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, saṃjñā rūpe na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4952: nopalabhyate, saṃjñā rūpavedanayor na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4953: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyante, saṃskārā rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñāne na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02psp_1u:4954: vijñānaṃ vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, vijñānaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4955: cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥ śrotre na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4956: śrotraṃ cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇena saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4957: ghrāṇaṃ ghrāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuṣi śrotre ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇāni jihvāyāṃ na saṃvidyante
K02psp_1u:4959: jihvā jihvāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, jihvā cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇeṣu na
K02psp_1u:4960: saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvāḥ kāye na saṃvidyante
K02psp_1u:4962: kāyaḥ kāye na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kāyaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvāsu na
K02psp_1u:4963: saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā manasi na saṃvidyante
K02psp_1u:4965: mano manasi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, manaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyeṣu (PvsP1-2: 145) na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4966: rūpaṃ rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, rūpaṃ śabdagandharasasparśadharmeṣu na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4967: śabdaḥ śabde gandhe rase na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, śabdo 'nyeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4968: evaṃ gandho gandhe 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, raso rase 'nyeṣu
K02psp_1u:4969: ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, sparśaḥ sparse 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4970: nopalabhyate, dharmā dharmeṣv itareṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4971: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvrjñāne itaratra ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4973: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñāne itaratra ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, itarāṇītareṣu ca na
K02psp_1u:4975: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, itareṣu ca na
K02psp_1u:4976: saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, tatra cetare na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02psp_1u:4977: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparso manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, itareṣu ca na
K02psp_1u:4978: saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, tatra cetare na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4979: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4980: nopalabhyate, tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4981: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4982: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthāneṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K02psp_1u:4983: na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, tatrāpītare itareṣu ca te (PvsP1-2: 146) na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:4985: adhyātmaśūnyatāpi yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4986: nopalabhyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi yāvad adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02psp_1u:4987: samādhiḥ samādhau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, samādhir dhāraṇīṣu na
K02psp_1u:4988: saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, dhāraṇī dhāraṇyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4990: pṛthagjanabhūmiḥ pṛthagjanabhūmau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ
K02psp_1u:4993: srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpannatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatve na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4994: nopalabhyate, bodhisattvo bodhisattvatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02psp_1u:4995: tathāgatas tathāgatatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, prajñāpāramitāyām avavādānuśāsanī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, avavādānuśāsanyāṃ prajñāpāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmāsaṃvidyamānatvena anupalambhena bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:4997: iti prāptiniryāṇe prāpakapratiṣedhaḥ yat punar āyuṣman śāriputraivaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena
K02psp_1u:4998: etat, yad uta bodhisattva iti, kena kāranenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
K02psp_1u:4999: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti, tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāma daśabhyo digbhyo na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati sarvadharmāṇām eva bodhisattvānāṃ nāmāpi na kutaścid eti na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ tathā hi yad rūpaṃ yad vedanā yat saṃjñā yat saṃskārā yad
K02psp_1u:5000: vijñānam iti nāmadheyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na (PvsP1-2: 147) vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāmasvabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma, tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattva iti nāmadheyamātram etad iti.
K02psp_1u:5001: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramiteti, na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni dānapāramitā, tat kasya hetoḥ? yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:5002: nopalabhyate, tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti, evaṃ nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramiteti na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:5003: nopalabhyate, tasman nāmadheyamātram etat, yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:5004: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipta yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02psp_1u:5005: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā
K02psp_1u:5006: cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarva ete na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
K02psp_1u:5007: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti, āgantukam etac chāriputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta
K02psp_1u:5008: smṛtyupasthānānīti, na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni
K02psp_1u:5009: smṛtyupasthānāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa
K02psp_1u:5010: tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvida āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti na ca buddhadharmeṣu nāma nāmni buddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma ye ca buddhadharmā ubhayam etad na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samādhir iti, yāvat sarvajñateti, na
K02psp_1u:5011: (PvsP1-2: 148) ca sarvajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:5013: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇenocyate yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate, atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmeti, ātmā śāriputra atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir
K02psp_1u:5015: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra sattvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārako vedako jānakaḥ paśyako na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati,
K02psp_1u:5016: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati,
K02psp_1u:5017: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣur na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrānaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
K02psp_1u:5018: atyantatayā mano na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir
K02psp_1u:5019: bhaviṣyati atyantatayā rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir
K02psp_1u:5020: bhaviṣyati, evaṃ śabdagandharasaspṛṣṭavyāni, atyantatayādharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati,
K02psp_1u:5021: atyantatayā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, evam atyantatayā śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati,
K02psp_1u:5022: atyantatayā cakṣursaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo
K02psp_1u:5023: jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttit bhaviṣyati, atyantatayā manaḥsaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:5025: atyantatayā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, atyantatayā śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā
K02psp_1u:5027: 149) vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asya abhinivṛttir
K02psp_1u:5028: bhaviṣyati, atyantatayā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati.
K02psp_1u:5029: atyantatayā dānapāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā
K02psp_1u:5030: abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, evam atyantatayā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā
K02psp_1u:5031: abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, atyantatayā prajñāpāramitā na saṃvidyate
K02psp_1u:5032: nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati.
K02psp_1u:5033: atyantatayā adhyātmaśūnyatā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā
K02psp_1u:5035: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar asyā abhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.
K02psp_1u:5036: atyantatayā smṛtyupasthānāni na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, evam atyantatayā samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, apramāṇāni dhyānāny ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, kutaḥ punar eṣām
K02psp_1u:5037: abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati, atyantatayā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati.
K02psp_1u:5038: atyantatayā samādhayo dhāraṇīmukhāni na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante, kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir
K02psp_1u:5040: samyaksaṃbuddho na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir
K02psp_1u:5042: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa ātmā ātmeti cocyate, atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā.
K02psp_1u:5043: punar aparaṃ yad āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha, abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti, evam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ.
K02psp_1u:5044: śāriputra āha: kasyāyuṣman subhūte nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ?
K02psp_1u:5045: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
K02psp_1u:5046: (PvsP1-2: 150) vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ
K02psp_1u:5047: cakṣuṣo nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
K02psp_1u:5049: cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
K02psp_1u:5050: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya śrotrasaṃsparśasya ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya jihvāsaṃsparśasya kāyasaṃsparśasya manaḥsaṃsparśasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
K02psp_1u:5051: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā jihvāsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ
K02psp_1u:5052: svabhāvaḥ, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā nāsti
K02psp_1u:5053: sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nāsti dānapāramitāyā nāsti śīlapāramitāyā nāsti kṣāntipāramitāyā nāsti vīryapāramitāyā nāsti dhyānapāramitāyā nāsti
K02psp_1u:5054: prajñāpāramitāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇāsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena.
K02psp_1u:5055: śāriputra āha: katame te āyuṣman subhūte anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena?
K02psp_1u:5056: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yad anityaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca evaṃ duḥkhā anātmānaḥ śāntāḥ śūnyā ānimittā apraṇihitā na kasyacid
K02psp_1u:5057: vigamena sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā anavadyā anāsravā niḥkleśā lokottarā vyavadānā asaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo 'saṃskṛtaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś cānenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena. punar aparaṃ śāriputrākūṭasthā
K02psp_1u:5059: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte akūṭasthāvināśinaḥ
K02psp_1u:5061: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02psp_1u:5062: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra
K02psp_1u:5063: akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, evaṃ kuśalam akuśalaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ saṃkleśaṃ niḥkleśaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ saṃsāro nirvāṇam akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā,
K02psp_1u:5064: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇābhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha, kena kāraṇena rūpam anabhisaṃskṛtam evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kena kāraṇena vijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam iti.
